author: {'steamid': '76561198293425713', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 846, 'last_played': 1576443577}
review:
EDIT: I can't delete any of my saves so fortunately I won't be able to play again this crap.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After getting 100% of achievemnts and finishing it, I must say: not funny, nor pleasant.

If isn't free, don't buy it. If is free, play something else. Maybe minesweeper, it's more exciting.

- Isn't a fighting game, is a jump-avoid attacks and smashing-keyboard game.
- The AI is so stupid that always follow the same path. Most fights will be like jump-jump-jump, wait for the enemy to stop attacking, then punch him once. Repeat that.
- There are combos but you need to go further with the story to unlock special moves, and probably you will do the same attacks to everyone because some of them can escape combos for no real reason. 
- Exploring the map is lame. They give you one move that lets you fly left and right across the screen, and one that lets you run up almost any wall. You will need to figure "how" to go somewhere and not "where" to go. It's not discovering the map, it's "they wan't you to go there".

author: {'steamid': '76561198176964233', 'num_games_owned': 356, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1575491508}
review:
Un juego que me llamo la atencion por su tematica y su precio accesible (en descuento), al principio no me convencia, sentia que el combate era un poco simple y las zonas de plataforma muy faciles, pero conforme vas avanzando en el juego el combate empieza hacerse mas entretenido y hasta cierto punto un poco dificil, y el plataformeo uff, se sentia muy dinamico, y esto es gracias a los combos simples pero fantasticos de hacer. Ademas de que puede ser rejugado con una dificultad mayor.
El unico problema que le veo son los controles (en teclado) ya que pueden ser un poco dificiles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322827662', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1546581091}
review:
Si te gustan los plataformas dudo mucho que este juego te decepcione, no hay nada demasiado complejo en su diseño, pero créeme que será lo último en lo que te fijarás. Su arte y su loca historia inspirada en la cultura de la lucha libre mexicana es suficiente como para darle una oportunidad.

Puedes golpear calaveras, hacerles llaves de lucha y hasta convertirte en pollo, no sé tú pero eso último me parece una genialidad.

Me tomó cerca de 8 horas terminarlo, la localización de los diálogos también es buena y jugar con un amigo es aún más divertido.
Me gustó tanto que compre la segunda parte, veremos que tal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090287532', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1574735478}
review:
This game has a very strong foundation. It's so strong that it almost became one of my favourite Metroid-vania games of all time. Unfortunately, the game doesn't build upon this foundation to any significant degree. In fact, it actually detracts from it and therefore ends up just being a great game rather than a fucking awesome game.

The foundation of this game is very simple. You have your 3 hit attack combo. When you hit enemies with your attacks enough time, you can "grapple" them. This grapple has 3 functions:
	• AOE attack: After you grapple an enemy, you can throw an enemy in any direction. When thrown, the enemy will knock down any other enemies in the way.
	• Attack reset: Right after you throw an enemy, you can repeat your 3 hit attack combo. Surprise surprise, most enemies can be grappled after 3 hits.
	• Invulnerability: While you're grappling an enemy, you're invulnerable to any damage. This allows you to dodge attacks and carefully aim enemies to fly in the direction you want them to.

Because of how useful the grapple is, the developers have been able to create a combo focused system witch just 2 attacks (3 hit combo and grapple). Simple and effective.

As you progress in the game, the combat slowly gets built upon using special moves. These special moves are basically heavy attacks that attack in a certain direction (up, down, left/right, stationary). These special moves ALSO reset your attacks. This is very useful for big enemies that can't be grappled. So far so good. You can use grapples to take on multiple small enemies and special moves to take on large enemies.

I thought the combat would progress to link all of these attacks together so that you would be doing really long combos while fighting many enemies all at once. That would've been really cool….. But unfortunately the enemy design stops this from happening. The small enemies' health pool is too small, so they die in like 2 combos (e.g. 3x attack --> special move ---> 3x attack = dead enemy). You can't do a long ass combo on an enemy that dies so quickly. The big enemies' don't get stunned, and they attack in the time it takes you to do 2 combos. Therefore, unless you want to take damage, you're forced to dodge and restart your combo. 

While the above is limiting, the late-game enemies are the worst. This is where the foundation of the game starts deteriorating. Late-game enemies, including bosses, automatically dodge after taking a certain # of hits in the MIDDLE of your combo. This was a really bad design decision. Note that it's the # of hits, not the damage. Therefore, combat against these enemies is all about spamming your special moves since they do the most damage per hit.  You almost never want to use your regular attacks OR grapple and so combat is actually more boring in the late game compared to the early to mid-game. Keep in mind that special moves take energy, so you'll be spamming your special moves, waiting until your energy recharges, and repeat the process.

To be fair, combat definitely becomes more challenging as the game progresses. This is because of the way fights are designed. You're not really fighting enemies 1 on 1 as you move throughout the world like in most Metroid-vania games. Instead, most fights happen in square arenas (e.g. you can be exploring and then walls appear to the left and right of you. Enemies start spawning in and you can't leave until you beat all the enemies). These arenas can have various hazards and multiple enemies can spawn in an arena, forcing you to take on multiple enemies while being wary of your surroundings. Furthermore, late game enemies have "shields", which require a very specific special move in order to break the shield. Late game enemies also have some attacks that can't be dodged, forcing you to double-jump/wall jump over them. So while YOUR attacks get more limited (i.e. you're just spamming super moves rather and not normal attacking and grappling), the enemies' attacks and defenses get more varied and interesting. I died multiple times on certain groups of enemies and got a great feeling of achievement when I beat them.

There's only 5 bosses in the game, but they're all very distinct from each other and require mastering their unique attacks. I particularly liked this boss that's 3 skeletons combined into 1. In the second phase, each skeleton covers a portion of the screen (1 in the top, 1 in the center, and 1 at the bottom). They attack with laser beams that can't be dodged, and always attack 2 at a time. In order to dodge them, you need to use your super moves to stay in the 1 portion of the screen that the skeleton is not attacking. This was a great way to make "spamming super moves" an interesting affair and I wish all of the bosses and enemies made spamming super moves as interesting as this. 

While the combat gets slightly stale near the end, thankfully the platforming stays engaging throughout the game. This is some of the best platforming I've seen in any 2-D game. Your character can wall jump and double-jump. Also, the special moves are worked into the platforming since the move that makes you attack up is effectively another jump, and the move that makes you go left/right is crucial for certain platforming sections. Furthermore, your character can dimension swap between 2 dimensions. In 1 dimension there are certain obstacles/platforms while in another dimension they're different. Swapping between these dimension quickly when platforming is crucial to succeeding, and it made the platforming sections so satisfying to beat.

The progression system is well done. Beating enemies awards you currency which you can use to buy stuff at checkpoints. You can buy health ups, energy ups, costumes, etc… You can also find health ups and energy ups in chests while exploring. There are a LOT of chests to scattered throughout the world, so it's always rewarding to go off the beaten path and explore. So you're rewarded for adventuring, so that's fun.

There's a story that's fairly typical. A villain kidnaps a girl and you as the main hero have to save her. What's not so typical are the characters themselves and their dialogue. This game doesn't take itself too seriously and the characters can be genuinely hilarious sometimes. They have unique personalities and there's a lot of pop culture references. There's a scene straight from Star Wars in one scene and I laughed out loud when I saw it. 

Overall, this is a great game with a very strong early game. It's unfortunate that the late game was not as engaging, but what's here is still a great package.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074144318', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1575344475}
review:
当时xbox上xgp免费，看名字和画风本来以为是个格斗游戏或者无双游戏什么的，就懒得下载，steam白送完了一下，没想到是类银河恶魔城。
相比之下，这个游戏没有空洞骑士讲求操作，也没有ori的精致画面，但是也有些有趣的机制（为什么这个游戏这么喜欢鸡），不同颜色的技能破不同的盾的机制也很有意思。极低的死亡惩罚，众多的存档点和传送点，非常清楚的地图指引，很适合新手接触此类游戏。
新手直接玩空洞骑士太难了，我自诩操作不错花了30个小时才通了真结局，ori和这个游戏更适合新人入坑。

author: {'steamid': '76561198063995396', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1662250365}
review:
Качественный платформер. Яркий дизайн и притягательная рисовка, классная музыка. Действительно мексиканский дух проходит через все составляющие игры. Как и в любом платформере, есть места, которые проходятся только с 10 и больше попытки, но не слишком сложные, чтобы ее бросить. Игре есть качественно прописанные диалоги с шутками.
Однозначно рекомендую любителям мексиканской тематики.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150029245', 'num_games_owned': 530, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1672066172}

author: {'steamid': '76561198084682051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1993, 'last_played': 1574923795}
review:
Super jeu d'action-plateforme inspiré de l'univers folklore méxicain avec un très bon contenu : histoire, combats, quêtes, chasse au trésor et encore plus de challenge. De nombreuses références de jeu à découvrir.

Le tout agrémenté de jolis décors, musiques et une bonne touche d'humour.

author: {'steamid': '76561198296503876', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1574823954}
review:
Pros:
-You're a Luchador
-Easter Eggs... tons of Easter Eggs
-Easy to understand mechanics
-Story isn't too deep, very linear and a wee bit predictable, but you will get immersed (well I did) and you will still get some feels.
-You're a ♥♥♥♥ing Luchador!

Cons:
-Unforgiving, like a good old 80-90's game: a few (or one) false move can destroy you or impede your progress - luckily this is still a modern day game, so they threw you a bone: infinite lives - when you die: you respawn at a checkpoint, your progress beyond the checkpoint is lost, but that's it. no "X4 lives left". -whew.
-Uncomfortable key mappings (this is for gamepad) that cannot be changed. Paired with the former cons, this makes the game more frustrating than it should.

9/10; not giving 'em a 10 not untill they fix the controller problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972444090', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 829, 'last_played': 1574645677}
review: Great game, highly recommended.  The art style is gorgeous, and creates some really memorable visuals.  The Metroid inspired (right down to upgrades via Chozo statue) gameplay rarely falters, the level design is inspired.  Some things fell flat for me - the humor was a little too meme-y, some of the difficulty spikes were outrageous - but never enough to really dampen the overall experience.  From the moment I started playing, I couldn't stop until the game was finished, and I immediately bought the second one.  Anyone with fond memories of Super Metroid who hasn't checked this out already, should do so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037697424', 'num_games_owned': 818, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1574663803}
review:
Metroidvania que en teoría hace todo bien pero se queda corto y aburre.

El arte, sonido, movimientos del personaje, todo en general es muy bueno pero... el juego en sí es blando, los npcs dan todos igual, las ciudades si bien tienen distintas características no se sienten con personalidad, los enemigos son muy poco variados, el juego es fácil (casi un paseo, no hay desafío ni en batalla ni en plataformas).

Destaco la infinita cantidad de referencias y tributos a juegos como Super Mario Bros (el de NES), Castle Crashers, Super Metroid, etc.

Para resumirlo: a pesar de estar técnicamente todo ok se queda ahí en "ok" y para mi no vale la pena el tiempo. No es malo pero hay muchos mejores juegos de este estilo/género (de todas las épocas) en el que yo creo que es mejor invertir el tiempo.

review: This is an exceptionally well-made game, with great controls, platforming and combat mechanics, and wonderful humor. Well worth the time and money to invest. Also, if you're not a completionist, the game can be completed in less than 4 hours, which makes it a great game for people with very little time to dedicate to games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078120517', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 1675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1675, 'last_played': 1574626205}
review: Rewelacyjna gra. Polecam nawet za pełne 50 zł chociaż przy przecenach schodzi na steam do 10 zł. Bardzo przyjemna i zdecydowanie trudna gra. Piękna graficznie i rewelacyjna mechanicznie. Udźwiękowienie całkiem dobre choć po kilku godzinach zaczyna przynudzać. Jedyne błędy jakie dostrzegłem to różna reakcja na moje ataki podczas walki z "ognistym bossem" w trybie hard. Animacja wskazuje na jedno, a wróg wykonuje co inne. Najbardziej irytujący boss, ale tylko na hard. na normalu powtarzałem jedynie 2 ostatnich bossów. Polecam przejść na normalu i tam odblokować i znaleźć wszystko i dopiero potem podchodzić do ostatniego bossa, bo ukryte zakończenie jest świetne. To normalne ogarniecie po przejściu na hardzie, bo tam mi się już zbierać wszystkiego nie chciało. Tak czy owak zdecydowanie polecam dla fanów trudnych zręcznościowych platformówek :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198046261756', 'num_games_owned': 694, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1574461322}
review: It's great fun to play with a friend using the new Remote Play feature. The gameplay is simple yet fun, the art style looks very nice, the music is a great fit for the setting and the overall characters and interactions are interesting and memorable. There are a lot of subtle references to other games too, and it's pretty clear that this game was a passion project for the dev team. I'd say the game is well worth it even at full price, but on sale it's just a steal. Grab it if you've got a buddy to play with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079511682', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1574462620}
review: Um jogo muito divertido, trilha sonora, estilo de gráficos, mecânicas de combate, os golpes e combos, variedade de inimigos, personagens engraçados... Já dá pra perceber que esse jogo vai te prender numa aventura de mucha lucha por mucho tiempo!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198090417886', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1574146489}
review:
於2019/11/23 全地圖100%真結局通關，全流程大概16~17小時。 在這裡跟製作團隊抱歉，由於中文化在最新版本的遊戲中不能成功使用(正版是之前免費贈送的，經過多次嘗試無法中文化)，所以我只能找盜版來體驗劇情(全NPC對話必看)，並於今日購買Guacamelee!2 全DLC版本支持。  
                                                                       *注意: 以下內容會有劇透!!

    
    總體打完只有一個感想，神作! 在前期就可以連續拿到通關用的跑酷技能在類銀河戰士惡魔城的遊戲裡很少見，在上在前期遇到的陰陽兩界的轉換讓人眼睛為之一亮! 戰鬥的打擊感不錯，加上此遊戲有特有的近戰摔角技。 與後期為了拿全地圖100%而面臨的多項地圖跑酷挑戰。 在地圖跑酷的設計上製作團隊用了不少巧思，可以說是把跑酷技能用到了淋漓盡致(包含地獄的17道關卡)，我花了不少時間持續練習通關，得到了巨幅的成就感與技術的提升。 感覺在任何2D橫向卷軸的跑酷關卡已經難不倒我了(當然包含hollow knight)。
    
    最後結局的部分因為努力過而打道的真結局非常讓我滿意，誠意滿滿的工作人員名單配上結局甜蜜的精緻CG。 最後回到標題選單選額外內容還有直接給你一般結局觀看，不用重新打一輪真的是很位玩家著想， 謝謝你們製作了這麼棒的遊戲!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198146748474', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1583503418}
review: One of the best game for killing time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002818659', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 1490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1283, 'last_played': 1597520578}
review: Aunque lleve tiempo de estrenado este juego, definitivamente se recomiendo mucho a quien busque un 'metroidvania' bien estructurado, pero que incluya retos dentro del juego que requieran su respectiva habilidad y maestría en los controles. Ya sea que se juegue en cooperativo, o solitario; solo la historia, o en estilo "complecionista"; este título ofrece de forma funcional el estilo de reto y juego que se busca. En cuanto al arte, como Mexicano admito que se nota una clara inspiración por parte del creador, aunque a ratos sí caen en cierto estereotipo. Aún así no es ofensivo y, por el contrario, crearon un mundo colorido que se disfruta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312399219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1574337272}
review:
Guacamelee2와 스토리가 이어진다길래 플레이.
게임의 절반 이상의 시간이 진엔딩을 위한 오브 모으는 시간이었음.
게임 자체는 어려움이 하나도 없고 쉬운편.(스토리만 민다고 가정할때)
맨 마지막에 위치한 40원짜리 코스튬 끼면 게임이 더욱 쉬워짐.
인페르노 챌린지 12개랑 모든 오브 모으기 까지 했는데 이 컨텐츠가 어렵고 짜증나는 구조로 되어있음.
인페르노 챌린지 5개 더 남았는데 이게 가장 어렵다고 들어서 나중에 할 예정임.
호쾌한 타격감으로 생각없이 몬스터나 잡으러 한 겜인데 진엔딩 하나 때문에 스트레스 받아야하는 겜이 된 점에서 비추. 진엔딩 안보기엔 너무 찝찝한 엔딩이라 짜증남. 
심지어 Guacamelee2 스토리가 진엔딩에서 이어지기 때문에 어쩔 수 없이 봄.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093222732', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1573963571}
review:
game's gud
Fun metroidvania beat 'em up, combat feels tight and responsive, overworld is pretty big. Main quest isn't very long, but it's not too short either. Movement upgrades aren't terribly unique, but they're fun to use nonetheless, and along with the world switching mechanic is surprisingly well integrated into both combat and exploration. Props to the writing, humor's pretty good, and even when it didn't have me laughing, it'd get a chuckle or a smirk out of me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088611852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1685465586}
review:
Got this game in one of those G2A random key bundles, and I have to say I'm quite happy with this one. Its a solid platformer with an awesome Dia De Los Muertos flair. It looks great, the combat is simple to grasp, and the music is very fun. If you dont know what Dia de los muertos is, just quickly watch Pixar's Coco for a quick introduction. Its a lot more fun if you know what the story behind the holiday is. 

Definitely a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198856606475', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1573860343}
review:
Resumo: 
Se você está procurando um jogo de plataforma divertido para jogar com amigos ou até mesmo sozinho (Eu joguei sozinho e me diverti) este jogo é um ótima opção graças aos seus controles simples e seu ar nem um pouco sério tendo inúmeras referências a outros jogos como Castle Crashers e Super Mario.

Tópicos:
- História;
- Jogabilidade;
- Trilha Sonora;
- Level Design;
- Interface.

Historia: [Simples, mas Ok]
Bem esse jogo de longe não tem foco em história, até porquê o objetivo dele e sair descendo o cacete em tudo que e morto vivo, basicamente resgate a princesa que foi raptada. Tem umas coisinhas extras que os NPC's vão falando caso você interaja com eles mas nada de mais, basicamente uma historia para tapar buraco e não parecer vazio.

Jogabilidade: [Simples, de uma forma Boa]
O jogo ensina bem dos controles em tutorias rápidos sem muita enrolação, tive poucos problemas jogando com o teclado e não testei com o controle talvez não seja tão bom nele. Ouve partes que foram complicadas graças aos comandos não responderem tão bem mas isso acontece mais em partes que você tem que usar o Wall Jump (Goat Jump), pois o tempo que você tem para pular antes que ele se desgrude é bem pequeno, algo como relou na parede você tem que apertar Pulo, ou você sai da parede.

Trilha Sonora: [Simples, porem legal e não enjoativa]
Bem essa parte não sei bem explicar, não é algo marcante nem muito bom, mas você não se enjoa de ficar ouvindo a musica desse jogo, basicamente uma ou duas musicas para cada cenário, uma musiquinha diferente para eventos diferente coisa padrão.

Level Design: [Bem arquitetado e bonita]
Vamos lá, essa parte é interessante, cada Area tem varias coisinhas para fazer, desde Side Quest's em cidades a coisas escondidas ou blocos coloridos, os cenários quase nunca são vazios tem sempre ali no cenário para não parecer estático. Falando em cidades são uma parte muito engraçada do jogo, as quais são cheias de referências ou coisinhas para fazer, logo na primeira cidade você se depara com duas referências a outros jogos e umas 3 Side Quest's interessantes, todas de sair explorando o mapa e achando coisinhas, foi legal ficar um tempo ali procurando alguns NPC's, para no final a cozinheira fazer Uma sopa pá nóis.
Bem, esse não é um jogo difícil então não espere muitos desafios, mas ainda sim é divertido, as boss Battles por exemplo conseguem apresentar volta e meia mecanicas interessantes que podem fazer você morrer uma boa quantidade de vezes até você pegar a manha.

- Interface: [Simples a quase Nula]
Bem, o menu é bem simples de se entender como todo menu tem que ser, o jogo não apresenta muitas interfaces além do menu, menu de pausa e o mapa (talvez esteja esquecendo de 1) então não tem muito como falhar nisso.
Um aspecto que vale a pena comentar e sobre os "Status" enquanto joga solo, o lugar aonde ficam os status mesmo que jogando solo vão ficar comprimidos e isso a primeira vida é estranho porquê sua barra de vida vai ser extremamente pequena, eu no começo pensei que caso eu recebesse uma porradolha já ia ficar mal, mas mesmo no início você tem vida para aguentar umas 4 porradas, e vai por mim isso é muito quando os inimigos quase não batem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125712966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 1651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 988, 'last_played': 1668888914}
review:
我所见过的地图标识最省心的银河城了。

墨西哥风格的银河城，文化氛围和音乐非常应景，艺术设计简单明快，视觉感很舒服。流程也很合适，玩起来很轻松~剧情轻松幽默，满地图都是梗。废柴农夫专职英雄摔跤手，敌方角色感觉都是一群逗比，爱慕浪子的毒蛇女，为了复活乐队成员的沙雕兄弟，灰心枪手，被迫落草的美洲虎。大Boss典型的魔鬼交易受害者，也不嘴炮上来就把主角宰了。一路打打闹闹，我倒是满喜欢这些略带傻气的小Boss们的。

直到美丽的姑娘在我面前逝去
我一直不明白玩游戏应该以一个什么样的态度去面对。
功利心态，从最一周目开始就规划白金的路线？
小心翼翼不犯错，所有难关都靠看攻略？

看着胡安带着面具内疚度过一生的时候，我才明白要去完成完美结局的意义。自己的感受是第一位的，重点仅仅在于自己能否把这份感受留住。好的叙事和成就卡关难度无关，纯粹的体验方式也是还原游戏本来的面目最好的途径。

review: Esprili ve eğlenceli bir oyun ama eğlencesi, sadece ilk yarısı için geçerli... İkinci yarısında, eğlence yerini kabusa bırakıyor çok saçma sapan bir şekilde zorlaşarak, insanı bezdiren bir zorluktan bahsediyorum. Nefes aldırmıyor o derece. Yani bazı yerlerde tempoyu biraz düşürseler ne olurdu? Zor bir yer geçiyorsun ardından daha zorlu bir yer geliyor. Ayrıca bu tarz bir oyun için çok uzun olmuş, oynanış da yavan. Hikaye biraz esprili olsa da bir yerden sonra sıkıyor ve amaçsız bir zorluk içinde kendinize ıstırap çektirdiğinizi fark ediyorsunuz... Bitirmeye yaklaştığım halde bıraktığım nadir oyunlardan biri oldu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099231050', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 934, 'last_played': 1573580057}
review:
J'ai eu ce jeu au moment ou il était gratuit sur Steam, je n'y ai pas joué tout de suite parce que je croyais que ce serait un jeu de baston en coop, mais je me trompais totalement ! 

C'est un très bon jeu de plateforme-action ! Je suis assez fan des jeux de plateformes avec beaucoup d'objets cachés permettant d'améliorer ces compétences (vie, endurance et compétence spéciale dans ce cas ci)
La difficulté des phases de plateforme n'est pas trop élevée pour la quête principale mais il y a de nombreux petits "défis de plateforme" pour atteindre certains collectibles, plusieurs quêtes secondaire, et l'apprentissage de nouvelles techniques qui oblige le joueur à revenir dans des lieux déjà visité pour redécouvrir de nouveaux passages (j'adore ce concept). Les phases de combats et les ennemis sont assez variés, même si ce n'est pas ce que je préfère dans le jeu. Seul moment qui a failli me rendre fou, ce sont les 17 défis bronze/argent/or qui sont obligatoire pour le trophée des 100% d'exploration et qui m'on fait recommencer des heures un même défi en boucle pour l'obtenir 

Je n'ai pas testé la coop, mais le jeu est déjà très bien en solo (pas besoin de coop pour le 100%)

Au final, je le conseil aux amateurs de jeu de plateforme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122813329', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 890, 'last_played': 1581838250}
review:
Un Juego bonito con ganas, con mucho respeto por mi cultura, la mexicana; se siente el calor de la gente de los pueblitos del bajío, que son representados fielmente, sobre todo de la parte sur del país, aunque no se tomen tiempo en explicar el por qué del aspecto de los enemigos y personajes,  alguien cercano a la historia y mitología de del territorio mexicano y/o alrededores sabrá o identificará muchos monstruos de la misma, ademas la musica de "electro-mariachi" recuerda a cosas que precisamente sirvieron de inspiración en lo jugable, como castlevania o metroid que hacen un excelente trabajo ambientando la experiencia.

Sin temor a equivocarme el juego es retador mas NO dificil, solo requiere un entendimiento del espacio y los tiempos para poderse superar, lo mejor es que si caes o mueres no tardas nada en volver a intentarlo lo que te hace menos frustante el constante "prueba y error", para el ultimo tercio de la experiencia no aparecen enemigos nuevos solo "re-skins" con mas vida y mas daño, pero en el 80% de la experiencia se mantiene solida y desafiante.  Lo jugué acompañado por mi hermano, se vuelve mas divertido aun aunque la cámara era incomoda para el segundo jugador puesto que solo sigue el primero, esto es mas evidente en las secciones de plataformas donde necesitabamos estar coordinados en exceso, si el segundo jugador es más hábil y lograba pasar la sección tendría que esperar a que el el primero también lo hiciera en tiempo.

Cosas que me hubiera gustado del juego.

- Los combos son muy faciles de interrumpir por los los diferentes enemigos resulta casi imposible realizarlos, ademas de que son muy dificiles de memorizar.

-Mas y mejores secciones de plataformas con enemigos, mas que nada para aprovechar ambas mecánicas.

- La cámara para dos jugadores o mas no es ideal.

- Y que te dieran mas indicaciones para las misiones secundarias o algun incentivo mas que el ser caritativo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069664556', 'num_games_owned': 439, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 1054, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1054, 'last_played': 1573340956}
review:
[u]Ewen Top10 2019[/u]

Mucha lucha y muchos memes

Comecei a jogar com uma baixa expectativa, mesmo sabendo que é um jogo bem avaliado por muita gente, e Guacamelee me surpreendeu positivamente.

O game acompanha a aventura de Juan para tentar salvar sua "amiga" do vilão Calaca. Para isso, ele acaba ganhando poderes que o transforma em um lutador de wrestling e é utilizando muitos socos e chutes que ele vai acabar com todos vilões ao longo de sua jornada.

Seguindo um estilo Metroidvania, por mais estranho que isso possa parecer, Guacamelee consegue estar bem acima de outros do gênero, com uma boa história, ótima construção de personagens, inovação nas habilidades aprendidas, além de um cenário e trilha sonora muito bem trabalhados.

Em questão do gameplay, é pancadaria da boa o tempo todo e diversos puzzle a serem resolvidos e que não deixam o jogo ficar tedioso, mesmo que você esteja em uma segunda gameplay no modo hard. Há também a possibilidade de jogar com um player homem ou mulher, sendo que as animações de combate são únicas para cada um, e muito bem feitas, o que faz ficar interessante zerar o game usando cada um.

Não posso também deixar de comentar sobre a gigantesca quantidade de referências a outros jogos, os memes. É piada, estátua, cartazes, achievements, tem de tudo! Quando você menos esperar, terá uma referência no cenário para você tirar uma foto e guardar de recordação.

Guacamelee é um jogo muito bom que vale a pena conferir

Platinado e muito recomendado!

review: Very nice and hard game, but since I finished it its doable because Im no master in hard games. I liked story its simple but funny and many instances of reocuring tutorial/"howtoplay" dialogues made in funny way. I liked moving around because controls feel smooth and tight and combos feel rewarding. Jumping and platforming is really nicely done and quite inventive. I havent played any game similar to this I think but I would really recommend this amazing mexican experience to anyone who feels like he is going to like it. (start of the game might feel slow but after a while you will be hoping around map with ease like trained gymnast)

author: {'steamid': '76561198139396626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2165, 'last_played': 1573013200}
review:
Guacamelee é um game de plataforma muito divertido e interessante, bastante estreótipado, porem grande parte dos estereótipos são realmente verdades, possui piadas de duplo sentido realmente engraçadas, e a grande diferença de outros jogos de plataforma é que ele tem uma beleza e um level design único para cada área, acabei me apaixonando pela arte e pela jogabilidade do jogo, tendo momentos bem difíceis e que te tiram da zona de conforto habitual.
No geral, o game é algo bem gostoso de jogar, pois é divertido, não é nem um pouco cansativo apesar de ter  momentos frustrantes, mas todo seu esforço compensa apenas para ter aquele sentimento de jogo bom concluído no final.
No geral, a arte e as referências do jogo são 10/10, a jogabilidade pode ser classificada com 10/10, a história podia ser um pouco mais incrementada, podendo ser considerada um 8/10.
O game em si é muito interessante e realmente vale a pena cada centavo gasto, vai te proporcionar horas de diversão.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061837685', 'num_games_owned': 771, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 659, 'last_played': 1572772946}
review:
Guacamelee is a brawler action puzzle platformer, with a heavy emphasis on platforming. While the platforming can get pretty challenging, it isn't near-impossible, like Hollow Knight's Path of Pain. This is pretty much Rayman, except with Luchadores. 
I personally found the start of the game a little dull, because the plot is really just the Mexican version of Mario's quest to save Princess Peach. Plus, combat also started off slow, with only basic hand to hand combat. But thankfully, it got a lot more fun once I unlocked more powers. So many ways to beat your enemies to pulp!

There's also probably 12+ hours of gameplay in this, assuming you attempt to get all the collectibles. 
Guacamelee is a true gem of a platformer, and definitely worth the buy even at full price. You don't even need to take my word for it - considering the amount of effort it takes to get the alternate ending, it actually says a lot about this game that 16% of its players actually made the effort to achieve it. 
While frustrating at times, there's no denying Guacamelee is a ton of fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048695648', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1572667838}
review:
Curioso y sumamente divertido título metroidvania. Todo su estilo está basado en la cultura mexicana y el humor es genial. Con personajes carismáticos y una ambientación super colorida, este juego ofrece una gran experiencia en el género.

Tiene algunas mecánicas curiosas, como por ejemplo la habilidad de convertirnos en un pollo(lo cual me parece hermoso) o la posibilidad de alterar el tiempo para completar diferentes zonas.

Sugiero encarecidamente jugarlo con mando, ya que los controles con teclado pueden volverse un poco frustrantes aunque no imposibles (lo jugué con teclado).

Recomiendo mucho Guacamelee, es un juego muy simpático y un buen aporte a los títulos de este estílo.

[spoiler]CALACA FOR MAYOR[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198264095800', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1564668705}
review:
Скучная и совершенно не захватывающая игра.
Идиотская система комбо ударов, которые у меня, как у игрока ни разу не любящего файтинги, вызвала лишь отторжение.
Идиотские ограничители карты "не пройдешь, пока не изучишь способность", в этой игре обыгрываются как разноцветные блоки, которые надо разбивать определенной способностью. Ни в одной метроидвании я такой халтуры не видел.
Абсолютно похожие локации с врагами двух-трех видов на каждую.
За два часа геймплея меня улыбнула лишь отсылка на castle crashers в виде необычного плаката
Получил игру на распродаже и единственную выгоду, которую я получил - это приличное снижение цены на набор игр "Not a Metroidvaina"

author: {'steamid': '76561198116482292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 1321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1321, 'last_played': 1572265165}
review:
【言語】英語
【難易度】普通
【実績難易度】普通
【実績コンプリート時間】22時間

このゲームは前作 (と言ってもノーマル版みたいなもの) の「Gold Edition」を含めて、すでに多くのレビューがありますので私がわざわざレビューする事はあまりありませんが・・・むしろ昔の自分に言いたい・・・。
「どうして今までプレイしなかったんだ！」と！！

原因はやっぱりこのバタ臭い見た目に、プロレスかぁ・・・興味ないなぁ・・・というテンションの低さから放置してました。そして暇になった時にふと目についたので、あまり乗る気じゃない感じに初めてみると・・・なんとまぁ面白いではないか！
正直、クオリティの高さに驚いた。
遊んでいる内にいつの間にかハマっていき、気が付けば100％クリアを目指し11時間程で1週目クリア。そのままの勢いで続けてハードモードをプレイしました。

これって「メトロイドヴァニア」だったんですね。遊んでいくたびにどんどんできる事が増えていき、爽快感も増してくる。敵を掴み中は完全無敵だったり、沢山の敵には強化モードで一層したり、硬い敵には格ゲーのようなコンボもできる。MAP探索もとっても楽しい。

さらにチェックポイントも多めで大体は死んでも直前からスタート。穴に落ちても前の足場から即スタート等々ストレスがない作りにも好感が持てます。
本当にバランスのとれたイイゲームだと思います。

またこういったゲームには珍しく、協力プレイができるのもいいですね。

もし私のように見た目で手が出せない人がいたら、ぜひプレイして欲しい。
もちろんアクションゲームが好きだという事が前提ですが、きっと満足できると思います。
こちらの「Championship Edition」が完全版らしいので、初めて遊ぶ人はこのバージョンで大丈夫です。続編もあるみたいなのでまたそちらも遊んでみたいですね。

最後に英語なのがちょっと残念ですが、ほとんどアクションなのでプレイに支障はなかったです。調べてみると、古い方はコンシューマーで日本語化されて移植されてるんですね。全然知らなかった・・・。

author: {'steamid': '76561198217750527', 'num_games_owned': 1109, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1572096323}
review:
打通之后越想越气，怒改评价。

本作的优点是关卡设计出色，同时存档点与死亡惩罚什么的相比同类型游戏来说较为友好。但是游戏过程十分令人恼火，操作手感极差还很容易按错，连招基本搓不出来，同时后摇感人，硬直更感人，被一个迷之飞镖打到塔底重新爬一遍那种感觉让人气不打一处来。同时本作真的特别特别废手指，有些地方也很费脑子，需要“背口诀”，在一连串密集的谜题的打击下一度使我精神恍惚。慎玩慎玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198442488524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1578106259}
review:
Un juego muy pero MUY BUENO.

Yo obtuve este juego de forma gratuita, pero si hubiera sabido el juegazo que tenía en mis manos lo hubiera pagado sin dudarlo.

Es un juego desafiante, un arte increíble, y una dificultad bastante alta, no me he aventurado todavía al modo Difícil. Pero si el juego en modo normal es INTENSO, lo que se viene debe ser una autentica obra de arte. ¡Sin duda un juego recomendado!

author: {'steamid': '76561198870357421', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1703736774}
review:
不多说，一个字：值！
个人觉得唯一缺点就是没有简体中文，剧情其实很简单，但是和其他的n p c对话细节还是不太明白；
优点很多：
1.画质我不说极好，但是绝对属于精品，简单轮廓和暖色调就已经让我看着舒服了；
2.十分精巧的关卡设计和简明扼要的地图显示，存档点多而恰当，顺着剧情就是进行角色的成长升级，二维的地图标注十分明显，有颜色的点代表未探索的地方，剧情直接箭头指示，不存在不知道要做什么的情况；
3.这游戏需要耐着性子，到后面角色的能力会得到极大提升，游戏难度和趣味也会增加，从人变成鸡，你可以钻小洞了；学会红色招式、黄色招式、绿色招式等，能打击的敌人和探索的地方也会随之增加；结合学会的红色招式和学会的二段跳，都会成为解锁关卡的关键；
4.合理的打击模式，怪物会随着角色成长而增加，打击方式丰富，后期还有护罩需要指定颜色招式击破，击杀手感一流，击杀音效也不错，击杀还能回血和获得金币，节奏感重要；角色有魔法和暴走时间，击杀一定血量系统会自动提示抱摔动作，打起来还是比较爽的；
5.建议入手后自己修改键位，不然会影响游戏体验。

author: {'steamid': '76561198078867381', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1571508788}
review:
First of all, I have much more than 3 hours of gameplay. Something like 8 hours I think, but the Steam is only showing 3 hours because I played this game a lot without internet.

When I started playing this game it was in a time I just didn't want to play anything, and other games were not hooking me. But I continued playing because it was a game I could play while doing something else, but after a while a became hooked and used any spare time I had to play it. If you're like me who don't know what to play or do right now, this is a good game to make you play again.

The game is a metroidvania that has a combo-base melee combat, that is somewhat deep and fun. Also, it does not focus a lot on finding your way, since just following the map and the indicators, you'll basically never get lost. It has the doors locked by special powers, but you'll never need to remember, since when you get that upgrade, the game is going to direct you to where you need to be. Since I was a little impatient at the time, I liked it. But at the same time, the other paths leads to not only powerups but fun platforming. I ended up going after almost all powerups.

One very fun thing is the jokes. It's a funny, very silly game, with very clever and adult jokes mixed with the most stupid (and good) jokes you'll ever see. Even if the story isn't good or important, it's characters and dialogues are very fun and made me want to see the game through.

If you want something very deep, maybe this isn't for you, but if you just want to play something that is good and light, this is a great game to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024570596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1956, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1956, 'last_played': 1571578679}

author: {'steamid': '76561198352285118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1571657040}
review: Guacamelee is a one of better metroidvania out there you can get. The main focus of this kind of game would be gameplay, and it delivers. The control is snappy and responsive, with a good level design and colourful background. The game progressively getting harder, introducing new mechanic every time you move on to the next part of the game, such as realm change which can be tricky at first. Difficulty is not the hardest, but it is not cakewalk either. I would not say this one is my favourite, but I can see why it is for others.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042392623', 'num_games_owned': 2283, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1570957193}
review:
Lo mejor de este juego es su banda sonora y ambientación, mezclan originalidad con climax y eso siempre mola
También hay un punto que seguramente para la mayoría sea a favor, y de hecho a mí me gustó, pero al mismo tiempo me fastidiaba:
La gran cantidad de distintas mecánicas que tiene, me encanta que incluso habiendo tantas no se olviden de ninguna y te obliguen a usarlas todas dependiendo del tipo de desafío que te encuentres, pero al haber tanta combinación distinta de botones asociada a cada mecánica al final te terminas liando un poquito. 
Y no solo eso, sino que al parecer el motor hace que al pulsar 2 combinaciones seguidas sin haber terminado aún la primera, te las ejecute en el orden de pulsaciones, lo cual es enrevesado, porque si spammeas un botón te va a realizar todas las veces que pulses ese botón sin parar.
Solo debía comentar ese anterior punto, por lo demás el juego me encantó, probaré el 2 en algún momento a ver qué tal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198292211577', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1592240769}
review: Świetna platformówka z elementami metroidvanii, w której akcja nigdy nie zwalnia tempa, wyjątkowy humor powoduje uśmiech na twarzy, a oprawa graficzna i audiowizualna sprawiają, że klimat kultury meksykańskiej wręcz wylewa się z ekranu. Twórcy zadbali również o to, aby gracz regularnie otrzymywał nowe umiejętności, lokacje były różnorodne, a walka jak najbardziej satysfakcjonowała. Jedyną wadą gry jest to, iż niektóre ataki przeciwników wydają się być zwyczajnie niesprawiedliwe, a sterowanie potrafi być w niektórych momentach toporne, ale są to rzeczy rzadkie i raczej wybaczalne.

review: I am generally not a big fan of metroidvania games, but I genuinely enjoyed playing this game. There are so many great things about this game. The combat is very easy to learn and has an easy to learn combo system, an interesting storyline, references to other classic games, great humor in the writing, and great writing in general when it comes to the character dialogue.

review: Великолепная игра для совместного прохождения. Очень понравилась стилистика, графическое оформление и сюжет. Есть две версии концовки. Игра в меру сложная, если только не надумаете пройти ее на 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198414828996', 'num_games_owned': 1441, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 783, 'last_played': 1569466190}
review:
画风卡通萌系的类银河战士恶魔城类游戏，初玩起来可能觉得有些4399，玩进去了就会觉得还是很有意思的，探索的感觉很让人着迷。主线部分战斗难度和平台跳跃难度都不高（相比空洞骑士），很多boss都可以一遍过，但是巨树上的面具碎片处的平台跳跃难度与蔚蓝登山或者空洞骑士白宫有的一拼，相当虐心，要有心理准备，为了达成好结局这个碎片必不可缺，地狱里部分挑战房也十分恶心，不过十金就能拿到面具碎片，大大降低了难度。
整个游玩过程一直联想到寻梦环游记等讲墨西哥亡灵节的故事电影，主角穿梭于生死世界之间拯救老婆，剧情比较白开水，不过打击感和丰富的探索内容弥补了剧情的不足，bgm尚可，部分区域bgm有点洗脑，战斗代入感也不错，整体算是类银河恶魔城游戏的佳作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198302793616', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1602072725}

author: {'steamid': '76561198209696779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 653, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1625556385}
review:
A damn fine metroidvania game. 
Fun to play from start to finish with satisfying moves, great combo mechanic, an amazing soundtrack and fun boss fights.
This is one metroidvania that you won't regret playing.
And yes, playing with friends is an option. Though don't expect to get much progress done unless you're both equally talented.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976408337', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 345, 'playtime_forever': 551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1570880198}
review:
[h1]Overall = 7 / 10[/h1]

A fun and enjoyable metroidvania with a great setting and plenty of jokes / referential humour to make you smirk (or groan) that ultimately struggles to stand out from the crowd.  The game is bright and colourful and a real treat to look at and listen to, but the gameplay, level designs and mechanics all feel a bit flat and basic.  The combat is mostly unsatisfying, either being too easy or too hard, and pulling off combos of special combat moves, which are required to progress through some of the platforming sections, is tricky.  Combat is mostly segregated into small arenas, some of the toughest platforming challenges come out of nowhere, and the bosses are pretty unmemorable.

I enjoyed my shortish time with it and heartily recommend it as a functional and good open platform game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113346777', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1593, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1593, 'last_played': 1570442016}
review:
27小时全成就达成
由于没有打汉化补丁，全程原文，部分词汇【不知道是西班牙语还是什么】看不懂，导致有个别支线任务找了挺长时间[spoiler]【说的就是给老奶奶找食材那个，我以为只有奶酪，结果是4个食材，反正看不懂的一个个对话过去就行了】[/spoiler]
游戏挺好的，OST每一首都很赞，已经在网易云上全部下载
全成就难度不高，除了hard模式必须二周目完成，其余成就都可以一周目刷出来
HEBE都打出来过，只求通关无所谓HE的话，一周目很快就能过，如果要HE就比较恶心，以下剧透[spoiler]6个面具碎片，其中1个流程超长（2个10轮的车轮战），2个路线变态（疯洞的BGM我都听吐了，神树爬到顶会有只鸡跟你说psycho说明制作组心里也是有B数的）不过为了看HE防止死老婆还是值得花这个功夫（二周目就算了）[/spoiler]
二周目不是单纯的加怪物攻防，有些地方陷阱都变了，难度方面，BOSS都还好，路上个别房间反而比较难打，对时间要求比较紧或者怪很多之类的，这游戏不怕单个怪厉害，就怕人多

author: {'steamid': '76561197998817967', 'num_games_owned': 667, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 526, 'last_played': 1558293685}
review:
A pretty looking metroidvania that isn't as fun as it's bright and colourful.

To get straight to what makes it unfun: a lot of puzzles, area traversals and combat scenarios require very precise usage of ability combos to progress, and most of abilities you unlock in this game are just a variation of charge or jump, and as they pile up you have to perform more torturous actions, like say to tripple jump in one area you hafve to jump, then perform up-charge, and a forward-charge. This is... frustrating, and the game isn't very forgiving about it, with some lengthy precision combat requiring areas sending you way back at start if you make a single mistake. The combat is kinda better since it comes off more close to fighting games than metroidvanias there, but some boss fights and intense battles still require really precise combo-ing to get things done. Honestly this is exactly why I can't recommend the game and have little to not interest in sequel (which I heard is pretty similar in this regard), it's just too frustrating.

Now, the good part: the world is pretty fun, it's like this caricature of Mexico with lots of stereotypical aspects like sombreros and skeletons and, well, the luchadore masked wrestlers play a crucial role in this world, wielding mystical powers and fighting injustices. You end up as one, too. I'm not sure if all these stereotypes and cultural symbols could be considered offensive, if you ask me the game blatantly doesn't take itself serious while at same time shows these cultural aspects in a pretty affectionate manner, everyone from country bumpkins to other strangers are pretty sympathethic even if they portray some negative stereotype. The music is also really on point and memorable. What is a bit annoying is how full of pop culture jokes this game is. Like, very single advertisement or business banner is a reference to other game, which I can forgive as this solidarity with other indies and desire to subtly promote their game, but it doesn't stop at them and the pop culture references are endless.

Overall, I feel like it could have been more forgiving, and while I am sure there will be people who enjoy pulling off precision combos, I really cannot recommend the game. Esp. when there are other metroidvanias like Ori and the Blind Forest which are also pretty but have more interesting abilities and aren't as demanding for precise combo executions.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080296630', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1572791425}

author: {'steamid': '76561198061833468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1690672906}
review:
Un juego hermoso, con un arte muy original, con paletas de colores bien hechas, con ambientes y lugares bien construidos, y mucho juego entre la construcción visual, musical y la constitución propia del juego. El juego mismo es una referencia a la cultura mexicana, que explota gentilmente hasta su último rincón. Tiene mucho humor, mucho respeto, e incluso miles de "easter eggs" de la cultura pop mundial.

La jugabilidad es buena, el progreso de las habilidades del personaje es brutal, la re-jugabilidad es bastante alta, y la mecánica de los puzzles y zonas muy difíciles (donde mueres mucho) es bastante amable con el jugador. No es un juego difícil, pero presenta muy buenos desafíos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198828312941', 'num_games_owned': 986, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1570094593}
review:
是在玩了空洞骑士之后才玩的本作，记得是HB免费领的，
从死亡重试的体验上来说，比空洞骑士强，不用捡尸体，死了之后也不会掉钱，大部分情况也不用跑存档点。
但从整体的完成度上来说，还是空洞骑士比较高，本作虽然有任务系统，但是感觉连个任务提示的地方都没有。
通关还是比较简单的，隐藏收集要素挺多，动作解谜要素也很完善，爬墙2阶跳冲刺变小环境切换什么的都有。

但是！为啥类似恶魔城类型的游戏都要做很多平台或者挑战关卡，对手残真的很不友好你们知道么！

author: {'steamid': '76561198013146396', 'num_games_owned': 1655, 'num_reviews': 2129, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1704296531}
review:
Отзыв на Gold Edition, потому что нехер одну и ту же игру дважды продавать.

В этой метроидвании имеется крайне стильная графика и великолепный антураж в целом, интересные механики для платформера, КУЧА пасхалок и приколов.

Из минусов: КРАЙНЕ дрочевная в плане 100% ачивок и секретной концовки. Если обычный сюжет ещё может пройти среднестатистический игрок, для хэппиэнда и особенно челленджей нужно ОЧЕНЬ ЛЮБИТЬ ЖАНР "ПЛАТФОРМЕР".

Рекомендую тем, кто хочет просто погонять отличный платформер, который требует скилл выше среднего. [b]Не рекомендую[/b] - кто не сможет спокойно спать без perfect game, потому что проект выжмет вас полностью. Я точно не готов на такое тратить драгоценное время.

author: {'steamid': '76561198818366918', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1569629968}
review:
В первую очередь в глаза бросается стилистика игры. Мало того, что она уникальная, плавная и приятная, так ещё и местный сеттинг не подкачал! встречайте - мексиканский колорит во всей его красе. Ну где ещё вы такое видели? Очень атмосферно. Но визуальная часть не единственное, что будет радовать. Стоит отметить, что этот платформер имеет более чем отличную боёвку со своими комбинациями, которые будут расширяться по мере прохождения, так ещё отличным паркуром! порой вам придётся буквально в одну секунду делать комбинации из четырёх-шести клавиш. Одним словом - геймплей здесь так же на высоте. Единственный минус - игра отнимает очень много сил. После игр просто задвигаешь клавиатуру и говоришь "Фууууууххх... Это было потно." 
Хоть я её получил по бесплатной раздаче, но если бы знал, насколько она хороша - не пожалел бы и полную цену заплатить. Однозначно рекомендую к ознакомлению!

author: {'steamid': '76561198013073925', 'num_games_owned': 905, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 1900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1637948508}
review:
Remember that cartoon on Cartoon Network called Mucha Lucha, that made some of our childhoods that much better? Well ,I 100% think that if you liked that , you'll love this game. I'm not that big on platformers , but this one was fun. Although the combat and enemies' RNG on moves can be a bit bullsh*t at times , you have plenty of moves of your own in the arsenal and the checkpoints are established in appropriate locations so you don't have to waste much time walking around the level if you die in one room or at one boss, you can just retry right away. At the beginning of the game it might not look like much gameplay -wise, but it gets better as you unlock moves and abilities.

The music and the aesthetics are so good , even though there's no voice acting they managed to give each villain their own personalities and traits. The game has 2 different endings also, and plenty of collectibles and even side quests.

You can play as 2 different characters , and as far as couch co-op goes, up to 4 players can join the game at the same time.
There's even different skins that give your characters different stats.

So, go ¡¡INTENSOOOOOOOOO !! and wrestle around skeletons and bad guys to save the world ;)

review: I have to say, this game is good fun. Normally I don't like platformers, but this one is too good to pass. It has a cool combat system, where you can combo moves for higher multiplies. Cool art design, and excellent music.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003332807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1569064011}
review: Fun combat-platformer with a dash of Metroidvania.  The graphics are bright and colourful and very stylistic, the music is great and contributes to the upbeat atmosphere, and the game is just the right length at around 9 hours.  Downsides: combat was a bit stiff, with frequent "i'm locked in this animation so I can't avoid the incoming attack" moments, I couldn't aim my throwing attacks reliably (maybe that was me?) and the character upgrades are dull.  But definately recommended for the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040177498', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1619337210}
review:
Got it when it was 75% off, totally worth it even without the discounts. The gameplay is fun and has a fair but challenging pace, based on what little I've played. If you're a fan of MetroidVania games, and like the Dia de Muertos/Lucha Libre theme of the game (and of course the mariachi-inspired soundtrack), then you're in for a treat. 

DO NOT pick up the Gold Edition, get this version instead. The Super Turbo Championship Edition removes some seizure/epilepsy triggers that were in the original and Gold Editions, plus this one has features that render Gold Edition pointless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 995, 'num_reviews': 3712, 'playtime_forever': 7208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1675188247}
review:
《墨西哥英雄大混战：超级涡轮冠军版》是《墨西哥英雄大混战》的全方位改进豪华版，添加了两个极其有料的关卡。你可以在“Intenso”模式中爆发能量，还可以像鸡一样不停地下蛋（炸弹）。你还需要一些真正的技术才能击败新出现的精英敌人。最后，正常与困难模式也被重新平衡与强化，你将对付新boss——El Trio de la Muerte。 为了感谢粉丝的支持，我们为先前就购买了《墨西哥英雄大混战》原版的忠实玩家提供了业界良心级别的折扣！赶紧去Steam看看吧！我们期待大家重新光顾这款神作，希望你们能喜欢。
以上是官方说法，但是实际上就是个骗钱的坑爹货，游戏内容基本上与前作一模一样。

【画面&界面】
画面标新立异的游戏有很多，风格迥异还很带有本民族风格的却并不多，平时对于墨西哥的了解也仅限于网络和美剧，但是这个画面给深深吸引，不仅有着美国西部片的色系，还有抽象版画形式的达达主义美术风格。这部游戏最大的特色，就是能反映阿兹特克式的土著风情。
由于是横版游戏，这种版画式的感觉却也挥之不去的一直留在游戏里，而这款游戏的画面也给过我似曾相识的感觉，虽然这款游戏也称不上大作 ，但是依旧给我留下了深刻的影像。
在游戏中更多的是画面搭调， 并没有给人难受的刺激感。阿兹特克式的壁画、达达主义的雕像铺的满满都是，就像是走进了热带雨林的城堡，游戏中故意做出的陈旧感，让这个游戏的质量和文化内涵也得到了很大的提升。

细节一：为什么墨西哥英雄 腰带头套？
在游戏中我们扮演的墨西哥英雄在游戏中佩戴的头套是墨西哥传统拳击道具，骁勇善战的阿兹特克 人认为，动物的身体蕴藏着各种不同的能量，为了奖赏阿兹特克战士，帝国将虎皮赠送给这些战士，这就是著名的美洲虎武士。而在阿兹特克帝国灭亡后，也依然把这个传统保留了下来，但是虎皮没渐 渐代替为头套，成为英雄象征。在如今的墨西哥竞技场，依然可以看到带有头套的战士。这是英雄的象征，渐渐的也成为了墨西哥城的象征。这是一个非常有内容的细节。

细节二：这些壁画画的什么？
你都没发现么？这些壁画和雕塑其实并不是故意捏造出来的，而是一些经典的游戏改编而来，你可以看到用砖头砌成的马里奥大叔壁画，银河战士、洛克人、大金刚、城堡毁灭者、最终幻想、恶魔城、journey也都 纷纷中枪。
作为一部很棒横版游戏，大量的FC上的著名英雄人物几乎都被移植进入这个游戏的壁画，最可怜的其实还是库 巴大魔王。他不但在这个游戏中占了“戏份”，而且还落入岩浆，但是在游戏中库巴大魔王强大的攻击力，也算很对得起他的友情出演。

【音乐&音效】
背景音乐民族气息极强，音效不得不提。很多人倒是都那么觉得，这样的画面配上点老民歌是不快哉，这个游戏没有这样做，而是在游戏中大加民族乐值得一提的是，这些很有西部特色的音乐让这个游戏的层次得到了很高的提升，在 这样的音乐刺激下，我们可以更加畅快的在“古堡”畅游。
而更应该说的是音效，着看游戏的音效起码在打斗环节的音效 做的非常优秀，声音干脆也很畅快，在战斗画面里声音的效果拳拳入肉，做的非常干脆舒服。

【游戏性】
特点一：阴阳结界互 相穿梭，打斗流畅很给力
从前有个手机游戏给我很深的印象，在这款游戏中可以在黑白之间进行互换，是一款 很有创意的游戏，而这款游戏也是一样，独特的两层模式是这款横版游戏在游戏的世界观上看着很是立体。这款游戏虽然 不大，但是却有着非常宏伟的世界观和想象力，玩家在游戏中通过穿越结界和游戏开发设计师精心设计的技能相结合才能更加快速的通过这些关卡，而在这个游戏中也隐藏着各种各样的秘密。
在着看游戏中使用和了解自己的技能是非常重要的事情，在着看游戏中，很多的技能并不是用于打斗，而是在游戏的一些 特有的环节，发挥着重要的作用，而在战斗中这些技能有时候也能帮你不少的忙，倒也是相得益彰。在游戏中，玩家可以 集思广益，仔细观察就可以发现这款游戏中蕴藏的一些彩蛋和秘密，也大大延续了着看游戏的生命里，和趣味性。

特点二：集思广益，汇集更多经典玩法
在这款游戏中，有着很多风格各异的经典游戏的影子，例如说在打斗上就很有《战神》系列的影子，在一些关卡中，只有按键正确才能有正确输 出这一点就很有PS平台上的游戏特有的特点，而如果想要有更多更好的连招，就必须正确的按键和恰当好处的连招，才能击败敌人，这一点又很有《啪嗒砰》系列特别的感觉。
而在画面上，《超级兄弟：剑与魔法》特别的视觉效果被很好的有美国西部民族特色的壁画完美的结合，更好的渲染使得《墨西哥英雄大混战》 没有了《超级兄弟》黑白交替没明显的突兀感，可以说是很好的结合。
而游戏中阴阳结界的结合，在曾经的很多游戏中都 也出现过，在《墨西哥英雄大混战》中也植入了这个元素，并且让游戏变得更加的酣畅淋漓。但在游戏中，是并不在于它是如何模仿这些杰作的，而是在于是否搭配的相得益彰。

特点三：民族气息非常浓厚，身临其境
可能后多人都说了，在游戏的画面上已经讲得够多了，但是这里要讲的依然是这个。很多人都关注了这款游戏的壁画和音乐，这种北美土著特有 的美术方式和西部土著气息浓厚的是这款游戏最优秀的地方。虽然剧情依然是传统美式英雄个人主义的游戏，但是其中独 特的画面和一些言辞则是着看游戏完美的地方，现在人已经不那么说话了。着看游戏给长具有创意的游戏画面和游戏方式，或说特立独行或说标新立异。

【测评总评】
一、标新立异是优秀游戏应该有的品质，也是一些大型游戏恶评如潮的根源。
墨西哥英雄大混战》中键盘的操作做了很大的调整，这和游戏制作者本身有着很大的关系，虽然这款游戏可以使用360手柄，并且很人性化的把 两种操作提示都上了标注，而且不需要在游戏选择中更改而是自动的修改过来，但是，不管是在方向键上，还是攻击按键上更多的是给玩家造成了不便，尤其是新手玩家。

这是一款需要智力的游戏，但是这并不代表就可以把游戏的按键调整的那么不人性化吧。
二、虽然说阴阳结界有区分，但是到了战斗又像是缺了点什么
在着看游戏中，虽然有阴阳结界的区分，但更多的是在游戏的解密上增加了趣味和难度，在战斗环节也成了累赘，在另一界的怪物会在地图中显现出来这一点并不为过，但是他们依 然具有攻击性，在另一界的怪物我们又攻击不到，几乎处于无敌的状态。

我不知道这是游戏本身的失误还是BUG，但是这 样的游戏难度视乎是有点苛刻了，游戏中的战斗也大多是很简单的徒手打击，没有什么花哨的技能和攻击模式。虽然说鱼和熊掌不能兼得，但是没有总觉得让人缺了点什么。

author: {'steamid': '76561198039782332', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1431, 'last_played': 1568389139}
review:
[h1]Recommendations/Considerations before buying[/h1]
[b]Hardware[/b]
[list]
[*]Get yourself a proper gamepad.  Preferably an Xbox-style, Xinput controller.
[/list]
[b]Single- vs Multi-player[/b]
[list]
[*]Because the entirety of the game is the same for single player and multiplayer, neither mode wholly benefits.
To see which you prefer, try playing the game with a different total number of players.
[u]Multiplayer Pros[/u]
[*]Friends can revive you and and help punch bad guys.
[u]Multiplayer Cons[/u]
[*]Combat situations become more erratic as bad guys change targets, get hit and change position, or die before you land a blow.
[*]Due to the camera's focus on player 1, platforming that doesn't contain the entire environment on screen becomes more frustrating.  Players 2 through 4 often feel(s) forced to put down their controller just so Player 1 can drag the team's revive-bubbles forward.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163372579', 'num_games_owned': 791, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1568245305}
review:
Honestly... This game is fun. But that's about it. It's just dumb fun. There's no real challenge. There are some video game references (mostly Nintendo games) but the jokes get old really quick.

And something's really wrong with this game's audio mixing. Some sound effects are obnoxiously loud and the music really overstays its welcome. I'm not sure if it gets better later on but the game really holds your hand, showing you where your objective is and where you should be going next. You can't really sequence break either as you need to follow your objectives to get your power-ups one by one. This game felt like a really shallow Metroidvania.

The sprites remind me of SpeedRunners and the cutscenes are very nice. But the gameplay... It just bored me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198440481721', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1568049169}
review:
This is by far the best plat-former I've ever played. 
The things i loved -
•  The visuals - I've legit taken 50+ screenshots of the game, every location and set piece is so stunning and beautiful.
•  The combat  - Although you don't have a lot of moves in the first half of the game, the last few hours of the game is f*cking awesome-with a WIDE variety of jumps, attacks and a few more awesome surprises XD.
•  The difficulty - I'm not a big fan of really difficult games, but Guacamelee! hits the sweet spot. Its difficult at the required spots yet rewarding at the same time. Not gonna lie, the boss fights took more than a dozen tries which made the victory more rewarding.
•  The character dialogues - There is no voice acting, but the dialogues are a masterpiece, i constantly found myself cracking up throughout by play-through. (The highlights are the puns)

All in all, a must play for plat-former lover and even if your not i would recommend you try the game! The art-style and combat will keep you hooked.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115822841', 'num_games_owned': 781, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1569746988}
review:
[h1]ODIO[/h1]
Или, в переводе с испанского, [b]НЕНАВИСТЬ[/b].
Ненависть я испытываю не игре. Игра - прекрасный платформер-метроидвания (да, те самые теги сверху). Она красиво отрисована, качественно создана, наполнена колоритом (боже мой, там ВСЁ состоит из стереотипной культуры Латинской Америки), а музыка по праву займёт место в плейлисте. 
У этой игры есть только одна проблема. Это УЖАСАЮЩЕЕ управление на клавиатуре. Оно простое и интуитивно понятное, НО!
Если ваша клавиатура не поддерживает больше трех кнопок нажатых одновременно - вы конкретно попали. Нет, вы РЕАЛЬНО попали, потому что умирать или проваливать секции платформинга вы будете чаще, чем умирать в играх от From Software. Это не помешает вам пройти игру (пусть и с кучей мата), [spoiler]но помешает вам пройти игру на хорошую концовку[/spoiler]
И да, в игре есть [spoiler]хорошая и плохая концовка. Вам не скажут, что нужно для правильного прохождения. [/spoiler]
Как и положено в игре в жанре "метроидвания", по ходу игры вам будут даваться всё новые и новые способности. [spoiler]Все кроме одной, для которой нужно завершить определённый челлендж. Мне с моей клавиатурой сделать это не удалось, что и заруинило мне первое прохождение.[/spoiler]
В общем, если у вас есть хороший контроллер (подходят не все, к примеру мой Axis-4,Button-8 не подошёл, хотя стики игра навряд ли использует), любовь к платформерам и хорошей музыке, а также лишние 5-6 часов, для неторопливого прохожения (можно потратить и поменьше, но будет не так весело), то смело берите игру. 
[spoiler]Напоследок хочу предупредить, что на последних 2-х с половиной боссов вам придётся потратить немало нервов, ибо у них есть атаки от которым практически невозможно уклониться. Удачной игры![/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198266721794', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1568340019}
review:
应该算是很经典的线性银河恶魔城，前中期体验很好很爽快，战斗顺畅。特殊攻击结合位移悬浮时间攻击等功能于一身，加上七零八落的切换时空，变小鸡这样的技能，基本上穷尽了这些玩法的组合，虽然有些地方觉得有些匠气。只不过整体的体验过于线性，传送点非常不方便，地图的连通性较差，对于我来说，并没有什么发现的乐趣，世界塑造的并不好，没有激起探索的欲望。所以虽然耐着性子再次探索，但是跑图的难受让我放弃了。

中后期玩起来觉得被击打后的硬直很强，很多敌人AI十分烦人，打起来很没有节奏感。Boss设计还可以，但比起空洞骑士来说差远了，毕竟是比较早的游戏作品。

总而言之推荐，依旧是一部在设计上有自己的想法，体验很爽快，动作也有挑战，美术有特色的作品，中文世界中谈论的人不多，但确实很经典也很优秀，Team Cherry也有点名赞扬过它。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995730646', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 2992, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2898, 'last_played': 1705640330}
review:
Esta es la historia de un chivo, no no , de un pollo, no no, tampoco, de un hombre, al que una calavera mariachi  le roba la mujer. En todo los pueblos del juego hay mujeres, pero por causalidades de la vida se robo esta.  Esta calavera llamada Calaca es tan pero tan rata que engaño al mismísimo diablo y lo convirtió en un gallo. Imaginate pues lo malvado q es el poco e huesos ese.

Bueno para resumir, el hombre se mete una transformación, sin gimnasio, sin pepas, sin redbull y de ser un hombre común y corriente se transforma en un M3ga, híper, ultra luchador UFC+Bellator, que vuela, trepa por las paredes y da koñazos a diestra y siniestra. Una mezcla entre Constantine, John Wick y Dr Strange. La misión rescatar a la mujer que nunca le paro bolas de las guarras de la calavera, evitando que sea sacrificada durante un eclipse y evitando que el mundo caiga en manos de dormamu. jajajaja.


Ahora a tomar en cuenta:

📌 Recomendado jugarlo con un control.
📌 Combos de pelea brutales.
📌 Mapas bien complicados
📌 Logros bien complicados.
📌 Posee excelentes gráficos
📌 Posee una misiones secundarias bien entretenidas.
📌 Se puede jugar hasta con 4 amistades.

[b] Lo Volveria a Jugar:[/b] Si. 🐔

[h1] M3gatr0m [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198025321433', 'num_games_owned': 1160, 'num_reviews': 452, 'playtime_forever': 502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1566929697}
review:
This game is by no means a "bad" game, not in the general definition of bad. The artstyle is great, the movement and combat flows well and the music is pretty nice.

My problem with this game, however, is this: 

The Repetition. This game is just repetitive in the worst way. It is (supposed to be) a metroidvania, so you go through areas, fight enemies, collect new powers. Fighting enemies is very repetitive, platforming is simple and - well, that´s it. Puzzles and platforming consist of 90 % walljumping, whereas combat consists of "mash X 3 times for the basic combo, then use one of your 4 special moves, and maybe occasionally grab an enemy". The game is also incredibly easy, and it is one of those wonderful games where you don´t unlock the harder difficulty unless you play through it once (always a genius move in any game!)

While the artstyle is great, the areas are just boring and badly designed. Go through linear hallway, arena appears, fight a couple enemies, walljump up two walls, go through another hallway, arena appears, fight a couple enemies, rinse and repeat. There is never a challenge in the game, you never have to think. The "metroidvania" part of the game is also very light; you learn 4 special moves as the game goes on (as well as two movement abilities), allowing you to break coloured blocks in earlier areas. But the actual discovery aspect of this game is so light that you only find one of four objects behind those walls; health and stamina upgrades, money, or orbs for the different ending.

Really, my problem with the game is just that it is so boring and without drive. It just goes through the motions. Everything is just way too easy and repetitive. Boring forest, lifeless volcano, some snow mountain, a town with 4 buildings you can enter, boring combat, boring bosses, boring story with a bad ending that can only be upgraded by finding 6 hidden orbs.

If the game would be a little more challenging, more creative, would consist of more than just hallway to enemies to simple puzzle/platforming to hallway, then I probably would recommend it; the artstyle and music are the reason why it stings a little to downvote it, too. But I am rating a game here, and it was very hard to find one under the pretty facade. Maybe you will like it more than I did, but buy it on sale if you do.

As for me, it was a boring, uninspired metroidvania-supermegalite, especially compared to some really good similar games like Hollow Knight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031059556', 'num_games_owned': 490, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1566655397}
review:
Guacamelee!, es un juego de plataformas y "Hack and slash" en scroll lateral. En este juego con ambientación mexicana tu misión es avanzar a lo largo de las pantallas para derrotar al jefe final y así rescatar a la "princesa". Guacamelee! es un juego que claramente logra aquello que busca. No pretende llegar a ser el juego insignia del genero, pero con un toque de humor estupendo y una jugabilidad maravillosa se ha hecho un hueco entre los juegos que me han gustado bastante.

De los aspectos a destacar por encima de todo pondría el tema de la presentación de habilidades y el aprendizaje de ellas, es decir que el juego, en este caso presenta varias habilidades que te permitirán mejorar en combate y en plataformeo de manera simultanea, y lo hace de manera ordenada y con una pequeña práctica a lo largo de la aventura para que aprendas a usarlas de la mejor manera y te acostumbres rápido.

El humor y la música están bien llevados a cabo a lo largo de la aventura, y el plataformeo no se hace pesado, lo cual es de valorar, además los cambios de escenario hacen que no se haga pesado en ningún momento.

Como puntos negativos más destacables pondria una historia mas bien pobre (pese a que no sea lo que se viene a buscar en este titulo) y un sistema de teletransportes en el mapa que no me han acabado de convencer y a penas me he visto en la necesidad de usarlos o cuando los necesitaba estaban demasiado lejos.


[b]Mi nota para este juego es: 7.76[/b]



[u][i]Base de las notas[/i][/u]
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fUIH96ReCXX8O6ADbP_P2pTR8yy4asNlW0mreTRQxn4/edit?usp=sharing

author: {'steamid': '76561198108270275', 'num_games_owned': 825, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 869, 'last_played': 1623270276}
review:
Juan Agacate, cultivateur d'agaves dans un petit village mexicain voit sa tranquille vie de fermier chamboulée lorsque le machiavélique Carlos Calaca, nouveau seigneur du monde des morts, kidnappe la fille d'El Presidente. Sans attendre, Juan risque sa vie pour la sauver... pour tomber lamentablement sous les pouvoirs surpuissants du vil Calaca. Cependant, en mettant la main sur un masque de luchador magique, Juan reviendra des morts, près à devenir le plus puissant des lutteurs mexicains afin de venir à bout de Calaca et de ses sbires, et de libérer son ancien amour de jeunesse.

Dans un univers tout droit sorti du pays des cactus, des sombreros colorés et des tacos dégoulinants de salsa, Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition nous plonge dans un monde coloré des plus déjantés. Mélangeant jeu de plateforme, beat 'em all, metroidvania, légèrement assaisonné de die and retry, ce jeu va mettre à rude épreuves toute notre adresse pour venir à bout d'une foule d'adversaires allant des squelettes armés de sabres, aux tatous géants, en passant par des titans décharnés, tous sorti du folklore mexicain. On devra ainsi les affronter à travers d'innombrables couloirs et arènes sous la musique endiablée des mariachis.

Tout au long de notre périple entre le monde des morts et celui des vivants, que ce soit seul ou à deux, on développera peu à peu nos aptitudes de luchador grâce aux enseignements de nos vieux mentor se dissimulant sous les traits d'une chèvre décrépie, lequel nous sortira de la poussière les anciennes techniques de combat, tel le Coup du Coq ou la Claque de la Grenouille. De notre côté on pourra renforcer notre corps de cultivateur d'agave en se dénichant de nouveaux habits de luchador, mais avant tout en développant notre mode Intenso permettant de décupler les pouvoirs cachés de notre masque.

Se parcourant assez facilement, malgré certains passages pouvant se montrer assez ardus lorsqu'on est pas encore au niveau, Guacamelee se termine en une petite dizaine d'heures, bien qu'on peut compter environ le double pour compléter le jeu à 100%. Différentes arènes de défi, mises en place par El Diablo, vont également venir tester nos talents de luchador, et nous mettre à rude épreuve pour venir à bout du mode difficile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198244767998', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 355, 'playtime_forever': 1266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1690233991}
review:
[h1]Испанское мочилово[/h1]

Было интересно играть и пиз_дить толпы мобов которые с перезаходом на локацию респавнятся (чисто фарм денег)

Музыка отличная,испанские мотивы идеально сочетаются с каждым уровнем.

Боёвка неплохая,но иногда когда прожимаешь комбо оно использует другое,хотя может быть это именно в моей клаве дело,не суть.

Сюжет более менее,не знаю есть ли русификатор на эту игру,но если знаешь английский то он в принципе не нужен,от слова совсем.

Различные костюмы которые дают бонусы и отбирают какие-то плюшки + воркшоп который добавляет дефолтные (по бонусам) костюмы.

Любителям пиз_дилок, beat a map и прочего-рекомендую.

P.S.
Удостоверьтесь что готовы к полыханию вашего пукана ибо чтобы получить настоящую концовку и все золотые медали в челенджах придётся много батхёртить.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197972836357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 476, 'last_played': 1566161732}
review:
Well-made little brawler with Metroidvania elements. Guacamelee! follows the classic "save the princess" trope, with a striking visual style, framework dipped in Mexican culture and humor that lands more often than not. There's not a whole lot to say about it; combat is simple button mashing with the option for combos if you're feeling particularly skilled, as well as power moves for both combat and exploration. The campaign takes anywhere from 5 to 8 hours, depending on how much of a completionist you are and the whole thing is just really fun. The side-quests aren't too demanding and add character to the world, there's a whole lot of pick-ups to challenge your OCD and the game is just smooth and amusing from beginning to end.

It's not perfect, though. For one thing, running the game fullscreen causes constant stutters, which means I had to play the game on windowed mode (and borderless doesn't exist, due to the game's age). In fairness, this same issue appeared on Giana Sisters recently as well (when it wasn't a problem before), so there's a chance some accursed Win10 update just broke the game.

Also, the difficulty curve leaves something to be desired. The game is perfectly beatable and it's not overly challenging; however, in its third act, it's choke-full of excruciating platforming sections that rely on split-second reactions with utilizing a number of different moves to traverse the environment and dual-world switching on the fly, which can get tedious. The game has the decency to (usually) not kill you when you fail (it just puts you back on a platform to try again), but it can get frustrating, especially as the controls can screw you over. Same goes for some combat arenas, the design of which can be especially asinine (I'm looking at you, bombs).

Lastly, as beautiful as the game is, it's perfectly possible to lose track of the player character when there are too many enemies on-screen or even during boss battles. The final boss, for example, has a very easy to decipher pattern, but took me way too many tries because the screen got too busy to keep track of what was going on.

Having said all that, I really enjoyed Guacamelee! despite its shortcomings. I picked it up for free (I believe it was a Humble giveaway) and I'm so used to giveaways being utter trash, I was surprised with the level of quality on display here. I'll definitely be picking up the sequel next chance I get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361137972', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 1808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1808, 'last_played': 1565975342}
review:
強烈墨西哥風味的類惡魔城遊戲。

一開始只有跳躍和普通攻擊，
隨著闖關進程可以獲得多種技能，
從而做出爽快的連段，
同時關卡跳台的難度逐步上升，
探索地圖的隱藏寶箱來增強自己也是玩點之一。

如果只是簡單難度普通結局通關，
那麼可能會覺得有些容易，
直到去收集面具碎片和挑戰房金牌，
才會發現又是另一個層級。

相當適合有挑戰精神、有耐心和喜愛橫版的人接觸，
手殘黨又想要全成就者，
可能就要好好考慮了。
