author: {'steamid': '76561198120331550', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1565222821}
review:
Overall a good Metroidvania with unique visuals, Mexican culture, and excellent music themes throughout the experience.  Combat feels very rewarding while you find new ways to string long combos on enemies and being able to dodge at any time keeps fights fast and engaging.  Despite the game's content primarily being fighting it never felt too gratuitous due to the various platforming and side-quest objectives sprinkled about.  

While I appreciated the fact that each area displays it's own separate completion rating of 0%-100% there were times where I felt the unexplored secret areas could have been vaguely shown on the map screen better.  The colored blocks were shown on the map very clearly while narrow tunnels are practically invisible.  Save/Warp icons on the map also caused me to miss progression / secret areas due to the game occasionally placing branching paths near them. 

The difficulty of the game is very easy overall, deaths only reset your progress to a 1 minute progression loss at most, auto-save locations are found on practically every facet of the map + fill your health back to max. Hard mode does a decent job at encouraging a second playthrough of the game.  I appreciated the extra care that went into bosses in that all of them (save from the final boss) play differently in various ways.  The earlier parts of the game are practically the same as normal mode until it ramps up near the end.

Had fun with this and would recommend it as a good starting point for those looking to get into Metroidvanias.   Guacamelee does a good job with it's short and legible map layouts that tells you all you need to know about a level, constant progression via ability unlocks, and very fast loading screens.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271916016', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 686, 'last_played': 1563469098}
review:
Guacamelee is an extremely stylistic Metroidvania game and It’s great. This game highlights the beauty of Mexican culture so absolutely well in it’s Aztec/Mayan Style of art, clever cultural integrations (Olmec heads as teleporters), and most prominently to me the Soundtrack. Holy shit if you like Mexican music you’ll love this game - very unique twists using D minor in the soundtrack as well. The art design may not be for some though, and is overall simplistic. This game also features a LOT of references to other games which are really fun to find and read.

The game features an ability to swap between the world of the living and the dead which in turn changes the ENTIRE surrounding areas with incredible attention to detail to both art AND sound design. This combined with the other abilities creates some pretty unique puzzles and timing obstacles. However, a few rooms simply don’t have a world of the dead version and thus force you back into the real world. Animations can be a bit unnatural when this happens as well as with ability use near odd geometry, but it’s a decently old game so It makes sense.

Combat is incredibly combo based and really fun to mess around with. There are a multitude of ways to beat up and manipulate your enemies and furthermore manage your intenso bar. The major complaint here are the boss fights. In all honesty they felt extremely drawn out and unfitting to fight. Enemies range from annoying to extremely annoying, which ultimately adds to the pleasure of beating them up like a luchador.

There are a decent amount of collectibles to find and costumes/upgrades to buy, as well as steam workshop integration so you can import your own skins if you want to. Guacamelee does have a simple but charming story and as well as local co-op integration. NPC dialogue is also pretty funny at certain moments.

Guacamelee is the Mexican Metroidvania nobody asked for and I love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198957495487', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 12307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 567, 'last_played': 1591091881}
review:
AYNI YEMEK, AYNI TABAK, AYNI MASA AMA SUNUM FARKLI

Oyun için çok fazla yorum yapmaya gerek yok çünkü bu bu oyuna yorum yapmak bile oyun gibi yorucu. Zaten başlıkta da kısa bir özet geçtim sayılır. Piyasada ki benzeri tüm Metrodivania oyunları gibi cıvıl cıvıl, kolay ve sürükleyici başlıyor GUACAMELEE! Sonrasında ise ilerledikçe hem kendi psikopata bağlıyor (karakter değil oyundan bahsediyorum) hem de sizi psikopata bağlayıp delirmenize neden olacak kadar zorlaşıyor. O yüzden Oyun bu tarz zor oyun severler dışında kimseye önerebileceğim bir oyun değil. (Bu arada zor derken öyle böyle değil. Hile ile bile ölüyorsunuz o derece zor) Bu türün manyakları alsın oynasın geri kalan kısım kafa dinginliği daha çok bulmaca ve araştırma filan falan tadında, şöyle iki dakika kafamı dağıtayım minvalinde bir şey arıyorsa arkasına bakmadan kaçsın. Oyun zor aga yani ona göre vaziyet alın sonra yok ben bilmiyordum filan olmasın. Ben para vermedim o yüzden içim rahat ama para vermeyi düşünenler ona göre bir daha düşünsün. Sonra 2 saati geçtikten sonra vay anam iade de edemiyoruz filan moduna girmeyin benden söylemesi. 

+ Klasik platform öğeleri ama zor olanlarından.
+ Müzikler.
+ Hızlı ve aksiyon dolu içerik

- Oyun zor hemde size ebenizin hayatını sorgulatacak kadar.
- Klasik Metrodivania oyun türünün benzeri içerikler.
- İnsan üstü refleksler gerektirmesi.
- Klavye ile oynaması zor.
- Sadece zor oyun sever oyuncu kısmına hitap ediyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120376622', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1564996753}
review: 游戏内手柄串键，没法玩，画质手感都很不怎么样。白送都不要

author: {'steamid': '76561198042724897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 674, 'last_played': 1564968876}
review:
Paltamelee, aunque no ponga nada nuevo sobre la mesa, es un juego que no creía que me iba a divertir, parte de la premisa es ser un tipico metroid-vania, tiene de todos los cliches del genero, pero el videojuego se los toma con un sentido del humor como ningun otro, debo de admitir que algunas veces me saco una sonrisa, pero encuentro que donde el juego donde mas brilla es en el sistema de combate, que es bien simple, un boton para atacar y otro para hacer especiales, ademas de otro dedicado para agarrar a los enemigos, y lo satisfactorio es que puedes combinar todo esto para hacer combos, que aunque no llega a ser un hack and slash al uso, es increiblemente satisfactorio, tambien la disposicion del espacio y los enemigos ayuda, cada uno tiene distintos ataques y cuando se juntan es cuando sale a relucir todo lo anteriormente mencionando, que es bien, lo unico malo es que el juego tiene un problema al esquivar los ataques, no parece que funcione bien y varias veces piensas que vas a lograr esquivar un ataque pero al final los enemigos igual te atacan y algunos ataques de los enemigos, sobretodo los mas pequeños, no estan bien telegrafiados o no se notan, siendo a veces imposible verlos atacar.

La parte de metroidvania no es la mejor, y es donde digo que hubiera sido mejor una aventura lineal que lo que acabo siendo, lo mismo que digo con ori, no es muy agradable hacer "backtracking" cuando tus escenarios son bien lineales, y eso es lo que me desanima en sacar todos los secretos, ademas que los lugares en donde te puedes teletransportar en cada parte del mapa central estan tan alejados, que tienes que pasar por todas una serie de obstaculos que ya haz pasado por n veces para poder llegar a ellos, y aun así no sirven de mucho porque solo hay un punto para teletransportate en cada mapa, y como los mapas son increiblemente largos,  hubiera faltado si pusieran mas de estos puntos para que sea menos frustrante (Al menor en ori eran concientes de ellos y se podia). Tambien decir que es de los metroidvanias mas basicos que he jugado, lo que quiero decir es que son demasiado obvios donde estan los secretos, que no es malo, a mi no me gusta que el genero haga lo contrario y muchas veces los secretos son demasiado dificil de ver, pero aca te lo muestran practicamente en la cara y se pierde eso.

Si mas un juego regular, pero bueno, [i]tiene un poco pa' todos 9/10[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198914684552', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1676815774}

author: {'steamid': '76561198129961090', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1554231103}
review: juego Metroidvania, con una historia que cumple, habilidades bien integradas en el transcurso del juego, uno de los combates mas satisfactorios y divertidos que he probado, contenido post game y rejugabilidad gracias a la dificultad dificil, desbloqueada al pasarse el juego por primera vez. Sin embargo la historia no dura mucho, alrededor de unas 8 horas. Visualmente se ve muy bien y tiene buena banda sonora, un monton de referencias a otros juegos y por si fuera poco tiene un workshop que permite cambiarle el traje y las animaciones a nuestro personaje. desde Lara Croft hasta spiderman, pasando por samus e incluse el heavy de tf2.   recomendado sobretodo en oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031888186', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1564873260}
review:
Very very repetitive gameplay. Hit man, use Y to combo him into other man. Rinse and repeat for the entire game. You can change character in the game which was fun until I found out that the other chracter can't get past certain parts of the game like the other character can. This means if you dare play with a friend they have to quit out the game once they reach certain parts as their character physical can not get past certain parts of the levels.

Poor design. Wack

Wish I could get a refund of the time spent in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050245307', 'num_games_owned': 188, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2597, 'last_played': 1564764762}
review: Very cool game with a very long name. It's filled with action, fighting (duh) and environmental riddles. I liked the humour- from the dialogues to the various chickens, not to mention the posters with wacky versions of Mario Brothers, Goat Simulator and Castle Crashers to name a few. It was very relaxing up to the Tule Tree hidden mask bit, that wasted a LOT of my nerves, and then came the one with disappearing platforms with was the opposite of fun. The hard mode was cool, difficult but fair, apart from the part when you escape from lava- that was unnecessarily irritating. Overall the game is good, even better if you play it with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198415918217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1343, 'last_played': 1690740975}
review:
Если вы фанат мексиканской культуры как я то покупайте СЕЙЧАС, а для остальных слушайте.
Guacamelee! это ЛУЧШАЯ метроидвания в которою я играл, головоломки и загадки крутые, боссы это просто $ex, сюжет неплохой но можно и лучше, а музыка О-О-О музыка тут ахуенная и заводная +всегда хорошо подобрана под ситуацию и тут дофига всяких пасхалок и рофлов примером могу дать QR-код который после расшифровки выдаёт текст "Поздравляю ты разгадал наш QR-код! Молодец!" прикол прикольный и таких как он много и я советую остальные найти самим.
Определённо от меня это детище получает 12 из 10 вот бы ещё кооператив по сети бы сделали цены бы игре не было!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009217675', 'num_games_owned': 938, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 953, 'last_played': 1564592414}
review:
Mucho Fun. Das Spiel ist mit jede Menge Humor gespickt. 
Mal sind es Anspielungen an andere Spiele, mal ist es einfach ihr eigener Humor.
Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist optimal (sowohl auf Normal als auch auf Schwer) und man hat nicht das Gefühl, das sich die "levels" oder die Bereiche in die Länge ziehen.
Auch ist die Kombination aus verschiedenen Skills (die man freischaltet) und den paar Upgrades gut gelungen.

Von mir auf jedenfall eine Empfehlung 

P.S. die 100% achievements sind auch machbar (bei mir mit ca. 15 stunden)

author: {'steamid': '76561198102945378', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1564431521}
review:
OK... I hate "fighter" games like FIST FIGHTER and MORTAL COMBAT and such.  Basically, this is one of those.  I got it free from HUMBLE BUNDLE so I thought I'd try it.  I tried.  I'm done.


Don't get me wrong, it's kinda cute is some ways.  There is some kind of story line, but I just couldn't get into it. 

The soundtrack is good, and I'll listen to it....probably.... Maybe while I play WOLFENSTEIN or SERIOUS SAM or DUKE NUK'EM or something.....or .... maybe I won't.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198049022399', 'num_games_owned': 291, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 1072, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1564882694}
review:
真的是很棒的墨西哥亡靈風格 2D 橫向卷軸 & 類銀河城遊戲
風格相當相當強烈，生與死的世界可自由切換
操作性和音樂都極度優秀
難度中間偏難，其實難是難在平台的跳躍
但跳失敗後的重生點很近，存檔點又很多
有很密集的時間可以練習跳躍
不收集隱藏要素的話，其實順順過是不難的
至於 BOSS，只要死個幾次都知道怎麼過了
以怪物來講，後期比較難的反倒是在被小怪圍毆

硬要說缺點的話，就是沒繁中囉 :P
喜歡類銀河城的人，不要錯過這一款了，非常推薦一玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198063940958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1564323702}
review: fortuna che l'ho trovato gratis, mi aspettavo un troiaio non troppo immenso ma abbastanza divertente e le mie aspettative non sono state deluse, a parte il fatto che a volte i controlli fanno pena e ci sono decisamente troppi comandi di cui tenere di conto. Avversari programmati appositamente per darti eccessivamente fastidio più che una sfida vera e propria il che rende il gioco noioso ed inutilmente frustrante nonostante sia facilissimo, livelli alla fine tutti uguali con trappole ed ostacoli messi per complicarti la vita, solito discorso come per gli avversari, un gioco che lascia il tempo che trova, non mi ha trasmesso niente, i poteri che sblocchi sono fighi è vero, con nomi simpatici e citazioni buttate li a caso. Su una scala da 1 a 10 questo merita un bel 3

author: {'steamid': '76561198055328789', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1546456547}

author: {'steamid': '76561198162044669', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1389, 'last_played': 1564231015}
review:
愿望单里放了挺久了，没想到犹豫就会白给！17小时普通模式通关纪念。好多时间花在全收集上，其实拿了6个面具碎片鸡形态会飞以后再回去收集会省事很多。
美术音乐和设定都很墨西哥，尽管老游戏无官中，除了偶尔出现的西班牙语让人费解外，英语文本并不难理解，可能四六级词汇量就行。
熟悉操作后普通模式下的敌人并不难，让我觉得有点难打的只有三头六臂的乐队BOSS和他开发的捶地猩猩（狭窄地形限定），最终BOSS如果不是要穿大菠萝皮肤做成就的也不是很难。游戏过程中最难的反而是地狱挑战全金和面具碎片收集。
特技里前B和↑+B带位移和击倒，比较常用，B能击飞，可以配合地形杀怪。投技抓取敌人后有几秒无敌时间，最实用的是后B和↓+B，都带震地击倒效果，下B伤害较高，后B则是震地范围非常广，是非常屌的控制技，对付仙人掌、飞行/钻地/远程/会闪避的怪和密集敌人有奇效。玩的时候经常忘记开INTENSO形态，虽然开了以后伤害超高但感觉就是玩割草，更多时候还是习惯普通形态战斗。
全成就只差一个，有时间再来通困难模式。

author: {'steamid': '76561198133064811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1564698576}
review:
[b] Jeu très fortement sympathique, je l'ai eu avec une clef au hasard dans un bundle, j'ai été très agréablement surpris du contenu du jeu.
Un bon jeu de plateforme style "Metroidvania" un gameplay agréable, avec des possibilités de combo assez basique et satisfaisant, une difficulté simple et pas trop dosée.
Des musiques mexicaines assez bien travaillés.
Une histoire bien que simple, mais qui reste sympathique.
Un workshop assez intelligent mais assez pauvre malheureusement. [/b]

[b] On reconnaitra assez facilement que les développeurs sont fan de [u]Nintendo[/u], avec beaucoup de clins d'oeils sur [u]Zelda: Majora's Mask[/u] et [u]Metroid[/u]. [/b]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1799690311
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1816420209

[h1] En bref, un très bon jeu ! [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198296532992', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1577832697}
review:
Es un juego 2D con temática mexicana, comenzaré con su historia, no es tan larga y tampoco tan corta, entretiene al jugador con saber que pasará después, además de tener pequeñas misiones secundarias que se necesitan de las habilidades que se obtienen al progresar la historia, el villano es bastante caótico que siempre tiene a su grupo que te hará difícil tu viaje; la jugabilidad es  intuitiva, por lo que si fallas, ya es tu culpa. Los gráficos son coloridos tanto en el mundo de los vivos como en el de los muertos, puedes interactuar con personajes secundarios, como las personas en el pueblo, patear gallinas :v, etc.
Es un buen juego, tiene el modo cooperativo de hasta 4 personas creo o 2 eran :v para pasar el modo historia y derrotar a los jefes, más al jefe final, que esta mamadisimo :v 
Creo que tiene un modo multijugador local para jugar en compañia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198348748655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 842, 'last_played': 1563506693}
review:
En general me gusto el juego, su apartado gráfico es lo más destacable que tiene. Todo lo demás esta bien en la mayoría de los casos.
Lo único que marcaría como fallo es el control, que en ocasiones no termina de ejecutar bien un combo (aunque esto bien podría ser cosa mía), pues lee el movimiento anterior del joystick y causa ciertos problemas al realizar la misión de ejecutar combos determinados.
Pero como mencione, en general esta bien, el combate es entretenido, no es difícil encontrar la mayoría de los coleccionables y tiene multijugador para echar un rato con amigos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206043315', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1563384835}
review:
Вы служили в армии? Если нет то я безумно рад за вас. И вы скорее всегда сомнительно поймете то, что я хочу изложить в своем обзоре. Мне выпала честь служить в рядах нашей доблестной военной структуре. Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition - это комбат/комдив/дежурный офицер от мира видео игр. Играя в нее, я вспомнил год службы. Так меня со времен "отцов-командиров" никто не дрочил. А весь игровой процесс это самая настоящая ДРОЧЬ. Нет, она не сложна, как вам хотелось бы думать. Есть огромное количество игр, которые именно сложны, приятно сложны, неприятно сложны, но их всех объединяет то, что игроку либо с улыбкой, либо скрепя зубами хочется пройти дальше, преодолеть те испытания и вызов, что кидает тебе игра. Я прошел множество игр такого жанра. Я вообще обожаю 2D игры, с пикселями и видом сбоку. И это по моему личному мнению, самая худшая 2D игра, что мне приходилось играть. Она просто дрочит вас, на каждом этапе своего продвижения примерно начиная с середины. К слову сказать она дико затянута. Такой безыдейности я давненько не видел. В нормальной игре, у вас есть какие-то попытки, жизни и так далее. Так вот тут этого нет. Если вы провалите прыжок, вас убьет враг или произойдет всплеск вашей криворукости, вас кинет на контрольную точку или если жизней не осталось, в самое начало уровня. Тут вы просто через несколько секунд в худшем случае возродитесь в двух шагах от того места где вы погибли, а в особо частых случаях просто вас ПЕРЕНЕСЕТ с помощью анимации на то место откуда вы упали(Это что касается платформерной составляющей). Вы просто не можете проиграть. По факту вы бессмертны. Даже боссы тут так же устроены. Снесли боссу половину жизней и умерли? Вы мало того, что воскресните рядом с ним, дак и жизней у него останется половина и соответственно фаза босса будет та же. Тогда вы зададитесь вопросом, чего я тут так горю? А потому что та самая дрочь начинается с этого момента. 
- Прыжки и управление просто нереально тупорылые и максимально неудобные. Вы постоянно будите проваливать их, до тех пор пока ваши пальцы не вывернуться и вы каким то чудом не сделайте то, что требуют от вас. И после этого вас сразу же будет ждать еще более сложный пируэт. 
- Враги тут после середины игры просто навалены кучами. У них нет каких то уязвимых мест, какой то тактики против них нет. Вас просто давят числом, при этом у большей их части есть атаки на расстоянии или просто атаки, сносящие четверть здоровья, а у вас перекат от всего этого, который работает через раз.
- Прокачка ни на что толком не влияет. Самое полезное тут это здоровье и шкала выносливости, чтобы можно было делать специальные приемы. И тут вы спросите меня, ну как же? Вот и спецприемы завезли, уже разнообразие. А я вам скажу, что попасть ими крайне сложно, и их очень легко сбить. Пока вы будите бить приемом одного монстра, вас со спины уже будут атаковать трое, сбивая вам каст, и накидывая вам урон из другого измерения (Это следующий пункт). Погоды эти приемы не делают и усилить свою атаку, или атаку приемами, нельзя. Есть в игре еще захват, чтобы бросить, но возможность схватить, появляется у самых слабых и мелких монстров, которые и с рукопашной атаки умирают и проблем не доставляют. 
- Есть в игре несколько измерений. Позже между ними в процессе игры можно будет переключаться. В зависимости от измерений открываются разные проходы, появляются стены которых не было и тому подобное. То же самое с врагами. Представьте ситуацию: Вы деретесь с двумя великанами, у которых огромное количество здоровья и удары сносящие вам треть ХП, а рядом в другом измерении, бегают еще штуки три обычных мобов, но крайне быстрых. И вот пока вы пытайтесь уворачиваться от огромных плюх, вас долбят в спину из другого измерения и при этом они неуязвимы. Чтобы их атаковать, нужно переключится между измерениями.....и сделать неуязвимыми двух гигантов со сплеш атакой)))
Все это проходится через н-ное количество попыток и нанервах до тех пор "Пока не получится"
- Ну и конечно боссы. Они тут сосут. Настолько легкие и неинтересные, что я даже не знаю как это описать. Разработчики хоть как-то пытались создать челендж наваливая им простых монстров в поддержку чтобы мешались по ногами. Но и это ситуацию не спасало.
Я могу много писать еще, но от этого игру резко не переработают и не доведут до ума. Есть ли у этой игры плюсы? Да. Юморное повествование. На этом все. Сюжет посредственный, музыка отвратительна и просто пытается пародировать мексиканские мотивы. Сама игра дико затянута. Вы всю игру собираете те самые вышеупомянутые спецприемы, а потом финальный босс. Я серьезно. Попутно вас кормят сюжетом. На этом все. Спасибо большое Humble Bundle, что раздавала ее бесплатно. Я был в свое время заинтересован и хотел приобрести за свои кровные. И на закуску, игру я не прошел. Дропнул на финальном уровне, не дойдя до конца последний час (А учитывая как тут любят затянуть, может быть и все четыре). А после просто снес с аккаунта. Это я вам говорю для того, чтобы вы понимали, насколько кривая и посредственная эта поделка. Всем мир.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999103262', 'num_games_owned': 687, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1562088606}
review:
No me malinterpretéis. Mi pulgar hacia abajo no significa que no sea buen juego, sino que no recomiendo jugarlo. La razón es sencilla: tampoco me parece bueno.

Hoy en día tenemos cientos de juegos a los que acceder fácilmente para jugar. Para mí los prioritarios son aquellos que tengan algo especial. Y Guacamelee para mí no lo ha tenido tras un par de horas de juego.

Hasta donde yo he visto, tenemos un metroidvania de manual: vas ganando habilidades que te van abriendo nuevos caminos en sitios por los que ya pasaste. Incluso algo que hemos visto en otros metroidvanias como es cambiar entre dos versiones del mundo a través de portales.

Viniendo de jugar a The Messenger, este me ha sabido a poco. Especialmente el combate, me ha parecido torpe en comparación con otros juegos similares como el mencionado The Messenger, Dust: An Elysian Tail o Outland (juego que tampoco me parece destacable, pero el control era bueno). Lo más destacable me ha parecido el aspectro gráfico y la ambientación en general. Pero tampoco me ha mantenido enganchado. Otros me enganchaban más por la historia.

Si te gustan los metroidvanias, adelante, este juego te va a gustar porque no hace nada mal. Para mí, el problema, es que tampoco hace nada especialmente bien.

author: {'steamid': '76561198395861366', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1563126783}
review:
Игра довольно-таки посредственная. Сюжет банальный ([spoiler]спасение возлюбленной из рук... барабанная дробь... злодея[/spoiler]), геймплей тоже ничем не удивит ([spoiler]бегай по однообразным локациям, бей, прыгай, да уворачивайся[/spoiler]). Игру даже не спасает мультиплеер, всё равно в итоге скучно, однотипно.

Игру всё-таки доиграл, надеясь, что концовка удивит, но нет. Персонажу не сопереживаешь, сцена после титров не задевает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131204289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 582, 'last_played': 1561211967}
review:
Full frontal chicken action!
You want a classic tale of heroes and princesses, of villains and henchmen but all the others have had too few body slams, pile drivers and headbuts in them? Then this is the game for you!
Hard but not unfair as you jump and run your way through Mexico and the land of the dead. 
The controlls are tight but you might want to buy a comfortable controller or your thumbs will start hurting.

Rated W for Woolie

author: {'steamid': '76561198092862237', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 1306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1306, 'last_played': 1561575455}
review:
Put on your mask and bring friends! 

Guacamelee! is a metroidvania action platforming video game developed and published by DrinkBox Studios.

On the Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead), evil skeleton named Carlos Calaca attacks the small village in Mexico and kidnaps El Presidente's Daughter, Lupita. You will play as Juan Aguacate, a simple agave farmer who now becomes a Luchador, with a task of saving her! 

Gameplay is a combination of metroidvania and brawlers. Like all of the games from metroidvania subgenre, Guacamelee has open and non-linear world you can fully explore. Obviously some of the areas are not available at first and you need to progress before entering them, to keep the difficulty and progression system on track! In those areas you can progress in storyline, or start looking for secrets, yet it is better to do that later when you have decent amount of skills. Secrets vary from stamina/health increase, to chests with coins. It's fun to collect them, and they really help you! 

Game has a ton of platformic elements. At first it might look simple enough, as you just have to jump from ledge to ledge, but later on as more abilities are gained, you use them to boost your jumps, wallrun, double jump, dodge specific objects, the usual when it comes to those types of games, so it's not for everyone. 
Coordination is required, and for some, a controller aswell. There is a reason game recommends a controller everytime you launch it. It simply offers better mapping of combos you need to perform, and smaller chance of missing specific buttons because of stress. It's easier to hit bumps and triggers rather than small keys. But it dosen't mean it's impossible to beat it! Look at me, I played the damn thing on keyboard and my fingers are mostly fine, can't say that about mental health so better pick a controller to avoid frustration. 

Combat has same difficulty curve as platforming. At first, enemies are pretty weak and feature two or three types only, you can easily dodge their attacks and defeat them. As you progress, game adds shields, attacks you can't dodge, bigger and tougher enemies, and so on.
Enemies drop coins after being defeated, health orbs to regenerate health!
Because you are a Luchador, there is a ton of combos you can perform, like in most of the brawler games. Throw enemies in the air, combine abilties, avoid attacks!

Abilities you collect are used everywhere. Need to climb onto something? Destroy a specific block or shield? It requires a specific ability. To use them, you need to have stamina, if you run out of it, just wait few seconds and it will recharge! 
Same can't be said about health, to recharge it you either need to hit a checkpoint, or you need to collect health orbs. 

Checkpoints in the game are also shops, in which you can spend coins you collected. Game features two types of those-normal coins are used to upgrade Juan and his skills and silver coins, used to buy costumes, those change the way you look (duh) but also have pros and cons. Regenerate slowly health, but regenerate slower stamina? Deal, yet take more damage
at the same time? It's your choice which costume you will pick!

You need help? Ask a friend to play with you! Game features coop for 4 players, but if I recall, it's only local and you need, obviously, 3 other controllers.
Besides coop you also have Hard Mode, which as name suggest, increases difficulty of the game. And while I didn't notice improved platformic difficulty, fights are definitely harder, with enemies packing a punch. 

It's optimized very well, I had no issues when playing so I can't really complain, can I. 

Because it is set in Mexico, soundtrack composed by Rom Di Prisco and Peter Chapman is filled with traditional Mexican music. It really adds to the game, I loved it! And you can focus on it even more as there is no voice acting in the game. 

Relentless yet enjoyable combat, great platforming gameplay, and fantastic soundtrack, Guacamelee is a must play for metroidvania fans! A bit short. 8/10! 

If you enjoyed reading that review, check out [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/31947302/] my curator page! [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561197991524842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 610, 'last_played': 1562877872}
review:
This game definitely has its moments. If you like platformer-metroidvanias, and don't mind punishing difficulty and a more linear experience, this game does have some clever puzzles, interesting combat, and eccentric characters.

Overall, I can't recommend this game because of issues with its controls and difficulty, which drain the fun from what would be an otherwise light and well-paced game.

Probably the first thing you'll notice, is that the player character has binary movement. Either he's sprinting, or he's standing still.  The result is that your control of the character feels imprecise. This isn't a great start for a game that is at least 50% platforming.

The second thing you may notice, is that the inputs seem sluggish. Timing jumps or attacks starts to become very frustrating, since you'll have to do every action what feels like 1/3 of a second in advance, because the game can't keep up. Eventually you get used to it, but this is one of the only games I've experienced this problem with. Tack on overly punitive hit boxes on hazards like spikes, and you'll really start to grind your teeth.

Lastly is the difficulty. The two above factors wouldn't be such a issue if the difficulty of the game wasn't tuned so tightly. By tight, I mean that around 20% of the puzzles in the game are basically tuned with no margin for error. You execute them exactly as the designers intended, or you fail and start over. Each puzzle still feels like it could have been good, but either the timing is too tight, or the number of steps is too many. The result, is that frequently you can complete 90% of the puzzle flawlessly, but you'll end up smashing your face on it repeatedly trying to get though that last 10% over and over. It's not fun, its just tedious and frustrating. Each of these puzzles comes down to rote-memorization and luck, and eventually you'll get through. Some of the combat challenges also suffer from this, but it doesn't really become an issue until near the end of the game.

Overall, while the game doesn't do anything new for the genre, it is well paced and fun for the most-part. If the controls issues and incredibly punishing 10% of the game were removed, I'd be off enjoying it and not sitting here writing this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142094234', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1646075465}

author: {'steamid': '76561198394119277', 'num_games_owned': 123, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1547, 'last_played': 1617384285}
review:
¡Obra de arte!
Este juego me ha encantado tanto que voy lo estoy completando por 4º vez.

Los gráficos son geniales, el gameplay está bien conseguido, el ambiente del juego está muy bien currado. Y la acción del juego es brutal, es una mezcla entre un juego de plataformas y peleas (género que me gusta mucho).

También es genial como puedes ir adquiriendo habilidades nuevas en la tienda y desbloquear nuevo movimientos de lucha durante el transcurso de la historia para realizar un combo más grande y devastador para los seres malvados.

Para aquellos que sean "hardcore", deberían iniciar la historia en modo difícil y pasarse por la ubicación "El infierno", vais a encontrar desafíos que ponen a prueba las habilidades del jugador en ciertas situaciones, al extremo.

9/10
Recomendado jugarlo. Si piensas jugarlo, dale una oportunidad y juega una hora. Te engancharás.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112084909', 'num_games_owned': 1232, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1116, 'last_played': 1562803965}
review: It has a cool story, cool gameplay and amazing art. From the middle to the end, the levels require that you use a lot of "mechanics" and timing to move foward. I found that a little bit too hard for normal difficulty as I expected to be more of a "I'm just casually killing stuff to see how the story unfolds" difficulty. However, nothing that someone as slow as myself can't do after a few tries, to think about the solution and to learn the enemy's patterns. Good game overall and certainly worth its price in full.

author: {'steamid': '76561198242978414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 4132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2608, 'last_played': 1563132663}
review:
Достаточно интересный платформер, в нем присутствует юмор с продвижением по игре очень быстро растёт и сложность самой игры, чем больше у вас способностей, тем более сложно вам двигаться дальше (но это конечно не тёмные души, все ведь любят сравнивать хоть немножко сложные игры с этой игрой), а если вы попробуете собрать всё что есть в игре, то вас ждут долгие часы геймплея (на моё время игры особо не ориентируйтесь, я люблю отойти от пк не выключая игру, могу на пол дня так оставить).
 У меня есть вопрос который не касаеться игры. Где мои карточки? Это только у меня так? Это у всех игроков которые получили игру на халяву? Или так у всех?

author: {'steamid': '76561198394732752', 'num_games_owned': 182, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 2148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 911, 'last_played': 1567382425}
review:
This is a Platventure, but the hook is that you have Fighter moves as both attacks and ways to reach new areas.  It starts out simple enough, and does a very good job of easing you into new moves and what to do with them.  That said, it gets to be quite challenging by the end, especially if you're trying to grab all of the game's treasures.  This leads to some really cheap moments, and some of the move inputs clash a bit with general design, so there is the occasional frustration.  The combat gradually gets harder, too, especially if you're trying to rack up big combos.  Though the time between hits is very forgiving, and you can get extra hit bonuses for killing enemies or hitting them with special moves, take one hit and your combo ends.  Luckily, they're mostly for personal gratification, and if they do increase the amount of money that you receive - I didn't take notice - it doesn't matter much, because you'll likely have enough to buy all of the upgrades by the end, so long as you're diligent.

Beyond the dynamic combat and clever puzzles, what stands out is the Mexican theme.  It's not too often that you see this in a game, and they did a great job with it.  The way that it's presented is a good way to really get interested in the culture, even if it's not exactly educational; over the few days I played this, I kept subconsciously slipping in and out of Spanish, without being overly tired or stressed.  The music helps with this, too, because it's traditional music that's been remixed to give it an exciting new feel.  The visuals are neat, too, starting out with the usual yellowy desert, but getting into some mysterious ruins, and a whole other world, where all sorts of strange visual phenomena come out to bloom.

The humor's a little hit-or miss, unfortunately.  It's a pretty funny game, overall, and when a joke lands, its over-the-top presentation really makes it pop; by the end, I was still chuckling every time I got a new ability.  A lot of it, though, is semi-funny, but mostly pop culture references (the majority of which are to video games) that don't make any sense here.  Sure, with the luchador theme, a Strong Bad reference makes sense, but there's a broken wall with exposed bricks in the shape of a Mega Man sprite at one point.  Every once in a while, they're funny, just because they come out of nowhere, smack you upside the head, and fly off into the distance before you even figured out what happened, but there are so many that they start to just seem out of place.

All in all, a few unreasonable expectations aside, there isn't anything wrong with it; if you're looking for a fresh, new experience, and don't mind a challenge that's especially high for this subgenre, then give this a go!

author: {'steamid': '76561198287698045', 'num_games_owned': 756, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2447, 'last_played': 1708198733}
review:
-Guacamelee es un plataformero al estilo Metroidvania con muchísimas referencias a memes, otros videojuegos, cine, arte; entre otros. De hecho, su argumento en sí es una de ellas.

-Es único en el género por sus mecánicas (aunque es verdad que un poco molestas si se juega con teclado) bien trabajadas y que serán necesarias para desbloquear cada uno de los cofres y secretos que se encuentran en los mapas. Además de ello, funcionan a la perfección porque ninguna se queda obsoleta a medida que se avanza.

-Los logros suponen una dificultad moderada, pero es bastante satisfactorio obtener cada uno de ellos luego de algunas frustraciones en el infierno. 

-La historia se queda algo corta, que es el único inconveniente que le encuentro a este título.

Por eso, y por todo lo demás que deberás descubrir, recomiendo comprarlo sí o sí (aunque lo obtuve gratis), pues se merece cada centavo de lo que cuesta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355006901', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1555705668}
review: As much as people say this is a metroidvania, it doesn't feel like it. The level design consists of this block is yellow so you can't go there yet. When you play through it feels linear with a hub to divert the paths. It doesn't feel like you accomplish anything once you move on. Not to mention there isn't really a need for the collectables. They're all split up so there's no immediate reward when you get a collectable, not to mention its mostly just health that matters. In Metroid the collectables are fun to collect for the final boss, so that you can just wail away, throwing everything you've got, while not having to pay much attention to your health. Collectables just don't have that use and/or feel in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049216736', 'num_games_owned': 989, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 430, 'last_played': 1562596230}
review:
It's a good game.
There were some super frustrating fights.
Design lacked a bit in the final chapter, it felt more like spam of hardest enemies than anything else.
Boss fights were okay. Some were really annoying sometimes, due to RNG elements. However they gradually increased in difficulty and were enjoyable. 

I kept getting new abilities to the very end of the game, which is always amazing. The  game kept utilizing these new abilities in mini platforming puzzles. Small sections with no enemies that require utilizing your special abilities to pass. They were often hard at first, but always had a logical solution that you would get after a couple of tries. Or a dozen more tries :P 

But in general it's an amazing game with awesome humor and cool style. It lasts about 5-6 hours on normal mode and it has a lot of hidden content that you can explore.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994824233', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 1031, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 918, 'last_played': 1562552641}
review:
Bunu almayın, Gold Edition'ı alın.

Guacamelee Gold Edition zorluğuna rağmen müzikleri, bulmacaları ve güreş mekanikleriyle çok eğlenceli bir oyundu. Düşmanları olsun, ana karakteri olsun, hikâyesi ve Meksika kültürüyle yoğrulmuş evreni olsun, gerçekten de güzeldi.

AMA...  Super Turbo Championship Edition maalesef tüm bu güzellikleri çok gereksiz eklentilerle bozmuş. Bu sürümde Gold Edition'da olmayan birkaç yeni bölge var. Ancak hiçbiri oyuna herhangi bir derinlik katmadığı gibi yolunuzu gereksiz yere uzatmaktan başka bir işe de yaramıyorlar. Oyundaki diğer bölgelerden daha sönük ve kopuklar. Ekstradan yeni bir boss savaşı da var. Ama kendisi hem karakter hem de bölüm sonu canavarı olarak diğerlerinden çok zayıf kalıyor.

Super Turbo Championship Edition'da bir de "Intenso" adlı yeni bir yeteneğimiz var. Bu gücü aktifleştirdiğimizde bir nevi "süpermen" oluyoruz. Bu da dövüşlerin ve düşmanların tüm eğlencesini kaçırıyor. 

Ama en kötüsü iyi sonu görebilmek için toplamamız gereken maske parçalarının sonuncusunun yerini değiştirmeleri. Normalde maske parçaları oyundaki en zor ve gizli platform bölümlerinin sonunda çıkıyordu. Şimdiyse Cehennem'deki challenge odalarının hepsini altın madalyayla bitirmeniz isteniyor sizden. Ve bu tam bir saçmalık! Çünkü bunlar aşırı derecede zor. Hiç yumruk yemeden 200 kombo yap. Ölümcül tuzaklarla dolu bir odayı 25 saniyede geç. Tek vuruşluk canla yüzlerce güçlü düşmanla dövüş... İyi sonu görmek istiyorsanız bu görevleri altın madalya alarak bitirmek ZORUNDASINIZ.

Bu challenge görevlerinin hepsi Gold Edition'da da vardı. Ama yapmaya mecbur değildik. Opsiyonel görevlerdi. Şimdiyse mecburi. Ve bu durum zaten zor olan oyunun eğlencesini tamamen kaçırıyor ve iyi sonu görme şansınızı hepten azaltıyor. Hele benim gibi zaman kısıtlı challenge'ları sevmiyorsanız yandınız.

Kısacası siz siz olun, Guacamelee'yi oynamak istiyorsanız Gold Edition'ı alın, bunu değil.

[quote]Daha fazla incelememe göz atmak isterseniz Steam Küratör sayfamı ziyaret edebilirsiniz: [b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39265984/]Pikselatör[/url][/b][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198861883967', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 718, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1561843755}
review:
[h1] [b](ツ)_/¯[/b] Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition [/h1]
[code]                                Recenzja stworzona przez [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/maxiisteam/] Maxi [/url][/code]
Bardzo dobra oraz wciągająca platformówka, gdzie wcielamy się w Juana Aguacate by uratować swoją własną córkę z rąk szkieletora.

Mamy dostępne wiele poziomów, gdzie poruszamy się poznając nowe techniki walki. Stajemy do boju z przeróżnymi przeciwnikami, wykonujemy wiele zadań pobocznych i szukamy skarbów.

W grze mamy bardzo dobry soundtrack, który idealnie pasuje do klimatu gry. Polecam jak najbardziej zagrać. [list]
    [*] Jeśli uważasz, że moja recenzja jest przydatna zostaw pozytywną ocenę
    [*] Więcej recenzji znajdziesz u mnie na profilu
 [/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198256034506', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1563529252}
review:
Guacamelee is an awesome game. It has a fancy art and creative worlds.
Here is a small overview with [b] Pro [/b] and [b] Contra [/b]

Pro:
+ Creative world
+ Awesome game mechanic
+ Funny and Colorful Artstyle
+ Funny and long Story
+ Many levels

Contra:
- Sometimes you dont know where to go / what to do
- Some jumps are too difficult

At least this is a funny game and i recommend it to everyone who likes 2D platformers with a comic art style.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151676940', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1523, 'last_played': 1635611722}

author: {'steamid': '76561198364606363', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1563217822}
review: Recently a freebie, definitely an oldie but an absolute goodie. The controls can seem a little floaty but you soon become accustomed to the mechanics. This stands alongside Shadow Complex as one of my favourite Metroidvania titles, Guacamelee is an outstanding platformer boasting a simply yet charming story, sublime soundtrack and outstanding art direction. Unquestionably a (relatively) modern classic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198809213398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1562511280}
review:
ulan ben bu oyununda emeği geçen herkesin var ya şimdi çok fena sövecem ha. 5-6 saattir oynuyorum aşırı aşırı zorlaşmaya başladı. öküz gibi hayvanat bahçesi gibi zorlaşmaya başladı. çıldırdım lan. o kadar çıldırdım ki bu oyuna olumsuz vermezsem gelip benim 7 ceddimi... dedim ve şimdi olumsuz u çakıyorum. lan keşke hiç beleş olmasaymış da gelmeseymiş kütüphaneme. sırf ismi uzun kütüphanede kötü görünüyor diye indirip bitireyim dedim yok alt f4 ü çekip geldim. yarın tekrar oynarım sinirlendirirse hiç uğraşmayacam çekecem yine alt f4 ü gerisini walkthrough dan izlerim. ayrıca yön bulma olayları da çok karışık. diyaloglar aşırı uzun ve gereksiz diyaloglar. bu arada alt f4 ü çekmeden önce o kadar çok tuş oldu ki artık rastgele basmaya başladım.  q mü basayım space e 2 kez mi basayım a ya mı basayım d ye mi basayım ne yapayım ulan uzak durun bu oyundan.

BUGÜN BİR ŞANS DAHA VERDİM. girdim oyuna. çıldıra çıldıra biraz ilerledim sonra yine alt f4 ü çektim. ben kolay kolay alt f4 çekmem ve bir oyunu bitirmek için elimden geleni yaparım ama yok yani bitirilecek gibi değil. geçmeniz gereken bir yeri nasıl bir kombo ile geçeceğinizi yazıyorum. ne kadar zor ve saçma olduğunu anlayın diye.

çift boşluk (üst üste olmayacak yoksa maksimum yüksekliğe ulaşamazsın) sonra shift ile sarmaşığı dodgelayan. sonra boşluk yukarı tuşu ve sağ tık. sonra d ye basarak duvarda tutulu kalacaksın ve bunu 3 defa yapacaksın hem de 1.5-2 saniye içerisinde. ulan insanda kafa kalmaz. robot muyuz biz lan hesaplayarak tam zamanında o kadar tuşa nasıl basacaz lan. bu sefer kaldırıyorum oyunu ve bir daha da oynamam...

bu arada 12.5 saat diyor da toplasan 7 saat falan oynamışımdır kalan saatler arka plandaydı.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321069902', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1562075372}
review: Guacamelee is a curiously entertaining and action packed game about a luchador coming back from the dead to rescue the president's daughter. He meets a slew of whacky and comical characters who will aid the luchador in his journey by either teaching him new abilities or guiding him to the right path. Although there is a linear and coherent story that anyone can understand the game itself is open to the player in a more semi metrovania styled open world game where some places require certain abilities and power ups while others don't. You could in theory go wherever you want from the very start although you won't go far. To my surprise I thought that the game would have to heavily rely on the gameplay which I expected to be the average metrovania type but in reality it has a nice balance of story and gameplay. The story being a wild adventure across the desert, rivers, and jungles to save the president's daughter all while facing off with other luchadors and criminals. There are side quests you can partake in but it's all optional in fact none of the ones I've played have really given me anything which is unfortunate because helping the local grandmother in town make her specialty was honestly fun enough to have warranted at least a stupid joke reward. For the gameplay I was pleasantly surprised with the combat; I like the grappling which admittedly I'd use a lot despite it not always being a reliable way to cause damage. I also found the combos interesting but they never really felt like I had to learn them in order to play and win it had always felt like I could just wing it but having the option is still nice. Although the achieving of these combos was rather annoying and cute. In order to learn combos you have to find a luchador chicken (which is just a regular chicken that can speak for some reason) to teach you using the skeleton of a dead luchador. It's hard to master and annoying just to unlock the entirety of a combo move of which I'll probably never use the entire sequence of if not never use it at all. The platforming can be just as difficult at times but thankfully they aren't too hard that it ruins the experience of the game I just think they went a bit too far with the things they expect you to be able to pull off. One thing I really enjoyed about the game was the inclusion of being able to play as a girl luchador to which I did and still am playing only as her. I love those inclusions because although I don't need it to enjoy the game I enjoy it a little more with the inclusion. Don't get me wrong I can play a game where your only playable character is a man but if I had to choose I'd choose a woman. Overall I feel that this game is worth the money it takes to play this game; whether you buy it on sale or simply buy it at full price. I enjoyed it and I know others will and others won't. It's a cute little game about whacky characters in a fantasy cartoon violence world filled to the brim with Mexican culture.

author: {'steamid': '76561198269207439', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1704857226}
review:
La verdad tengo un sentimentalismo con este juego desde hace mucho tiempo, puesto que tiempo atrás lo jugué y me encanto un montón su estética, gameplay y banda sonora pero como era pequeño lo deje porque me parecía demasiado complicado, tanto el reto que se me presentaba como el hecho de que no tenía mando en ese momento (el cual recomiendo), y pues siendo honestos admito que conseguí esta copia por un anuncio de humble bundle pero aún así pagaría las 2 veces que lo jugué de forma gratuita, un poco por la nostalgia y el otro por lo que ofrece, y en cuanto a lo que ofrece pues te puede durar como 8 o 9 horas si te lo quieres pasar recogiendo lo superficial claro, más unas cuantas misiones secundarías y logros de steam, y tampoco es que sea un juego excesivamente complicado, osea es lo suficientemente largo, desafiante, y lleno de cosas para descubrir como para que en mi opinión valga la pena comprarlo.

(Espero poder comprar el 2, le tengo un montón de ganas xD).

author: {'steamid': '76561198197688925', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 799, 'last_played': 1642210970}
review: Guacamelee is a metroidvania beat-em-up game.  It has a set path that is dictated by various abilities that are necessary for breaking different colored blocks.  The game play is simple but, as the combo teacher will teach you, it can get pretty intense and complex.  Personally, I went the easy way and relied on grappling, but each of my friends found their own play style.  Play styles can be further developed with the addition of various costumes which give buffs and debuffs like better throws but your punches deal less damage.  One of the greatest points, and weakness, of the game is the multiplayer function.  It is always amazing to finally find a game my siblings and I or my friends and I can play together without buying four copies.  However, with Guacamelee, the difficulty drops exponentially with the number of players in the game.  The enemies remain at the same strength and number whether you have one player or four.  This makes it more friendly to players who don't want to learn the 27 hit combos from the teacher but can be boring if you are that one hardcore gamer in the group.  Overall, I rate this a great 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072800980', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1563971819}
review:
Barevná, veselá, akční a zábavná bojová 2D skákačka. Vtipný příběh plný nekončícího bojování a rozmanitých chvatů proti velkému zástupu bossů a originálních nepřátel v krásně vykresleném světě, který si sám ze sebe dělá legraci. V této šílené plošinovce se dostáváte do role Luchadora – mexického zápasníka, který se snaží zachránit svoji milenku, která je unesena Calacou, aby byla obětována při rituálu, který by spojil svět mrtvých se světem živých. Vylepšování hlavního hrdiny, mnoho kostýmů s různými vlastnostmi a možnost cestování mezi světy živých a mrtvých, ve kterých se nachází nebezpečná džungle, živá města, krásný květinový kanál, starodávné chrámy anebo zuřící vulkány. Možnost lokálního multiplayeru. Doporučuji hrát s ovladačem.

Pro: Bojový systém, Barevnost, Příběh, Audiovizuální stránka, Humor

Proti: Žádné

review:
Guacamelee! nos ofrece una divertida aventura plataformera con un estilo visual unico. La jugabilidad al principio parece ser bastante simple pero a medida que avanzamos en el juego iremos aprendiendo nuevas habilidades para poder superar los niveles, combinando golpes con saltos coordinados para lograrlo. Muy recomendable.

Corre perfectamente en notebook AMD Ryzen con GPU integrada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198433215200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 623, 'last_played': 1587178823}
review: Es un juego corto pero cumple con entretener, ademas los movimientos del protagonista son muy originales, la historia es un poco cliché pero lo compensa con la jugabilidad que es muy divertida, en conclusión sí recomiendo este juego si estas aburrido y quieres jugar algo diferente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142361270', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2406, 'last_played': 1562302927}
review: Поначалу игра не сильно цепляля. Хоть было много приятных пасхалок, сам сэттинг дня мёртвых отталкивал. Но мне хотелось им проникнуться, и тогда я посмотрел 2 мультфильма: Книга и жизни и Тайна Коко. Если первый был неплох, второй оказался очень хорош. Этого хватило, чтобы сэттинг стал более родным. А позже и сама игра стала подбрасывать очень крутые испытания. Чтобы пройти её на хорошую концовку, нужно было собрать все кусочки маски, а сделать это было очень непросто. И от того, что мне это удалось, я даже возгордился немного. Добротная метроидвания со своими странностями и особенностями, стоит хотя бы попробовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119425305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 774, 'last_played': 1562628433}
review: Ho apprezzato questo gioco per molti aspetti, tra cui sicuramente i comandi reattivi e che consentono una grande mobilità del personaggio, nonché le varie reference (più o meno velate). Non è impossibile da completare al 100%, e il gioco stesso ti permette di farlo prima di finire la storia, consentendo di riuscirci al primo tentativo. I fan dei metroidvania lo apprezzeranno molto facilmente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198869236753', 'num_games_owned': 209, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 946, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 944, 'last_played': 1579093860}
review:
优点：
1 主角后期机动性奇高，各种上天入地跨版很爽快。
2 连招连接方式多样，自由组合。
3 平台跳跃失败惩罚不大，节约时间。
4 众多的隐藏要素，老地图有新发现。
5 难点全在支线的各种收集和挑战关，主线难度不高，不难通关。
缺点：
1 主线较短，7个小时左右。
2 在训练馆通关后，那地方就关门了，想练招都没地方练了。
3 各种套装不平衡，弱的根本不想碰。
4 无中文

review: 非常棒的动作解迷游戏，难度适中，没有特别难打的BOSS，圣物和技能的收集也不是很难，每一关的全要素搜集很耗时间，游戏中随处可见的冷幽默，都可以看出制作组的匠心独运，主角的几个特技让我回想起玩洛克人4时ZERO的剑技，实在找不到一些隐藏点可以在网上找到全地图，很耐玩~强力推荐

author: {'steamid': '76561198336395425', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1565391875}
review:
Todas las habilidades crean un sistema de combate enérgico y vivo, ademas está lleno de chistes y referencias a otros juegos, vale la pena rejugarlo para conseguir el final secreto y el 100%. La historia es simple pero buena, teniendo muchos personajes secundarios interesantes y carismaticos, el villano es mas plano pero es aceptable.
En conclusión la mejor experiencia racista que he tenido

author: {'steamid': '76561198851163292', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1662, 'last_played': 1669597659}
review: Mano esse jogo é muito top, zerei ele no modo normal e difícil. A história é mo foda, muito bem completo o jogo no estilo dele. Única coisa que poderia tentar dar um suporte é quando você joga no cooperativo e a tela foca somente o player 1 e assim contando 3 segundos para o player 2 aparecer na tela. A tela poderia se dividir. Peguei tudo ouro nos desafios inferno, porém só ganhei a conquista de pegar ouro, deveria ganhar a conquista de pegar tudo bronze já que ouro é acima de bronze.

review: 整个游戏的画风非常墨西哥，就像寻梦环游记里的那种设定。很个性话，刚开始用键盘玩，各种操作不适应，后来用手柄玩，非常爽，打斗的动作很帅啊，虽然是很小的游戏，但是动作还是不错的。英文界面都是些简单的词汇，不影响整体体验。

author: {'steamid': '76561198326768840', 'num_games_owned': 1907, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 1286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1566029080}
review:
也太好玩了吧
抛开兄贵（其实并不止兄贵）
好多格斗游戏的元素的组合
前滚，后滚，飞踢，爆POWER
横板+格斗一点也不无聊
玩了几小时就立刻把2代也入手了
顺带个刷金币的办法
在沙漠前的那个小镇（就是处于地图的中央城市，第一个传送🗿那里）的右下角有一个矿洞
里面就可以无限刷怪赚金币
建议先把可以买的技能全买满
要是有中文就更好了

author: {'steamid': '76561198011544317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 1405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1658498310}
review:
Thanks for this one, Humble Bundle. And now, for something completely different.

Es casi difícil demostrar cuánto ha crecido este juego desde que lo instalé y, para ser honesto, al principio no sabía qué esperar. Honestamente pensaba que con un nombre como Guacamelee, pensaba a medias que sería como un juego tipo Smash Brothers, solo para sorprenderme gratamente de que estaba más en la línea de un juego tipo Metroidvania, pero se aferraba a elementos como luchadores enmascarados, El día de los muertos y cosas que realmente muestran la cultura mexicana.

Abandonando ese tema, el juego comienza contigo jugando como Juan, tu típico hombre que solo estaba atendiendo su campo de agave cuando una figura sombría destruye la casa del presidente y luego un grupo de matones secuestró a su hija con la intención de fusionar la tierra de los muertos con la tierra de los vivos. Durante esto, intentaste detener a este grupo, solo para ser enviado rápidamente, pero el destino conspiraría de otra manera. Una máscara reluciente en la cabeza de una estatua le da a Juan una nueva oportunidad de vida, por así decirlo, y desde allí, se te da la fuerza, las habilidades y el misticismo de un luchador, donde puedes infligir movimientos dañinos como un suplex, patea tu Los oponentes se alejan, los acumulan en la tierra o les dan una patada como si fueran un balón de fútbol.

A pesar de todo esto, este juego comienza bastante simple, pero se incrementa con una curva de dificultad de construcción lenta hasta que te enfrentas a todo tipo de peligros locos, como cuchillas de sierra, púas, lava, enemigos con códigos de colores y múltiples golpes. Los enemigos blindados, los que vuelan, los gigantes, los explosivos, algunos que llevan espadas y esquivarán rápidamente cualquier cosa que intentes lanzar, incluidas muchas otras, por lo que es mejor que estés preparado para comenzar a derribar. Pero bueno, no tienes nada de qué preocuparte porque en el camino, te encuentras con varias mejoras para tu salud, resistencia e indicadores de intensidad que puedes comprar en la tienda, o encontrarlos en el enorme mundo así como mejoras para tu arsenal de movimientos, así como una variedad de disfraces que pueden agregar beneficios o aumentar el desafío. Sin dar demasiado lejos, comienza a acumularse en un punto y lo dejaré así. Otra cosa que olvidé mencionar es que cuando se agrega Steam Workshop, incluso puedes agregar disfraces que la gente haya creado.

Ahora, ¿recomiendo esto? Apuestas tu culo a que yo hago. Esta es una agradable sorpresa que no debe perderse. Lo único que puedo decir en contra es que solo hay multijugador local, así que si quieres reunir a algunos amigos de todo el mundo, necesitarás un programa llamado Parsec para que disfruten de la experiencia.

The only joke part about this is that the main body part of the review was written and then translated with Google Translate. So yeah, get this game, ya nerds.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168883388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1560341058}
review: Análise primária, ainda tenho pouco tempo, mas o jogo já se mostra muito bom. Não há porque não comprá-lo, mas devo dizer que o ganhei de graça, contudo, já tinha ele na lista de desejos, apenas esperando o momento certo. O jogo é muito divertido, altamente recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198427594758', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1428, 'last_played': 1561140883}
review:
Do you like metroidvanias? Do you like good soundtracks? Do you like beautiful artstyles? Then this is the game for you.

Full of platforms and colorful enemies, this Mexican inspired game is going to absolutely blow your mind. From doing dungeons to fighting bosses and discovering all kinds of secrets, this is a game I'll recommend doing 100%, trust me, it'll be worth it

It has some flaws and glitches, and sometimes the combat is a little unfair, but overall, it's very good

author: {'steamid': '76561198078711711', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1685153596}

author: {'steamid': '76561198034860060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 1097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1081, 'last_played': 1562085367}
review:
Plus qu'un metroidvania, on est vraiment sur un plateformer avec qq éléments qui se débloquent au fur et à mesure mais qui ne font pas la substance du jeu.
C'est beau, très beau même et fluide. 
Les animations sont top
L'humour omniprésent
Au niveau gameplay 90% du temps le jeu est génial, mais certaines parties sont cheatées et/ou buggées et ne peuvent que très difficilement être finies (en tout cas chez moi). J'ai dans l'exemple un défi en enfer où on doit enchainer plusieurs coups spéciaux mais impossible de voir la dernière salle suffisamment longtemps pour savoir quoi faire, la caméra ne suit pas... ou un précipice géant qu'on ne peut traverser, bref des moments vraiment super chiants!

Sinon que du bon, foncez!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043835076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1560057380}
review: Guacamelee might not be particularly long, but it provides a very tight and enjoyable metroidvania experience which seems to nail everything it sets out to do. The combat leaves plenty of opportunities for players to experiment with the wide range of moves and create free-flowing combos. In between the combat segments are fun platforming sections which can sometimes take a few tries to get, but never enough to hurt the pacing of the game. Highly recommended.

review:
Simply a great game. Played it in one sitting even though I didn't really have the time and shouldn't have done it, but it was fun and I don't regret it. 
The only mild criticism, as other people said in their reviews, it doesn't really make sense to buy/own this game if you don't own a controller / don't want to play with one as it will be super frustrating / almost impossible without one.

Buy it for the normal price and definetly definetly buy this game on sale! (My condolences that you missed th 100% sale)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031390406', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1562026973}
review: O jogo é muito divertido, desafiador (ás vezes até demais) e força o jogador a pensar (muito!) quando põe um puzzle no caminho dele. Não há truques ou dicas. O jogador tem de pensar em como superar o puzzle. Fora isso, a história é bem engraçada e envolvente. Quanto mais se avança nela, por mais clichê que seja, mais se quer jogar pra descobrir aonde a história irá nos levar. Um excelente beat'em up para se passar horas jogando.

review: I've bought Guacamelee on PS4, PSVita, and Steam. It's a great metroidvania style game. It's got a fun story, creative visuals, tight gameplay. It's decently challenging. author: {'steamid': '76561198364189109', 'num_games_owned': 2205, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1617274897}
review:
[h1] GUACAMELEE! SUPER TURBO CHAMPIONSHIP EDITION [/h1] 

Meksika'nın küçük köylerinden biri olan Pueblucho'nun yakınlarında yaşayan Juan Aguacate, çiftçilik yaparak geçimini sağlıyordur. Günlerden bir gün çocukluk arkadaşı ve sevgilisi olan Lupita ile buluşmak için kasabaya gider. Oraya vardığında Carlos Calaca adında iskelete benzeyen kötü bir adamın tüm kasabayı yakıp kül ettiğini ve sevgilisini kaçırdığını görür. Juan, kasabayı ve sevgilisini kurtarmak için Carlos ile yüzleşir fakat ona gücü yetmediği için oracıkta öldürülür. Ölülerin diyarında gözlerini açan Juan, orada Tostada adında gizemli bir savaşçı ile tanışır. Tostada, Juan'ı da bir savaşçıya dönüştürmek ve Carlos'tan intikamını alması için onu yaşayanların dünyasına geri gönderecek mistik bir maske verir. Bu maske Juan'ı tekrar diriltecektir ve sevgilisi Lupita'yı kurtarması için ona bir şans daha verecektir. Yenilen pehlivan güreşe doymaz misali, Juan maskeyi alır ve intikamını almak için yola koyulur... 

Oyunun hikâyesi tıpkı Mario oyunlarında olduğu gibi ''Kötü adamlar sevgilini kaçırdı, onu derhal kurtarmalısın.'' mantığında ilerliyor. Elbette sunum ve bölüm aralarında yan karakterler ile olan diyaloglarımız iyi fakat hikâye anlatıcılığının pek de odak noktası olmadığını söylemeliyim. Oyun daha çok görselliği ile öne çıkıyor ve renkli Meksika atmosferini iyi bir şekilde yansıtan sanat tarzı oldukça iyi. Ayrıca müzikler de bu atmosferi destekler nitelikte. 

Guacamelee, ''Side-scroll'' denilen 2 boyutlu bir aksiyon-platform oyunu. Adından da anlaşılacağı üzere düşmanlarımızı ''Lucha Libre'' denilen Meksikalılara özgü bir dövüş stili ile öldürüyoruz. Bu dövüş stili oyuna çok güzel yansıtılmış. Animasyonlar ve ilerledikçe gelişen/genişleyen dövüş hareketleri tekdüzeliği kırmış. Bir de işin içine özel güçler giriyor ki o zaman oyunu oynaması çok daha eğlenceli hale geliyor. Bu özel güçler düşmanı anında öldürebilen etkiye sahip olmakla birlikte büyü gücü harcadığından dolayı art arda kullanması pek mümkün olmuyor. Ayrıca karakterimizin kostümünü değiştirip, can ve büyü gücü olarak da geliştirebileceğimiz alışveriş alanları da mevcut. Bunların yanı sıra oyunda düşman çeşitliliği de gayet iyi. Yakın ve uzak menzilli saldıran düşmanlar, kalkanlı düşmanlar, alan etkili saldıran düşmanlar ve ağır silahlı düşmanlarla birlikte kendine has dövüş stili olan 10'dan fazla özel baş düşman da bulunmakta. 

Platform kısımları ise zıpla, seni takip eden düşmanlardan kısa süre içerisinde kaç ve tuzaklı odalardan geç gibi klasik fakat yukarıda da bahsettiğim boyut değiştirme olayı ona da bir renk katmış. Yapımcı ekip bir bölümü tasarlarken iki defa tasarlamış çünkü, boyut değiştirdiğimizde etraftaki objeler, mekanlar ve karakterler de değişiyor. Bu mekaniğin akıllıca kullanıldığı birçok ufak bulmacalı bölüm var ve git gide daha da komplike hal aldığından dolayı bir hayli eğlenceli oluyor. Bunların yanı sıra keşfe müsait yarı-açık oyun alanları ve içerisinde bulunan basit bulmacalı odalar ve yan görevler de güzel bir eklenti olmuş. 

[b] SONUÇ [/b] 

Guacamelee, kendine has tarzı ile oynamaya değer bir platform oyunu. Gerek aksiyonu olsun gerek sanat tarzı olsun oyuncuyu sıkmıyor. Zorluk ile eğlenceyi de gayet dengeli bir şekilde sağlamış. Ayrıca çevrimiçi çok oyunculu oynama imkânı da var. Oyun indirim dönemlerinde somun ekmek fiyatına alınabilir ve keşfederek oynarsanız yaklaşık 8 saat sürüyor. 

[h1] İNCELEME PUANI : 70 / 100 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198961683445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1590188205}
review:
[h1]Introducción[/h1]
Guacamelee es un videojuego de plataformeo en 2D que desde mi punto de vista esta algo sobrevalorado resultando ser el ejemplo perfecto de "contenido repetitivo" para rellenar tiempo. En este caso analizaré dividiendo lo positivo y negativo (cosa que nunca he hecho pero probaré esta vez).

[h1]Negativo[/h1]
La historia es la típica de la "damisela en apuros" dónde el "hombre musculoso" debe rescatarla (típico cliché). Los personajes están todos estereotipados a propósito y la verdad no me llama la atención en lo mas mínimo. Videojuegos como Binary Domain hacen estos estereotipos pero de una manera mas inteligente y va como anillo al dedo mientras que Guacamelee se basa en repetir modismos Mexicanos una y otra vez sin sustento alguno.
Por otro lado los enemigos se repiten continuamente variando solo los jefes finales (los cuales son sencillos en su mayoría), por ende, resulta demasiado tedioso continuar con la aventura además de la cantidad innecesaria de puzzles que debes resolver para obtener diferentes cofres, los cuales no compensan tus esfuerzos. Tienes 2 opciones: Recorrer el mapa y buscar rutas alternativas (cosa que siempre hago en todo videojuego que me lo permite y resulte interesante) o la última opción que es pasar el título sin rebuscar en ningún lado. Bueno, como comenté "Busco rutas alternas siempre que me lo permitan y me resulte interesante", en este caso me lo permiten pero es otro factor que resulta tedioso debido a que los puzzles son demasiados, las rutas demasiado largas las cuales, a su vez, están repletas de enemigos y las recompensas por seguirlas no valen la pena. Sumándole a esto los controles algo imprecisos lo cual resulta imperdonable siendo un plataformero repleto de puzzles que tienes que resolver con precisión quirúrgica.

[h1]Positivo[/h1]
El humor que posee si bien es algo "simple" da resultado, los nombres de las transformaciones, de los personajes y algunos modismos dan gracia. Pero como bien dije: Cuando esos modismos son utilizados en exceso se vuelve tedioso.
El componente RPG es de lo mejor que tiene el videojuego pudiendo comprar atuendos los cuales tienen pros y contras además de subir de nivel tu salud, fuerza y diferentes poderes que poseerás a lo largo de tu aventura. Los ataques especiales te servirán para derrotar enemigos y, a su vez, para abrir caminos. Cada uno de ellos sólo se puede ejecutar en una dirección concreta (de abajo arriba, de arriba abajo, a los lados). De ese modo, aunque encuentres un obstáculo podrás atravesarlo y seguir con tu camino. De esa manera se consigue que no sea trivial desbloquear caminos con poderes que ya tenías.

[h1]Conclusión[/h1]
Guacamelee es un videojuego "distinto" pero mal planteado. Con varios errores en sus diseños de niveles además de la falta de variedad de enemigos, sus puzzles algo complicados debido a sus controles imprecisos y su historia mal llevada a cabo y repleta de clichés vistos miles de veces en otros videojuegos. Por otro lado tiene un humor funcional y un buen componente RPG. Desde mi punto de vista es un videojuego con grandes ideas pero mal llevadas a cabo.

Mi nota: 4/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322101866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 614, 'last_played': 1561936771}
review:
A very fun Metroidvania with a great variety of moves to use and enemies to use them on all unlocked after a period of time. It's a Metroidvania that is filled with culture in the music and in the presentation with unique mechanics that make it stand out from your typical Metroidvania. The boss battles were also excellently designed, while being fairly tough the attacks were always telegraphed nicely and made beating the boss rewarding. If this game looks like your cup of tea from the screenshots I would say give it a shot for sure. There is also local Co-op which I played with one of my friends and it was chaotic and incredibly fun every time we played. 

A.K.A Game good

review: Игра достаточно интересная для примитивного метроида, весёлая, в меру сложная и занятная. Правда освоиться в ней сразу, скорее всего, не удастся, ибо вокруг даже начальных локаций полно вещей, которые не будут понятны, но это не сильно мешает. Боёвка не так проста, хоть и через парку костылей она заставляет вас использовать все её возможности. Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198409857566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 570, 'last_played': 1559519033}
review:
To sum it up in very few sentences.
Fun game, great writing that remind me of early adult swim, great soundtrack, and the mods really make the experience all the more special. Some of the more optional challenges may cause you to pull your hair, but it's still overall a pretty good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198387752411', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1572024752}
review:
Buen juego.
Pros
buenos escenarios
historia interesante
divertido a ratos
Contras 
se vuelve un tanto repetitivo y predecible despues de unas horas de juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046049434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1468, 'last_played': 1559321200}
review:
Got this game a while back on steam for free at the time when they released their second game. I'm mainly writing the review because of steam summer sale event but I shizz you not, this game is an adventure. I don't play a lot of platformers and beat em' ups, but I tried this one out and I was blown away.
P.S. Please, mind one thing - do not make shortcuts in the game you are not meant to take since it breaks the game and you'll have to try over. Yep... I experienced this myself when I went from Santa Luchita to Sierra Morena without ability called "goat climb" and usind only wall jumps. As you might imagine, I had to start the whole game over........ yeeee......

author: {'steamid': '76561198010283078', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 935, 'last_played': 1562110709}
review:
This "Metroidvania" has a focus on platforming and combat. While not as complex as Super Metroid or Symphony of the Night, the game is easy to pick up and play. Your upgrades amount mostly to health and meter upgrades along with a handful of combat techniques that also double as movement enhancers. 

Though some of the end game platforming can be fairly difficult, most of it is optional and players looking for a relaxing time can find that here. This is doubled by many of the map's quality-of-life features. It shows you your percentage completion of each area (based on number of treasures left), the color-coded blocks and treasures you encounter but don't break, and even a quest marker that points you in the general direction of the next story objective.

The game also has co-op, but unfortunately, it's only for local play. You won't be able to play online with your friends.

Overall, this is a quick, but solid and relaxing title with end game content to challenge those who want to go above and beyond.

review:
Ended up being way more fun than I wanted to give it credit. A bit sad that for some reason my trophies didn't unlock despite finishing the game but ah well. Still an absolute blast to play and a solid Metroidvania. 
To summarize this game, luchador el chicken rises up from the dead to kick the local skeleton overlord's ass with some spicy sriracha sauce. Includes a furry jaguar too. Whole package.

Also paid a homage to Henski with the Chicken powers. That's how you know the game's good.
