author: {'steamid': '76561198836554158', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2104, 'last_played': 1559412760}
review:
It so happened that, due to different reasons (mainly real life issues hitting like a train), I've completely skipped/missed on this game back in the days when it came out on consoles and PC, and didn't had a chance/time to get my hands on it ever since. I haven't been around Steam for more than a decade either, making a new account only just recently, and...I was pleasantly surprised to see this particular version of this game, which is essentially a definitive release (if not counting console-exclusive DLC and achievements), was given out completely for free, just a couple days ago from when I'm writing down this review.

So, please, when you read this review, do take a note that: a) I've never ever played Guacamelee before until just very recently, and I essentially didn't know anything at all about this game until I've started playing it, b) I got this particular release/version completely for free when it was given out for a short time, so my perception is obviously going to be skewed a bit because, hey, a completely free thing is free no matter what, even if some bad games can be given away freely too (gladly, this one is not such of a case).

Now for "pros"/"cons".

Pros:
1. Colorful world that's brimming with energy.
There's constantly something going on and it's always pretty to look at. Despite this game's deliberately stylized cubic 2D presentation, almost everything in the game is lighted up and shadowed properly, making things "pop" beautifully and don't look any "flat" at all. This is a living, breathing world that you're getting instantly immersed in.

2. Meticulous design that definitely stands out.
The game has it's own unique "face" that can't be mistaken for anything else. Considering that this was initially an indie title by newcomer devs, it's actually a very well done work and definitely a hit in the bullseye right from the get-go. A massive success from the first try, is what I'm saying. I've played a lot of indies of differing quality levels during my life, and Guacamelee definitely stands out as it's essentially a "no less than AA" tier of an indie product, it's way above majority of indies that are available on Steam, sheer "attention to details"-wise.

3. Gameplay mechanics and movement/fighting control quality are insanely solid.
The game controls extremely well, be that moving the character around, doing platforming and puzzles, or fighting. Every single last press of a button/key is very responsive, fast, and exactly correct. Timing is also not bad or very strict at all and allows for big delays between presses, so you really don't have to be a professional fighting game tourney player with an arcade stick, to master this game's fighting mechanics all the way through and through. And this game definitely rewards anyone who has experience of dealing with fighting games in general, since fighting in this game feels very natural and smooth, for me personally it was almost right at home. Regardless, you can play this game well even if you don't play fighting games at all, as game's well-constructed timings totally allow that. This game is a feast for both the seasoned hardcore gamers such as myself and for complete newbies alike, no one gets left behind. Huge kudos to the developer team for doing gameplay so well, and at the very first try no less.

4. Very good sound/music.
The musical tracks are unique, there's a plenty of them (though it gets just a little bit repetitive at the end),  and their arrangements differ depending on the state of "plane" you're currently in, which is always a welcome addition. It almost never gets boring. Sound clips in general are very well done too, though I personally would've liked even more variety in sound cues for characters, chicken, and etc. But for the first attempt this is a definite success nonetheless.

5. Saving feature is very well done.
"Checkpoints" are aplenty, automatic saving is done constantly, it's absolutely not intrusive and insanely fast on both save itself and loading later. Quite honestly, the saving/loading mechanic of this game is so barely even noticeable, yet absolutely solid in it's implementation, that I don't even treat "save points" as being ones, but rather just as mere "checkpoints". It's just THAT fast and easy. I should note, however, that my game is installed onto a fast SSD, so maybe it'll be a bit less smooth and seamless for people who still use HDDs even nowadays.

6. Plenty of content and challenge.
This game is a Metroidvania all way through and through, alright. There's a ton of nooks and crannies, hidden rooms and secret locations to which you can get only by getting and using particular skills, and even full combinations of several different skills altogether in unison is required to accomplish especially challenging tasks at some points. Yet, despite that, this game is balanced just SO WELL that it doesn't as much present a "challenge" necessarily, rather than attempts to sincerely TEACH you how to play WELL games of such genre/type. Guacamelee's platforming and puzzle "challenges" are definitely of that kind where you have to use both your hands and your head well, and by doing it correctly you're always guaranteed to obtain a good/worthwhile prize, so sense of accomplishment is ALWAYS present and NEVER lets go right until the very end of the last "stage". Especially when you see that "golden medal" and a "100%" marked under the location on the "world map". To say that Guacamelee's developers knew what they're doing and where exactly to hit to poke at all of the classical "gamer satisfaction" spots, is to greatly underestimate things. Guacamelee isn't just a very good game in on by itself. It's a VERY high quality "Metroidvania". I'm not going to exaggerate it even one slightest bit by saying that it's right up there next to ones of the best Castlevania games ever released out there. Yes, it's no Hollow Knight or etc., but, hey, Hollow Knight was after. It's also no Super Metroid, but it sure as hell got pretty close to that point. I sincerely cannot friggin' wait now to try Guacamelee 2 soon and see if this already-perfected formula was greatly expanded/improved upon even further by these devs.

7. Unique characters and story.
Every single character, as well as almost every NPC and enemy type, all of them have their distinct unmistakable looks, designs, and behaviors. The story is short, but it's well written and it even deconstructs some of the cliches such a scenario tends to present. In the end it's, of course, a pretty simple and straightforward tale, but there's some NPCs that are right out-of-this-world to specifically mess up with your perception of this game, which is quite funny, and there's also more than one ending, which makes character development even more solid in the end. And TON of constant Easter eggs/allusions/references/nodes to other games and movies, their characters, and etc., some of which are SO bizarre that only a truly seasoned and very knowledgeable hardcore gamer such as myself could instantly recognize/remember them. Huge kudos, devs. You know your stuff, alright.

Almost (almost, but not ALL of them..read below for the cons) every last thing in this game was polished to the state of absolute perfection, essentially.

Cons:
1. There's currently (as I'm writing this down) a bug/glitch present in the game, which can completely lock you out of obtaining a particular achievement during very first play-through, thus essentially forcing you to start the entire game over from scratch/via Hard mode.
This is a bad thing and I sincerely hope that this wasn't actually intended by the devs, so I eagerly await for them to do a fix/patch, so that it won't ever happen again to anyone else after me. I've learned about this from my own bad experience, so I believe that developers must act. Here: https://steamcommunity.com/app/275390/discussions/0/1644290458825505662/.

2. Analog (DualShock 4) is finicky while in the air/jumping.

author: {'steamid': '76561198426287042', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 1259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1259, 'last_played': 1580003884}
review:
First of all, Guacamelee is a fantastic game. It combines Mexican culture with the Metroidvania style, creating what I like to call a comedic mexican Hollow Knight. To the topics: 

Graphics: Really good, they have put a lot of attention on the details, and putting to account that every inch of the map had to be made twice because of the Dimension Swap abililty, they did a very good job. Loved it.

Gameplay: Exactly the same from start to finish. You punch bad guys, then you learn new ways to punch badder guys, but you know what? That is not bad at all. The gameplay is fluid and fun, when you start learning more about the special moves you will start chaining them, killing bad guys with style and efficiency.

Music: It's good. No, it's really fu*cking good. For real, from the Forest to the Canals, the Pico de Gallo to the Temple of Rain, it is really well produced. And even better, every song has a World of the Dead remix, since everytime you swap dimensions the song changes. Loved the music.

Audience: Any age, simple story and gameplay made for everyone.

PC Requeirements: Not much, since it is a 2D game. My PC sucks dick and I was able to play it smoothly as TBoI.

Difficulty: Easy to learn, hard to master. The main game is actually pretty easy, but as soon as you reach the Inferno challenges and the Hard Mode, get ready for some next level stuff. Challenges like 15, 8 and 3 might be a pain, just as hard mode Flame Face and Jaguar Javier. Buy I managed to finish everything in less that 24 total hours, so a little bit of determination and you're good to go.

Story: Usual plot, a farmer finds out some dark lord got a princess hostage for some evil plan and now he has to use some new magical power he got from a unusual item to cross worlds and save her. Jokes aside, the plot is good, well structured and it has two endings, so hell yeah!

Game Time: For me, less than 24 hours I completed the game, but it depends on skill, a lot. For the usual casual players, it might be like almost 30 hours. The story can be completed in less than 8.

Price: I got it for free, but it's damn worth its price.

Bugs: Didn't see any, the only problem I got had to do with hitboxes.

It's a fun game, for everyone to enjoy. Buy it, get 100%, then go look up on others complaining about it on reddit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120410070', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 592, 'last_played': 1559030783}
review:
메트로베니아 게임이 가져야 할 요소들을 충분히 가지고 있고 액션이 깊이 있다. 
경쾌한 음악과 호쾌한 타격감으로 7~8시간은 쉴 새 없이 할 수 있다. 

플레이 중 느껴지는 몇가지 단점이 있는데 하나는 액션의 난이도가 메트로베니아 게임치고는 꽤 높다는 것
키보드로 하면 거의 격투게임에 비하는 손꼬임 장벽을 몇 번 겪게 된다. 손이 느려 빠른 커맨드 입력에 취약한 사람들에게는 비추천.

다른 단점은 메트로베니아 치고는 수집요소가 적다는 것. 그래서 플레이 타임도 길지 않다.
스킬은 스토리를 자연스럽게 따라가다 보면 전부 습득 및 구입이 가능하므로 그 외에 수집하게 될 요소로는 코스튬과 체력/스테미나/인텐소 조각과 오브 정도가 있는데 진엔딩을 보기위한 오브를 제외하면 딱히 수집하지 않아도 플레이에 지장이 있거나 극적인 변화가 발생하지 않는다. 맵을 전부 밝히거나 서브퀘스트 등을 하는 것으로 얻을 수 있는 요소가 더 다양했으면 더 오래 붙잡았을 거 같은데라는 아쉬움이 있다.

전체적으로는 매우 잘만든 훌륭한 게임이고 가격도 싸다. 메트로베니아와 액션/ 레슬링을 좋아한다면 강력추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090985587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 696, 'last_played': 1559283176}
review:
Antes que nada diré que me tomé la molestia de terminarlo con su final bueno y casi 100%

Algunas cosas fueron disfrutables. Tiene muy buenas ideas pero la ejecución me pareció bastante mala. Los controles son horribles y reaccionan igual de horriblemente. El cabezazo amarillo a veces ni sale y te quedas como un salame recibiendo tortazos a la cara, otras veces sale en lugar del puño derpderp. A veces el movimiento se detiene en seco. La manera que se pega a las paredes y corta todo momentum es espantosa. Los trow y los slam la mitad de las veces hace el que quiere. 
Toma por dificultad tirar un montón de enemigos que se enciman y te dan de a saques mientras no puedes encargarte de todos ellos juntos porque tienen escudos o no pertenecen al mismo mundo. En el aspecto plataformero está bastante bien, se pone algo frustrante y tedioso para el final y ni hablar del infierno, pero en general es decente e ingenioso. Lo malo es que tendrás que hacer cada "puzzle" cada vez que quieras investigar un área para buscar ese cofrecito que quedó por ahí suelto ya que te faltaba algún que otro movimiento; el sistema de fast travel deja que desear.
La música parece buena al principio, pero tras un tiempo escuchando lo mismo una y otra vez comencé a detestarla, es como darte de a taladrazos en las amígdalas.
Lo que sí, gráficamente es muy bonito. 
Pero en fin, las cositas buenas no consiguen dejar la balanza a su favor para mí. Si lo conseguiste gratis, bien, probalo. ¿Comprarlo? Comprá Hollow Knight mejor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198228104384', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 2042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2042, 'last_played': 1559139517}
review:
So it was a freebie on humble recently, but I got around to reviewing just now because I only now finished this.

I would say this game is definetly far from perfect as metroidvanias go, it doesn't take long to start comparing very similar abilities, level design tropes and other similarities to other metroidvanias you played, so far most of my mechanical comparisions turn out to be against Ori and the Blind Forest, but the abilities mostly remain somewhat consistent anongst all games, just that Ori had set the bar pretty high.

[h1]Exploration[/h1]
Well anyway, the metroidvania exploration doesn't feel very fun with most of the abilities being mostly combat oriented and with little application in the world beyond breaking color coded blocks. The few abilities that seem rather fun, unique and help you traverse the world the most are coincidentally the final two. The uppercut to extend your jump, wall jumping and the double jump were okay too, but those are a standard for these types of games and they weren't mechanically cutting edge either.
The dash is underwhelming due to the short range and inability to chain it, meaning it is just an offensive and not a defensive move. The headbutt exists just to pad out the abilities with more colored blocks to break, it is just really a strong attack you'd expect to start out with. Ground slam is okay, working as you expect it too, no complaints there. The final two are definetly unique ways to traverse the world and get used in a cool boss fight centered around them, they save face for the underwhelming early game ones for sure.

[h1]Combat[/h1]
The best part of the game is the combat, though it is not perfect either, with my biggest gripe being how almost all of the special moves are bound to being B + Directional Key/Standing Still which is bizzare given dimension swap and dodge have two buttons dedicated to each of them. Which makes it easy to pull off the wrong moves, as well as make the headbutt hard to trigger since you have to let go of the directional keys but the game does have some degree of input queueing which is annoying since some enemies have shields that can be broken with that move only.
The grapples are good though, one of the challenge rooms disables your special moves and you really get to see how much mileage you can get out of the various grapples you can do.
The boss fights are pretty good, the enemy variety is sufficient enough, some enemies being in the background dimension makes it more varied not letting you cheap out of everything with aimed throw, and hard mode does add aditional hazards into arenas instead of just buffing the enemy damage values.

[h1]Platforming[/h1]
Now here's a mixed opinion on this, it's rather good by itself, staying rather fresh with how it shifts styles from being something like Celeste in some areas while being more like Super Meat Boy in others, some dimension swap goodness, plus the two unique abilities providing something very special in the other places, most of the filler areas that aren't challenge rooms or collectable rooms are rather bland.
And the game lacks some good platforming design features, like being able to look down to not make a leap of faith(most levels do not have you going down above death pits but you can definetly rage because of this in those that do), as well as not have a level preview spot in the harder platforming bits, which doesn't help that the cross-dimension platform outlines do not show which walls and platforms may have slippery surfaces and where. Something you would benefit from being able to look up and swap around dimesnions as you do to plan out your route.
Plus there are some questionable design choices like a time attack room being filled with breakable blocks to make you lose time, but the blocks not respawning making it pointless beyond making you not succeed the first time through, also the things that deal damage to you, falling off a cliff doesn't, but hitting spikes does, some areas are rather forgiving on failing, others will kick you back far to the last checkpoint if you happen to fail in a specific way too much, just why.
In short the platforming is alright in platforming areas, but if you want good platforming as a priority, get a different game, a dedicated platformer, as the metroidvania filler platforming is rather bland.

[h1]World and Story[/h1]
The story premise is just the basic you are the hero, save the princess and the world thing.
The worldbuilding and the theme is the truly special part, though I'm a bit annoyed at just how many obvious video game references are crammed in there all over the place.

[h1]Summary[/h1]
Even though this game is far from perfect I had a pretty good time with it, the combat is good, as well as the occasional dedicated platforming sections, the overall metroidvania experience may not be that hot, but it is saved by the dedicated challenge areas that provide interesting platforming and combat scenarios without the filler of the general commute around the world, which is gorgeous the first few times, but you get annoyed at how slow general traversal is because the really helpful moves are so situational.
I enjoyed my time with it and did not dread having to replay it, so a thumbs up from me, I'm actually looking forward to playing the sequel someday as it looks mechnically more polished.

author: {'steamid': '76561198408172270', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1559949878}
review:
como ya es costumbre reseño los juegos antes de acabarlos jjeje, pero que puedo decir


lo bueno:

los graficos son muy buenos, te sumergen en el nivel y la verdad recuerdan mucho a los de rayman origins o a los de rayman legends

la jugabilidad las mecanicas de los ataques especiales y el backtracking que tienes que hacer cuando las desbloqueas lo hace muy divertido, me encanta esa parte

la inspiracion que tienen en la historia y personajes recuerda bastante a la cultura mexicana efectivamente, sobretodo a el sector "mas pobre" o la mayoria, lo que lo hace muy bueno a mi parecer puesto que reprecenta la verdadera cultura

lo malo: 

la historia es un poco monótona y aburrida, tienes que rescatar a una mujer indefensa de un villano y viajas a traves de etapas en donde derrotas a uno de sus esbirros o subditos, ¿no les suena muy parecido a cierta saga de videojuegos? 

los dialogos, pueden ser muy simples y fuera de lugar, o que te topes con gente que en tu vida as visto/conocido y derrepente te dejan entrar a su casa y te dicen que les traigas queso tortillas y salsa, aparte de que tocando el mismo tema de la historia es muy aburrida por así decirlo

el lenguaje es muy "politicamente correcto" no es algo que deba enorgullecernos, pero a decir verdad no es un juego mexicano sin un "chingados" "madres" o "pinche", aun así logran captar el lenguaje mas mexicano con palabras como "neta" "carnal" (ejem rosa de guadalupe ejem) 

en resumen: 

recomiendo el juego mucho, es muy divertido por el plataformeo y eso no logra tener una historia tan divertida como la de rayman, pero lo que importa en este tipo de juegos es la jugabilidad, así que comprenlo si le tienen ganas y si no lo conocen aprovechen las rebajas (hace unas semanas estaba al 100% de descuento, asi lo obtuve yo jeje).

pd: me encanta que el español sea español latinoamerica y no español-españa eso parece que no tiene importancia pero es un muy buen detalle xd

author: {'steamid': '76561198310538353', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1068, 'last_played': 1559350854}
review:
我的是免费喜加一
但是我不推荐20块钱以上买
这款游戏的槽点太多了,我目前17个小时,只有前3个小时是快乐的,后面慢慢就感觉不到快乐了并且逐渐转化为痛苦,如果不是想打出真结局早就放弃了
让我想吐槽的主要就是怪物设计还有平台元素
首先是怪物设计
游戏内的怪主要分两种,一种是血量不高伤害不高,容易受到技能控制;另一种血量高伤害高不容易受到技能控制
作为一个从不摘下面具的牛战士,主角还融汇贯通了升龙和冲拳,游戏甚至让一只鸡交玩家各种狂拽酷炫d炸天的连招,然而并没有什么卵用,因为游戏动作内容的难度主要靠堆怪控制的,面对一堆小怪随便打几下一个冲拳就带走一片,根本用不上连招,面对大怪本身就比较难击飞打倒,它的伤害又高所以一套技能连续用在大怪身上迅速秒掉才行,再加上周围还配有小怪,根本没机会放连招;在打出虚弱后使用抱摔能躲过伤害还能造成范围伤害,对比之下连招真的是弱到不行
因为这样的怪物设计,在实际操作猛按X然后各种L+B,可以说打斗一点意思都没有,后面我能不打的都没打,直接跑酷
其次是平台元素
想吐槽这一点完全是因为有一关平台跳跃难到爆,我卡关两个小时都没过,后来直接神志不清各种乱按,心态直接爆炸
其它还有很多比如boss设计基本上也是找时机一通乱按就结束了、地狱里各楼层拿黄金牌子居然比boss都难很多之类的
这款游戏有比较硬的地图探索(在一个灵魂界空中的房间里有三个boss的娃娃版,还有一个变鸡可以进去的洞里切换至灵魂界可以看到有一个二维码,扫完会说恭喜你确定并扫描了QR代码)和技能设计,但是因为没有设计好怪导致游戏变得不伦不类甚至有点无聊,剧情上的戏剧元素都为此被埋没,我的心理价位在20左右,如果你注意到这个评论并看到这里的话,看看现在的价格你是否愿意买呢?

author: {'steamid': '76561198077360125', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1559026897}
review:
免费领到的《墨西哥英雄大乱斗》，这个汉语译名是真的劝退玩家，听起来并不像有趣的游戏。但是游戏能一直保有不错的口碑，的确是自身质量过硬。

进入游戏，独特的画风乍一看中规中矩，粗中有细，游戏性也并不是很亮眼。随着游玩时间越来越长，对游戏的喜爱也越来越高，特殊技能只有几个，但相互组合起来有非常多的用途，攻击招式也都不仅仅是用来攻击，还能越过一些特殊地形。地图设计更是十分用心，自始至终我都在期待下一个房间长什么样，里面有什么东西，要将游戏设计成这样确实需要花费非常多的心思。画风虽独特，但美术方面很漂亮，尤其是对一些光、雪的表现。艺术风格不一定每个人都能接受，开始玩的前1个小时里，总感觉画风奇怪，但后面的游戏内容把我拉了回来，决定将这个和《空洞骑士》有些相似的游戏通关！

总之，这是一款用心设计、有独特艺术风格的游戏，战斗、场景和流程完成度很高，能保持让玩家有兴趣继续探索下去的魔力。有问题的地方在于画面不一定每个人都能接受，但当你真正被游戏所吸引后，这是一款乐趣十足的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198088028147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 2223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1606680796}
review:
This game was made by someone who lived and breathed retro gaming. I didn't think i would be into it as it was free and I had no idea what a guacamele is. On normal I'm really impressed with it for the most part enough to recommend it. I love the art style of it how at day time (lets call it) it's usually warm colors, yet at night time it's these cool blues and purples and the game play is addictive to say the least. 

You've got from references or inspiration from super mario, super metroid, donkey kong 2, zelda or similar turn the night on/off sort of games or dare i say oddworld on PS1 and all in all the playing style is great, it's not too easy and not too hard. Though so far there was one jumping puzzle i saved for later. It's a beat'em up with platforming and puzzle solving similar to before metroid made the mistake of going 3d, those games were garbage in my opinion. There is combos and you slowly learn new skills and if anything it somewhat also reminds me of Tomba 1 which is another gem I'm mentioning the original PS1 one a ton of people overlooked. The game does a great job of implementing stuff, you get a skill and have to get out of a level using the skill enough to master it. The combos get better as you learn new skills, you mercilessly do combos throwing enemies around the room and unlike the later resident evils after 4 the enemies don't blend together. I turned the game off and still remember what i was fighting. It's nothing is too hard, you've got a dodge button and honestly the 2 days on and off i played this game when i had nothing better to do flew. I was giving up on steam games but this revitalized me in some ways. 

Before fighting the flame guy some lets call them puzzles go from ok or average for experienced gamers to screw this difficult. You do this gigantic leap using every skill. You do get more skills to make some puzzles easier but it kind of takes from the experience in my opinion that you just go in and boom! two seconds instead of working our butts off doing it the way we think is only possible. I hate anything to do with lava in this game. acid and all doesn't kill you and you have no lives, just like ninja gaiden keep going until you give up. I love the auto save this game has as well. 

What I didn't like was switching between the living and dead worlds mid air every half a second near the end of the game. It was fun at first but it gets too extreme near the end. My least favorite part of the game is when standard enemies all get magic shields. I'd give them a reduced amount of damage but not invincible. Sure you can do combos on them to get that special move in but it's a chore. I enjoyed it on normal. I don't speak spanish so some parts I'd love to have subtitles at the bottom. Usually context gets you by but some sentences are pure spanish from people.

the jaguar boss is very cheap as you got to have the reflexes of a cat (no pun intended) and the final boss was not fun without the devils suit. Only one puzzle I had to go on youtube to figure out was the one where you got to fly through the dozen or so teleports. I can imagine this game would be a blast for those who can come over and plug a controller in as well. The difficulty gets progressively more difficult but it's not rage quit or insane for the most part until you get those gold medals in el inferno the developers made for this to get more money out of us. At least it's not just about every original nintendo game hard where you get so far, give up and buy another game the next payday. There was one level where the enemies shields were green and the background distorted it making it look yellow but besides that they did a fine job. 

I do not recommend playing this game on hard. Some enemies even on normal have instant death moves like the purple balloon thing where even if you do 100% of the game it can kill you. Sure it's hard it's supposed to be hard catering to those who have no lives and it's the end of the world if they ever beat a game but it honestly just gets sickening where every battle you can't skip you're using intenso or having to rely on the devil suit. draining the enemies health Sometimes the enemies get so many on the screen you got to either pause the game or take a hit as you forget where you are. 

The quest that should never have been so hard is the 3 chicken one in that town. It's for 1/3rd of a health bar upgrade or something. Not a super secret costume that gives you instant deaths or invisibility. Why is it shadow enemies can harm you but you can't harm shadow enemies that is hypocritical of the game. If you're in their realm and a shadow appears shouldn't you be able to hit it too? 

I feel they could have done more with the throws other than the odd time you throw someone out of bounds or to a ceiling of spikes. Possibly get other powers when you are in intense mode. I'd love to see some voice acting in the next installment of this I haven't played yet. I have no idea why i can only do the blue dash or uppercut once without touching a platform again. Maybe the costumes can do other powers as well sort of like megaman. I did the whole game with the normal costume because it was the most balanced. El inferno's challenges get cruel and sick where you have seconds to spare to get them and good luck getting the one with the three sliding objects you got to jump under without the flying chicken. One of the worst being the obstacle course where you got 15 seconds to do this really specific jump with powers, glide , jump, more super specific jumps with powers in under 15 seconds. Just stick with the original version. Why do game developers think these half arsed extra modes which are slapped together at the last second count as extra gameplay. Just add a level or 2 , an extra power based on complaints or an extra boss or something. The last set of combos I feel aren't fluid as if it's the biggest combo to do in mortal kombat deadly alliance or tekken tag where you do king or armor king to nina williams ultimate throw combo where the only way to pull them off is by reassigning  the shoulder buttons. But you've actually got to spin around while the enemy is flying towards you and keep a combo going is annoying. 

for anyone with 90% at santa luchiata however it's spelled you're missing a quest it's not a hidden treasure, for anyone who wants 100% and a useless achievement in el inferno you got to do all those pointless gold medals.

all in all a great game for a boring weekend. I beat it in around 6 hours. To get 100% you'll need either adderal (ADD medication) ,  cheat engine to slow the game down as it gets way too quick to react or have absolutely no life as some of those gold medal challenges in el inferno are ... el.. insert spanish curse word.

[   ] Boa sorte para explorar tudo

--Conexão
[x] Cai mais que minhas notas
[   ] Pode dar umas quedas
[   ] Jogue 5 hrs sem se preoucupar

--Comunidade
[x] Lixo nuclear de tanta toxidade
[   ] Zoeiros, comediantes
[   ] Pessoas formais

OBS: Nem sei o que escrever, é 2D e você tem que ficar correndo pelo mapa, ta ae esse é o jogo.

--Nota Final -> 1/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198093090628', 'num_games_owned': 726, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1558992215}
review:
Мамамия, санталючийа дискамалярийа карамба диос амиго порфавор лучадор

Меня никогда не привлекала "романтика" мексики, потому что это та же русская бомжатня, только вдобавок курицы и козлы повсюду(имеются ввиду реально козлы, в смысле животные, не только люди). Сюжет начинается типично- украли прынцессу, а ты герой- иди спасай жителей и президентскую звезду.
Не могу поставить дизлайк игре, так как с оптимизоном всё ок, есть какие-то там комбо, додж. Всё норм для платформера, но сама атмосфера и сюжет мне не зашли. Поэтому дальше не хочется. Любителям могу рекомендовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133118458', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1558981089}
review:
Я уже прежде писал обзор на Guacamelee Gold Edition, так что повторяться не буду. Это издание предлагает нам уже более расширенную геймплейную механику, где ввели полоски хп у врагов и этакий "режим берсерка", в котором урон от ваших ударов увеличивается, бьете вы быстрее и передвигаетесь также. Добавили новые локации, которые после прохождения GE ощущаются напорядок свежо, а вместе с этим добавили и нового босса, который мелькает уже в первой кастцене. Ну и пожалуй главное отличие от GE: игра стала сложнее. Ну то есть в GE даже на харде вообще челенджа не ощущалось, а тут игра и впрямь стала сложнее. Это касается и испытаний в El Inferno, их выполнять стало ну прям запредельно сложно. 
Если в целом, то это все тот же стильный платформер, без сильных изменений проявивший свою третью форму в виде второго переиздания игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049902764', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1545, 'last_played': 1587239724}
review: Guacamelee é um excelente Metroidvania, sua arte é incrível, e a historia com uma pegada bem humorada é a cereja no bolo, os finais são bem interessantes, mesmo repetindo a campanha o jogo ainda continua divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297303373', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1558975993}
review: Got it on Giveaway as most of the game i have, but thankfully i installed and launched this to play with my younger brother as he insisted, Well i didn't regret it. It's amazing Mash-it-up action reminds me of Cadillac and Dinosaurs back in those Arcade machines days.

author: {'steamid': '76561198269505103', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1558894301}
review: Got this game for free as a promotion (it was free on Steam for a couple days) and was expecting to get some fun out of it. Honestly, I cant't even say that it was remotely fun. The cutscenes are long and unskippable, the keyboard controls extremely clunky, and the fights just don't scale with an increasing amount of players. I'm sorry if I offend fans of this game, but so far I can only say this game is relatively bad, that doesn't include the sound or visual design, but only the gameplay, even though I normally enjoy games of this genre.

review:
Consegui de graça, adorei! O jogo o gameplay é bom, a arte é simplesmente linda, muito bem ambientado tanto no mundo dos vivos como dos mortes, mecânicas de troca de mundo com puzzles bem elaborados e não muito difíceis (já que o jogo conta com escolha de dificuldade), da pra zerar em 10~12hrs sem muita pressa, e passar de 18hrs explorando tudo no mapa e descobrindo alguns segredos. Pretendo comprar o 2 assim que entrar em promoção!
Resumindo é um jogo incrível, tempo que eu não zerava um game (por achar chato) esse é exceção, JOGUEM!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198397464077', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1614, 'last_played': 1558725943}
review:
Guacamelee é um game de ação e plataforma em 2D, Metroidvania, com uma temática mexicana, cenários coloridos e repleto de diálogos e situações para te arrancar algumas risadas. 

A história segue Juan, um homem comum, ate que durante as vésperas do Dia dos Mortos, (uma celebração popular do povo mexicano, pois de acordo com o que dizem nesse dia os mortos têm a permissão divina para visitar seus parentes e amigos ainda em vida, por esse motivo pessoas enfeitam suas casas e se vestem com fantasias e mascaras coloridas de esqueletos em um dos festejos mais animados do país) sua paixão de infância, conhecida como a filha do El Presidente, é raptada pelo vilão Carlos Calaca. Quando tenta salva-la, Juan é mandado para o mundo dos mortos, onde uma lutadora misteriosa o entrega uma máscara, que te permite andar entre os dois mundos, tanto dos vivos quanto o dos mortos, e ele se torna o Luchador. Tudo isso acontece ainda nos minutos iniciais do game. Dando seguimento a história o bando de Calaca deseja usar a jovem em um ritual para unir o mundo dos mortos com o mundo dos vivos. No geral toda a história do jogo puxa para aqueles enredos ao estilo das telenovelas mexicanas galhofas, mas em nenhum momento isso se torna um ponto negativo, muito pelo contrário, esse é um dos fatores responsáveis pelo bom humor e diversão que o game proporciona.

O foco do game fica na exploração de ambiente, gênero que atualmente é conhecido como Metroidvania, uma homenagem a Metroid e Castlevania, pioneiros do gênero. Ao decorrer da história o jogador vai ganhando novas habilidades, que o permitem passar por caminhos que antes estavam impossibilitados de serem explorados, algo também característico do gênero. Ou seja, isso sempre vai te obrigar a retornar a áreas antes já visitadas, porem Guacamelee dispõem menos de passagens escondidas ou coisas do tipo, mais abordados em outros jogos, tudo fica muito bem marcado no mapa, te ajudando a não ficar tão perdido. Sem contar que além de tudo isso, ele também tem uma das melhores habilidades que eu já vi em um game, o poder de se transformar em uma galinha... SIM, UMA FUCKING GALINHA. Isso já demonstra o quando o game é muito bem-humorado. 

A apresentação a cultura mexicana foi muito bem abordada em vários pontos, como a sua identidade visual extremamente colorida, na cultura dos luchadores e ate em criaturas de lendas locais, como o Chupa-Cabra, criatura que nas histórias era responsável por ataques a animais em áreas rurais, além de muitas outras coisas. E durante todo esse processo ainda é possível encontrar muitas referências a cultura pop, como a outros games, e provavelmente você vai acabar notando uma ou outra de vez em quando. A sua duração media é de pouco mais de sete horas, mas para quem buscar os 100% pode passar de dez horas. Além de também contar com um suporte para multiplayer local.

Foi um game divertido, que em muitos momentos me arrancou varias risadas.
Conclusão: Muy Bueno

author: {'steamid': '76561198158766757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1559873099}

author: {'steamid': '76561198027049068', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 1351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1266, 'last_played': 1558985593}
review:
Got this game as a part of a promotion deal, but I can only leave a negative review. 
The visuals are great, the music is ok, the story is not deep, but it's not a problem. 
The problem is that the game is really unplayable on keyboard, which becomes completely obvious mid-game. Both combat and platforming challenges become tedious and disappointing because of this, there are levels I would never wish to revisit. 
The final boss fight is ridiculously unbalanced and difficult compared to the rest of the game. 
The fact that you can't dodge some attacks with control created specifically for dodging is irritating. The most dissapointing thing is that you can't explore some parts of the world if you don't complete a number of super hard challenges, where you have to desperately try to reach some arbitrary planks. 
In a nutshell: if you want a good metroidvania game, buy Hollow knight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056890665', 'num_games_owned': 209, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1558894435}
review: The art and music are cool. The main story is very linear, and after the first two hours you almost never have to revisit an area. You get all of your "gate-unlocking abilities" very early in the game and then you just use them to move forward, escaping rooms and arenas designed around pulling off different combos that require extreme dexterity. The amount of frustration makes this game a chore to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068411903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1650921310}
review: Oyun tam anlamıyla sinir harbi. Gamepad olmadan klavye ile oynamak eziyet. Bunların yanında oyun full eğlence ve aksiyon. Oyun ilerledikçe farklı güçler kazanıyorsunuz, hatta bir aşamadan sonra tavuğa dönüşüp (evet bir tavuğa) normalde geçemeyeceğiniz yerlerden geçebiliyor ve haritada ilerleyebiliyorsunuz. Genel mantık mizah, eğlence, bulmaca çözme ve aksiyon. Burayı neden geçemiyorum dediğiniz yeri ilerleyen bölümlerde haa demek böyle geçiliyormuş dediğiniz farklı tarzda ve kendine göre bir havası olan farklı bir oyun. Tekrar uyarıyorum gamepadiniz yoksa çok zorlanacaksınız. Uzun zamandır denemeyi düşündüğüm bir oyundu, Steam kampanyasında ücretsiz görünce üzerine çullandım ve hemen kütüphaneme ekledim. Bir çok bölümde klavyeyi kırma aşamasına geldiğimi de belirtmek isterim. Sinirli iseniz hele ki sabırsız iseniz oynarken dikkatli olun zira bir yeri geçerken aynı şeyi defalarca denemeniz gerekebilir. Umarım incelemem faydalı olmuştur. Sevgiler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093402962', 'num_games_owned': 433, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1558874932}

author: {'steamid': '76561198831037382', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1559246170}
review:
Un juego muy entretenido, y que vale la pena.

En algunas partes, el juego puede ser un poco complicado, pero tiene sus momentos.
Hay cosas que al principio pueden parecer imposibles de pasar, e incluso cosas que parecen estar de adorno y ya está. Pero que luego tienen sentido a medida que vas jugando.

Me pasé el juego un poco muy rápido, pero de todas maneras lo conseguí gratis en una oferta del 100%.
Aunque recomiendo comprarlo, debido a que es un juego muy entretenido para pasar el rato.

8.9/10 Un buen juego, el cual recomiendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197078383', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1619247765}
review:
Bu oyun bir efsane.Arkadaşlar oyun çok güzel.Konsolda ki kontroller, grafikler, müzikler, ayrıntılar, mizahı, vuruş hissiyatı, ölüler günü teması, meksika teması ve birçok güzel şeye sahip oyundur kendisi.
Klavye kontrollerini çok iyi bilmiyorum o yüzden bir şey söyleyemeyeceğim eğer ki oynamayı düşünüyorsanız hemen ekleyin düşünmüyorsanızda hemen ekleyin belki ileride düşünürsünüz.Hikayeyi anlatayım bizim juan bir sabah gezmeye çıkar veya öyle bir şey ve gezerken bir anda patlama olur ve sevdiğimiz kız kaçırılır ve bizde öldürülürüz ölüler dünyasında gizli bir yabancı bize maskeyi verir veya yerini gösterir o maskeyi alırız ve bize özel güçler verir yukarıya doğru alevden yumruk atma olsun boyut değiştirme olsun birçok havalı özellik verir tabi bu özellikler oyunun belli safaların'da alınır neyse  bizim aşık olduğumuz kızı kaçıran kişinin peşine düşeriz giderken pek çok mekanlardan geçeriz özellikler kazanırız yaratık öldürerek para kasarız ve kendimizi güçlendiririz bazı yerlerde iskelet yüzlü para alırız ve kostüm açarız(kostümlerin kendine özel özellikleri var) oyunun iyi taraflarından biride boyut değiştirince müziğinde değişiyor olması kısacası oyun keyifli fiyatına kesinlikle değen oyun alın oynayın oynattırın.

Hikaye : 7/10

Oynanış : 8/10

Grafikler : 8/10

Oyun : 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198043894962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 631, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1559180952}
review:
An excellent game and well worth picking up on sale. Although it advertizes itself as "Metroidvania" it' actually much more linear than is the norm for the genre, with your character progressing from zone to zone in a set order under very specific guidance. It doesn't detract from the game, mind, but it may be a turn-off for die hard fans of the classic genre. 

PLAY WITH A CONTROLLER.

No, seriously. It's almost mandatory.

review:
Интересно про что разрабы вообще думали когда делали  игру для клавиатуры,я прекрасно понимаю что можно подключить геймпад, но я скажу так это нужно по иначему вы будете страдать в местах (паркура) иза того что все комбо делаются почти одинаково.Но в остальном игруха веселая, динамичная, интересная с мексиканским фольклором (что правда непонятно почему это некоторые персы говорят с английским слэнгом,хотя в принципе это не очень выбивается).Игра тянет на 8/10  иза  
выше перечисленых плюсов и минусов.

review:
喜欢画风，本人英文有点烂，勉强看的懂交流，但是不是很喜欢没有语音的游戏，毕竟神识交流不是凡人所能接触的嘛。。。
玩起来有一点像以前玩过的街机游戏。如果有语音和翻译我更喜欢这游戏。
不过，白嫖还要求那么多干嘛，是吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198072893076', 'num_games_owned': 658, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1558780150}
review:
"Дополненная версия "Guacamelee! Gold Edition" с улучшенной визуальной составляющей, парочкой больших новых локаций и кучей новых противников."

Главным отличием является визуал. Добавили кучу деталей, теней, искажений. Сделали картинку более красочной. Это классно.
Но что не классно, так это полоски здоровья противников. Сразу начали мозолить глаза. Была бы возможность их убрать, вопросов бы не было. Но их убрать в настройках нельзя. Крайне неудачное решение, как по мне.

Упрощённые вариации приёмов с захвата наш лучадор уже знает, а соответствующие товары в магазине заменились улучшение этих самых приёмов. Тут нечего сказать. Вроде логично, что он их знает, но процессу постепенного усиления это немного вредит, я считаю. В оригинале ты понятия не имел что можно сделать ещё из захвата. И постепенно покупая эти способности становился сильнее. имхо

Переработали боёвку. Теперь вы так же видите увороты противников и даже создаётся впечатление, что им улучшили ИИ. Теперь от красных атак увернуться можно, а от фиолетовых нельзя. Как следствие, некоторые противники стали доставлять меньше хлопот, а новые противники стали заменять предшественников. В общем и целом боевую систему это не испортило.

Новые противники представляют из себя усиленные версии обычных скелетов. Общее отличие - способность телепортироваться, даже из под шквала ваших атак. Неплохо. Так же парочка совершенно новых врагов, но они появляются редко и лишь в двух локациях.

Две большие новые локации! Это классно. Их достаточно аккуратно ввели в повествование. Их музыкальное сопровождение, откровенно говоря, не блещет. Ничего цепляющего.
Весьма оригинальные сегменты платформинга. Очень много движущихся платформ и моментов с необходимостью быстро менять измерение. Это классно.

Новая способность - интенсивность или проще говоря ярость. Вы быстрее, ваши атаки сильнее и приправлены эффектами. Для её поддержания необходимо набивать комбо. Неплохое дополнение к боёвке. Однако за всю игру почти не пользовался этой способностью. Но если прокачать её, то она окажется весьма полезной (регенерация здоровья или пробивание щитов). 

В общем и целом Super Turbo Championship Edition здорово расширяет игру. Если вы, как и я, не знали в чём же разница между GE и STCE, надеюсь я смог хоть немного прояснить для вас это. 

P.s.: и да, благослови господь Huble Bundle!

author: {'steamid': '76561198055264804', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 899, 'last_played': 1561548541}
review:
Всем Здаровеньки Булы,Guacamelee! : STCE,Искусство В чистом Виде,Перейдем К Самому Обзору.                                                   
 Минусы :                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1) Пожалуй Обьединение Английского  И Вроде Испанского.                                                                                                                        2) Иногда (Оч редко) Не Совсем Работают Платформы :Запрыгиваешь И Не Засчитывает Что Ты на Платформе И Падаешь . 3) Вытекает из 1-ого Нет Русификатора (Может Быть Я просто Не нашёл,Если есть соре).                                                                    
 Плюсы :                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1) Не Очевидный Сюжет.                                                                                                                                                                            2) Возможность Играть С Еще Одним Таким Же Как Вы "Лучадором".                                                                                                          3) Над Игрой Реально Надо Запариться.                                                                                                                                                  4) 2 Концовочки                                                                                                                                                                                                5) Дофигища Костюмов (Если Еще И Считать,Куриц И Женскую Версию Вообще Пипец,А если Еще Добавить Workshop То Вообще.                                                                                                                                                                                                        6) Вытекает Из 5-ого Есть Workshop А значит Можна Сделать Костюм Человека Паука (И Анимации) И можно Будет Сказать Что Ты Играешь В "Нового Человека Паука"(Вообщем Вы Меня Поняли).                                                                              7) Интересные Side Квесты.                                                                                                                                                                       8) Отсылочки.                                                                                                                                                                                              Нейтральные Факты :                                                                                                                                                                                  1) Фиг Знает Но Вроде Нет Музыки (Лично Я не Расслышал).                                                                                                                        2) Вначале Игры Все Настройки На Максимуме (Почти все).                                                                                                                      3) Есть Отссылочка Для Телефонов.                                                                                                                                                      4) И последний Факт,В игре (Благодоря WorkShop'у) Можно Играть За Злодеев.                                                                                       Мой Вердикт :                                                                                                                                                                                               Для Такой Маленькой Цены Очень Клёво А если учитывать Скидки + То-что Её недавно Раздавали Вообще топ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198247517100', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2288, 'last_played': 1560762250}
review:
这游戏真的不用多说，免费喜加一的小游戏，游戏质量却高的出奇。各种各样的彩蛋，爽快的打斗感，丰富的解密要素，真的是一款非常让人容易上瘾的割草游戏（就是有时候挺费键盘和手柄的）。一周目强迫症，面具碎片已经收集齐了（谁tm设计的这些挑战给我站出来），现在地图还有4个地方没有100%完成度，哭了。英语难度不需要太高，大部分内容查查词典基本就能看懂，实在懒得话汉化补丁和有道拍照翻译你值得拥有23333
顺便说一个很神奇的事，喜加一领了墨西哥1的同学想买墨西哥2的话，直接在steam里面买2的本体就好了，现在2史低42，但是有一个捆绑包是和1的冠军版一起卖的，如果你有了1的冠军版再买这个包只要27，竟然还比某宝便宜23333333

author: {'steamid': '76561197990961994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1558518891}
review:
Let's get some Guacamelee with chips.
Generally advertised as metroidvania, the game is quite linear in overall progression and offers little incentive to complete all the side content as it's just a vehicle to have easier boss fights. Where Guacamelee really shines is the art, the puzzle platforming and the dimension  switching mechanic. Going from the world of the living to the world of the dead changes every screen the player finds herself in, even if ever so subtly and provides added eye candy to the already pretty fun to look at product. 
Mexican history and culture is represented well, even more so considering the developers stem from Canada. Sound is quite good as well, the title melody tends to repeat itself quite a bit, but that is hardly noticeable over all the punching and hopping.
I'd recommend this game to anyone interested in slightly difficult platformers with smart beat em up sequences, the game isn't super hard but it's also not something to just pick up and breeze through casually, but can be completed in under 8 hours. As such, picking it up for 10-15$ seems like a no brainer.

8.5/10 Nachos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047883594', 'num_games_owned': 424, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1558720520}
review:
[h1]Неглубокий мазохизм[/h1]

А как все хорошо начиналось. Приятное ожидание погружения в мексиканскую культуру и радость от красочных первых уровней довольно быстро сменились скукой. Ползти до финала пришлось на морально-волевых. Затем узнаешь, что есть другая концовка. Отрывается второе дыхание, скачешь по аду и другим уровням в поисках нужных компонентов и вдруг, на вершине мира понимаешь, что ну его, не хочу я тратить столько времени и нервов на эту посредственность.

Игру делали с душой, этого не отнять. И пусть декорации ближе к концу оскудевают, бои и платформенные задачки находят чем удивить до самого конца, будь то новая интересная комбинация врагов или хитрое препятствие. Правда, лично для меня платформинг с управлением эту игру и хоронят.

Как определить, что управление, скажем так, не идеальное? Просто. Когда ты знаешь, что нужно сделать и попадаешь в тайминг, но что-то идет не так и при десятой попытке. Нет, я верю что на гейпаде проще и веселее. Но я старомоден в своей уверенности относительно того, что клавомышь - идеальное устройство ввода, не оптимизировать игры под которое - признак лени и криворукости.

Сюжет - плоское и равномерно размазанное по игре клише, персонажи неинтересные, шутки в диалогах слишком обильные и унылые. Из всего богатства той самой культуры поверхностно надергали только визуальные признаки, сути и смысла - ноль. 

Спасибо Humble за игру. Купил бы я ее за полную цену сейчас, когда знаю о ней все? Стопудово - нет. Цена - максимум доллар и то, если вам по душе платформенные задачки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198358456544', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1558719265}
review:
别让语言支持短板毁了一款游戏
Don't let language support destroy a game
玩过的最好的喜加一游戏，要是有中文，能和死亡细胞和空洞骑士打一打，兴许还能赢
以前从没了解过墨西哥文化，现在要我说墨西哥的话，那就是这款游戏了，风格独特，别具一格，
操作流畅度很高，打击感很好，估计要是有手柄振动会更爽，
游戏细节布置的精巧程度高到了一个意想不到的地步，因为有里世界表世界设定，切换的时候色彩变幻完美至极，有点震撼人心的感觉
玩法上有靠技巧杀敌，技巧跑酷，按流程收集、强化能力，也有无双的元素，非常多元化，但是结合的很完美
剧情方面因为没中文，我英语又垃圾，只能勉强看得出是救公主的剧情，台词应该有些搞笑元素（羊叔台词最好翻译了）
应该致敬了一些作品，我玩的游戏不多，但还是能看出来致敬了马里奥
唯一有点烦的就是切换里表世界这个设定了，当然是对于个人来说，一遇上跳来跳去连带着切世界的关卡就头大，让我想起了谷歌喜加一的一个叫时空旅途的游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561197972446888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1654123978}
review: Fun movesets and responsive controls. Play it with a controller for optimal fun. ¡Muy caliente!

author: {'steamid': '76561198284079109', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 470, 'last_played': 1590302079}
review: 整体难度相当低（normal模式），普通敌人打一下才掉点血皮，加上有回血莽就完事了。掉刺或毒池会回到上一个落脚点，所以跳地形也不用像蔚蓝那样每次从起点开始。存档点（商店）走几步就有一个，自动存档，商店物品也是很快就能买齐。个人觉得游戏性主要在于探索地图隐藏通道和合理利用各种能力，打斗也很爽快，再加上支持本地多人，愉快又轻松。总之作为一款小游戏还是不错的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198173144887', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1585198660}
review: good timekiller

author: {'steamid': '76561198149375532', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1558714926}
review:
说难度高的我真的不能理解，我第一次用手柄玩游戏，键位都不怎么记得，我玩起来并不觉得很难，究竟是怎样的手残才会觉得难得玩不下去。
八个小时通关，任务因为英语不太好懒得看所以没有做，但其他的收集基本都拿到了。关卡设计很优秀，美术具有独特的风格，墨西哥元素和游戏设计紧密结合，很有特色。难度也适中，只是后期怪物强化之后变得有些麻烦，不过进行多次尝试之后也觉得并不是很难。boss战死亡会保留一定的进度好评，让boss战难度低了许多。但是，手柄的跳跃判定太烦了，二段跳那里我差点出不去，8个小时游戏时间，至少大半个小时卡在跳跃的判定上，这点大概是最让人难受的地方了。
总之是个出色的游戏，可惜没有中文，无法更加深入地了解游戏的剧情和设定。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066836630', 'num_games_owned': 930, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1558684465}
review:
I took advantage of the deal that Drinkbox were [url=https://steamcommunity.com/games/275390/announcements/detail/2563023616878522111]promoting[/url] so I managed to play through the game for an entire day. I really hate that I have to give this game a bad review (Still no mixed review option) since the artstyle, gameplay & mexican culture concept were all fun to follow.

I can't forgive a definitive version of a game that manages to screw up input on keyboard (for example having to press D key twice along side arrow keys just to jump to a specific wall) & forces you to only use a controller just to enjoy the game. Knowing that Vsync is turned on by default it tells me that you can either suffer through input delay or screen tearing the entire game. I'm also not a big fan of any game that forces you to play through the entire game just to unlock the hardest difficulty.

One of the few positives of this PC port is the 4 player co-op & the consistent 60 FPS for the entire game with the only drops I ever got were from loading screens & autosaves.

Overall I wouldn't recommend this "definitive" edition & just get it on a deep discount or not buy it at all & personally for me it ruins any chance I would check out the sequel unless it's on a deep discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046657855', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1589052559}
review:
Game was earned free from limited time giveaway.

Overall a pretty nice game if very challenging towards the end.

On the other hand, a well crafted metroidvania with a large mix of platformer and a beat 'em up sort of combat.

Buy this game if you:
+ Like the Mexican visuals and the nice 2D graphic style that is very unique to this game.
+ Like some challenge in your platforms that utilize every mobility skill you get
+ Like the idea of wrestling your enemies to death hand to hand, using throws and special attacks, occasionally going into reckless intenso mode when it gets tight
+ Don't mind the pop culture references that litter the cities in the game or a simple story of "rescue el princessa"

...Or, pass on it if:

-You don't like platformer challenges, because there will be quite a few tough ones (one that's even pixel perfect dummy hardd) and they are required for the good ending
-You'd rather have RPG numbers, leveling up from grinding monsters and earning different equipment, because this game is a pure find your powers sort of adventure (a few statistic or utility upgrades can be earned with gold, or stat altering suits with a different currency)
-You don't like a game that has old references or generally prefer a game with more lore than cheesy writing.

Personal recommendation:

The game was really nice, both stylistically and gameplay wise, and while I got mad at every late game platformer, eventually I'd be in relief to know there's always more powers later on to help with one challenge or another.

On that point, the world is quite literally linear, only opening up the more you progress the main task of the story with no particular bonus, other than an essential collection of secret items needed for the good ending, but nothing like secret bosses or items etc.

That being said it took me about 11 hours to 100% the game minus playing a second time on the unlocked harder difficulty, and it feels like a good thing to note that this game is quite short, given the metroidvania nature and despite having tough challenges. 

The price is somewhat worth the artistic effort that went into the details in every level and character, however while I do recommend to play this game, if you feel like your money's worth is too high for about 11ish hours of a full 100% run (likely more or less depending on skill, which to be honest I'm surprised I got 100% in the game time of just 9 hours [Game states a total time of about 9 hours, likely not including times when paused]), then you may want to buy this on a sale.

All in all, this was quite nice to try!

author: {'steamid': '76561198928383976', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1559972325}
review:
彻头彻尾的垃圾游戏！！！做的那么好玩还™那么考验手残党，时想要我活活累死。




先说一下我这个人的情况吧，我只是一个普通玩家，平常习惯用wasd作为移动键的游戏，于是乎，使用上下左右作为移动，wasd还有shift操作的这款游戏对于我个人而言就变得非常蹩脚，但是这个游戏对于我这种平常对这类平板通关得人来说觉得还是挺不错的
再向大家给些操作建议
在学习升龙拳以后，想要跳的更高的话可以使用 跳接 a 接 升龙拳 的方式来到达更高的地方
连招：a接a接上a 后 跳 aaa 接升龙拳 接aaa

author: {'steamid': '76561198030092398', 'num_games_owned': 412, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1590488684}
review:
Не ожидал, что эта игра сможет мне понравиться. Так с первого взгляда и не заметишь ничего привлекательного... Но знаешь, она довольно милая. Да, в ней совсем простенький наивный сюжет, самая обычная боёвка, мало плюшек для развития персонажа, но она прикольная. Вся в красках, постоянные переходы от чего не успевают приедаться фоны, какой то драйв, музычка, ну блин, это действительно весело.
Отступлю.
О управлении. Честно, не понимаю тех людей, которые топят об удобности управления. Мне кажется, что они просто играют на геймпаде. Как по мне - меняй всё к чертям, играть попросту неудобно на клаве в стандартной раскладке. Нет, ты конечно можешь привыкнуть... но это знаешь, это как cпaть вверх ногами. Изловчиться можно, но намучаешься капец.
Продолжим.
Была когда то такая игруха в 2010 году, Shank называлась, вот мне кажется в Guacamelee не хватает Шенковских механик для разнообразия геймплея. Да и вообще стоило тащить всё что можно было со всех игр подобного жанра. У Guacamelee большой потенциал. Глядя на первую часть, хочется купить вторую и поиграть в неё.

Ainda por cima da cartinhas colecionáveis pra fabricar insignias! Pra um game que eu ganhei de graça é o melhor que já joguei!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973021945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1718, 'last_played': 1558416250}
review:
Not a bad Legend of Metroid save that I don't think you can do any real sequence breaking--and there's more direction than is typical of the genre. There is no inventory management to speak of, and swapping of gear is limited to costumes and can be ignored completely without having much effect on your ability to finish the game. It's limited to melee (with the exception of grappling and throwing enemies) and ends up being a sprawling brawler with platforming and skill gated levels. 

There is some very challenging combo based platforming, but the most difficult platforming can be bypassed provided you are willing to forgo the "Best" ending. If you're okay with not getting a Happily Ever After, then you can still defeat the final boss without doing those--but there are a few very tricky bits you can't bypass that may take a bit to get through. Fortunately, there are a couple layers of checkpoints that will help you keep your hair in your head.

You will definitely want a modern gamepad--at least a XBox 360 or clone--and you will probably do better using the D-pad for the harder platforming and mini-boss fights involving lots of coloured shields--or at least I did. I found that my stick inputs while fine for basic movement, are often a bit more ambiguous to the game engine than D-pad movements.

My first playthrough took a bit over 10 hours, but I'm not a speedrunner.

Also worthy of mention: no ice level. It's not often you find a challenging platformer that manages to completely avoid using slippery platforms to crank up the difficulty.

author: {'steamid': '76561198822731009', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1558593594}
review:
8.5/10 

'Guacamelee' is an amazing breath of fresh air to the Metroidvania genre! The world of the living... and the dead are beautifully illustrated by cartoony animations and flamboyant mariachi music. There was not one dull moment in the entire game. There are many combo moves to master, and unlike the Arkham series, each combo move is satisfyingly rewarded with each enemy you fight - especially since they are often color-coded to let you which move you need to use to defeat them. Secret chests are hidden through the world to collect items to increase your health and magic. You can also upgrade your outfit and choose between a male and female luchador. However, one draw back I noticed is that when you select a girl, like I did, your character will be a male during the cutscenes and the NPCs will refer to you using male pronouns. This is NOT to criticize the game for being misogynistic - I am simply pointing out that at times your character selection can make the game feel awkward. Perhaps this was meant more for co-cop to help distinguish the people on screen. Either way, the costumes you can pick from are beautifully animated and come with cool perks, like: earning coins faster or dealing mega damage. While the gameplay was amazing, the story was a little lackluster. It followed the Mario format: bad guy steals girl, rescue her from the castle. I should point out that a generic plot does not equal a poorly written story. Everything in the story is important to what you do in the game: ex., luchador super-powers, being able to transport between the realms of the living and the dead, etc. For me, there isn't that much re-playability once you've beaten the game, but the experience of playing it is definitely something you will remember - long after the game has ended. A great game to get into the holiday spirit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107669897', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1558586225}
review:
Я и так это вырвиглазно-эпилептоидное говнище не собирался проходить, так как брал ради карт, так ещё и их не дали: жадные разрабы отключили* выпадение карт в бесплатно розданной игре! Всю ночь держал эту дрочь запущенной, чтобы утром, проснувшись, обнаружить кукиш вместо карт! 

*https://steamcommunity.com/app/275390/discussions/0/3557193237096794106/

author: {'steamid': '76561198080480679', 'num_games_owned': 731, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1590234831}
review:
Edito la Review a negativo por diversas razones, para empezar entré a decir que era un juegazo demasiado pronto, ya que al principio de empezar este juego creía que era de las mejores cosas que he jugado nunca, me equivocaba, creo que el título se alarga demasiado  hasta con pantallas y otras llenas de enemigos de plataformeo insultante, y la gran mayoría de estas pantallas no son opcionales, tienes que pasar por ellas por narices, a las 8 horas ya quería arrancarme la piel a tiras, así que lo dejo a medias en post de mi estabilidad mental.

Plataformeo insultante, porque no tienes que hacer nada de, coloca esto allí o mueve una caja o haz cosas, no, los puzzles son saltar y hacer las skills para llegar al final de la pantalla con todas las skills del personaje esto no es malo por si mismo pero al final del juego tiene TANTAS pantallas así, que el lío de los controles es bíblico.

Los enemigos también son bastante difícil a partir de la mitad del juego, cada skill tiene un color, puñetazo hacia arriba es rojo, cabezazo es amarillo, etc etc pues hay enemigos que tienen escudos con colores concretos, pero cuando un enemigo va cambiando el color del escudo a voluntad, pues es un coñazo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198426984115', 'num_games_owned': 382, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1558577606}
review:
I must say when i got the game i assumed it was another clone of something or is just going to be boring in nature but oh i was wrong!
I really like this game its super fun, the platforming and the combat are equaly challenging and balanced but i must say the platforming kinda holds back the combat. The combat feels hard but also fun, when fighting you can tell what you're weakness are because there is fast enemy's, slow but strong enemy's ect! But like i said the platforming is kinda challenging but i don't play platformers that often so that's most likely my reason for finding it challenging. I also love how if the combat starts to get boring (it really never does) there's usually new moves to learn everytime its starts to get stail and keeps it from getting boring and repetitive!
I must say i love this game, although i usually never play combat games like this or playformer's i really like this game!
Just an added bonus its very low end friendly!

author: {'steamid': '76561198201412582', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1558671777}
review:
游戏真的很棒，墨西哥风情，色彩，音乐，文化，包括主角的能力让我想起电影《寻梦环游记》。
不论是游戏循序渐进的感觉，一点一点带你探索所有的地图
还是创意工坊的mod（贝姐mod完成度真的高，还有小蜘蛛）
唯一缺点是：汉化
按照游侠的贴子
覆盖文件然后打上汉化mod，解决了游戏汉化闪退的问题
但是乱码了！
求解决方案！
急！
谢！

author: {'steamid': '76561198343556875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 252, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1558529118}
review:
Un metroidvania con carácter propio.

Es entretenido, muy colorido, con ciertos toques de humor y con una total ambientación mexicana.
Puedes jugar con personaje masculino y femenino, comprar diferentes trajes y mejoras, más de un jugador y... te conviertes en pollo.

El sistema de combate es resultón y las plataformas de una dificultad adecuada. Eso si... el nivel de la lava, me parece que se pasaron con el tequila ese día...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025185898', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 2044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2044, 'last_played': 1558502874}
review:
Note: I received this game free though Humble, but have not received any payment or compensation for the following review. I'm just a guy that likes to write reviews.

With that out of the way I can say that Guacamelee Super Turbo Championship Edition is a delightful Mexican-inspired platforming adventure. It has everything you need- Sombrero wearing skeletons! Learning wrestling moves from a goat! Turning into the most mighty creature of all, the chicken! Collectibles!

So after a long day tending the agave fields, look no further than Guacamelee to make all your luchador dreams come true.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004388775', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1558490118}
review: The art style is super awesome and the overall tone of the game is fantastic. Sadly, it plays more like a Street Fighter game mixed with a Metroidvania. Combat relies heavily on executing timely combos which is just not for me. If you are one that does not mind combo-style combat then I'd highly recommend this game. Again, this game has bucket loads of style and is very charming. I just personally would like combat to be a little more fluid and free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018450069', 'num_games_owned': 811, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1558467712}
review:
Guacamelee! is something unique! And this is the Super Turbo Championship Edition of the game, meaning is the same game, but better than ever.

Guacamelee! is a 2D action-platformer game inspired on Mexican traditions and folklore. 
The game is full of action, adventure, puzzles and more. It can become a challenge for those who like me do not use a driver, which is recommended right from the start.

Graphically the game is very colorful and "cartoonish". The game also has a very interesting and fun soundtrack at good old mexican mariachi style.

Very fun experience that I fully recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079950590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 518, 'last_played': 1560633433}
review:
6/10
Buen metroidvania de combate cuerpo a cuerpo con muchos toques plataformeros (sobre todo al final). 
En tono de humor.
Pros:
Arte muy bonito inspirado en folklore mejicano.
Movimiento fluido y buena respuesta del mando.
Combate sencillo pero muy entretenido.
Divertidas referencias a la Popculture y videojuegos.
Multijugador simultáneo.
Contras:
Animaciones muy simples.
Facilón, lo mas dificil son algunos saltos  al estilo "Super meat boy"
No puedes jugar al personaje femenino en modo 1 jugador.

review:
Суровый платформер, ошибки тут вам не прощают. Из минусов только могу сказать очень сложное выполнение комб на клавиатуре (если к управление привыкнешь, то к этому врятли). Если у вас нету  гемпада , то не стоит пытаться играть. Как в последствие вы настрадаетесь много в игре.
10 из 10 сломанных клавиатур лучадора.

author: {'steamid': '76561198449904631', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 854, 'last_played': 1558743669}
review: Un juego sin pretensiones, que busca dar un rato cómodo para los que no tienen mucho tiempo para jugar videojuegos pero también con cierto toque de reto para los que le pueden dedicar más horas. El juego no lo recomendaría en su precio original pero si en descuentos. El mayor puntazo que le puedo dar al juego es el ambiente tanto del diseño de niveles, diálogos y música que yo como mexicano me hizo sentirme como en casa. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198132872056', 'num_games_owned': 261, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 2967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1685030951}
review:
Mexican-themed metroidvania endowed with a simple but robust combat system, challenging platforming sections, and humorous storyline that grows extremely bittersweet (if you like Tim Burton films, you'll adore Guacamelee's ending). Vibrant, angular cartoon visuals combine with an exquisitely composed Mariachi-style soundtrack to form a truly wonderful atmosphere. Dia de Muertos as a temporal setting is overly cliched in entertainment media, but DrinkBox Studios absolutely justifies the selection with a world-changing mechanic that adds great complexity to basic sidescrolling. NPCs offer amusing and sometimes demanding sidequests that are a good alternative to pursue if players aren't ready/willing to progress with the main course, and 'hard mode' (post-completion of original campaign) adds extra shelf life for compañeros who want to be pushed harder. Good variety of enemies that scale up in difficulty with assorted shields and special attacks, bosses also have mostly intuitive design and are extremely fair with midway checkpoints. Lots of abilities to unlock (and neat costumes to purchase) with in-game collectible currency (pesos) which definitely incentivise heavy exploration. Overall, a super fun casual brawler that doesn't require a massive time sink. Muchas Gracias por esto maravilloso juego

2023 update: Changing from positive to negative because of infierno challenges and hard mode. I found the challenges extremely difficult, poorly designed, and completely devoid of joy. Frustrating to the extent I wondered how this passed QA and was allowed into the game. Hard mode is also unnecessarily unfair. Meaning, the difficulty itself is fine, but the inconsistency (doing the exact same movement to hit an enemy sometimes hurts you, other times doesn't) and broken controls (pressing certain buttons required for executing special moves to damage enemies literally does not work at crucial moments) and the enemies having insane accuracy make this excruciating and unfun. Kind of wish I had just stuck to normal mode because these issues can be excused when the enemies are more forgiving. Still recommended on normal, but not like this. Would rate this neutral if possible. Also, forgot to add, no matter how skilled you get at something, there is such heavy emphasis on RNG that even when you do complete a challenge/boss, you don't feel rewarded, just glad the nightmare is over. The controls really need to be tighter and more responsive and THEN I would say, yes, excellent, difficult but fair. But as it stands, not a pleasant experience at all. I respect others who enjoy challenges/hard mode, totally valid, just my take and trying to be totally honest. I don't mind tougher difficulties in games like crushing (Uncharted) or even deadly obsession (tomb raider) but I do want some kind of payoff in the end, which this game doesn't give.

author: {'steamid': '76561198832735925', 'num_games_owned': 1860, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 7349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1164, 'last_played': 1560196739}
review:
Un juego bastante bueno y entretenido que te cagaras de risa con los estereotipos mexicanos, los memes y personajes de otros juegos que encontraras durante tu aventura tales como Megaman, la mascara de majora, el spy, los castle crashes, Luigi y Mario y muchos mas.
Los combos y controles son buenos pero al principio son un poco confusos pero luego te acostumbras lo malo es que en el modo historia solo te demorara como unas 10 horas pero vale la pena comprar este gran juegazo.

В интернете день и ночь

Я горячий мексиканец
